tika-vin10t0:26_0: Sasikkho sādiyanto so, ṭhapetvā kiriyaṃ cuto.
tika-vin10t0:77_0: Nimittaṃ itthiyā tassa, chupato garukaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:103_0: Apade ahayo macchā, kapotā dvipadepi ca;
tika-vin10t0:148_0: Tatthajātakakaṭṭhaṃ vā, lataṃ vā chindato pana;
tika-vin10t0:151_0: Pathaviṃ khaṇato vāpi, byūhato paṃsumeva vā;
tika-vin10t0:152_0: Āmasantassa vā kumbhiṃ, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:160_0: Uddharantassa khāṇuṃ vā, chindato saṅkhalimpi vā;
tika-vin10t0:161_0: Thullaccayaṃ tato kumbhiṃ, ṭhānā cāveti ce cuto.
tika-vin10t0:163_0: Paṭhamaṃ pana kumbhiṃ vā, uddharitvā tathā puna;
tika-vin10t0:164_0: Ṭhānā cāveti khāṇuṃ vā, saṅkhaliṃ vāpi so nayo.
tika-vin10t0:166_0: Ito cito ca ghaṃsanto, mūle sāreti rakkhati;
tika-vin10t0:169_0: Jātaṃ chindati ce rukkhaṃ, dukkaṭaṃ kumbhimatthake;
tika-vin10t0:175_0: Haranto kumbhiyā bhaṇḍaṃ, muṭṭhiṃ chindati attano;
tika-vin10t0:176_0: Bhājane vā gataṃ katvā, hoti bhikkhu parājito.
tika-vin10t0:178_0: Hāraṃ vā pana pāmaṅgaṃ, suttāruḷhaṃ tu kumbhiyā;
tika-vin10t0:179_0: Phandāpeti yathāvatthuṃ, ṭhānā cāveti ce cuto.
tika-vin10t0:185_0: Sakalampi ca taṃ kumbhiṃ, pivato na parājayo.
tika-vin10t0:187_0: Sace khipati yaṃ kiñci, bhaṇḍakaṃ telakumbhiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:188_0: Taṃ pādagghanakaṃ telaṃ, dhuvaṃ pivati tāvade.
tika-vin10t0:191_0: Āviñjetvāpi vā kumbhiṃ, telaṃ gāḷeti ce tathā.
tika-vin10t0:194_0: Pītaṃ telañca taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ, uddharantova dhaṃsito.
tika-vin10t0:196_0: Tattheva bhindato telaṃ, chaḍḍentassa tatheva ca;
tika-vin10t0:197_0: Jhāpentassa abhogaṃ vā, karontassa ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:208_0: Dvīsu passesu pakkhanto, heṭṭhā pādanakhā tathā.
tika-vin10t0:214_0: Hatthaṃ vāpi pasāreti, purato vāssa tiṭṭhati.
tika-vin10t0:216_0: Moropi gagane pakkhe, cāreti na ca gacchati;
tika-vin10t0:222_0: Aggahetvā gahetvā vā, hatthena pana attano;
tika-vin10t0:223_0: Ṭhānā cāveti ce moraṃ, sayaṃ ṭhānā cuto siyā.
tika-vin10t0:226_0: Kalāpaggena vā phuṭṭhaṃ, mukhatuṇḍena bhikkhu ce.
tika-vin10t0:228_0: Atikkāmeyya yo moraṃ, ṭhānā cāveti nāma so;
tika-vin10t0:231_0: Gagane pana gacchanto, kare moro nilīyati;
tika-vin10t0:234_0: Sace gaṇhāti taṃ moraṃ, itarena karena so;
tika-vin10t0:235_0: Cāvitattā pana ṭhānā, bhikkhu ṭhānā cuto siyā.
tika-vin10t0:237_0: Itaraṃ pana morassa, upaneti sace karaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:238_0: Na doso tattha uḍḍetvā, sayameva nilīyati.
tika-vin10t0:240_0: Disvā aṅge nilīnaṃ taṃ, theyyacittena gacchato;
tika-vin10t0:241_0: Pāde thullaccayaṃ hoti, dutiye ca parājayo.
tika-vin10t0:249_0: Chijjamānaṃ suvaṇṇādiṃ, patte patati ce pana;
tika-vin10t0:255_0: Eseva ca nayo ñeyyo, hatthe vattheva matthake;
tika-vin10t0:256_0: Taṃ taṃ tassa bhave ṭhānaṃ, yattha yattha patiṭṭhitaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:262_0: Saṃharitvā sace vaṃse, ṭhapitaṃ hoti cīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t0:263_0: Katvā punorato bhogaṃ, tathā antañca pārato.
tika-vin10t0:266_0: Na tu cīvaravaṃso so, hotīti sakalo mato.
tika-vin10t0:269_0: Itarenapi vā phuṭṭhaṃ, orimantena vā puna.
tika-vin10t0:274_0: Uddhaṃ vā ukkhipantassa, cīvaraṃ pana vaṃsato;
tika-vin10t0:277_0: Rajjukena ca bandhitvā, ṭhapitaṃ pana cīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t0:284_0: Saṃharitvā tu nikkhitte, cīvare viya nicchayo.
tika-vin10t0:286_0: Sikkāya pakkhipitvā yaṃ, laggitaṃ hoti bhaṇḍakaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:287_0: Sikkāto taṃ haranto vā, saha sikkāya vā cuto.
tika-vin10t0:290_0: Agge vā pana bunde vā, gahetvā parikaḍḍhato.
tika-vin10t0:299_0: Bhittiṃ pana ca nissāya, ṭhapitepi ayaṃ nayo.
tika-vin10t0:301_0: Cālentassa ca tālassa, phalaṃ vatthu hi pūrati;
tika-vin10t0:302_0: Yenassa bandhanā mutte, tasmiṃ pārājikaṃ bhave.
tika-vin10t0:304_0: Piṇḍiṃ chindati tālassa, sace pārājikaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t0:312_0: Vatthu taṃ chindato pupphaṃ, tassa pārājikaṃ vade.
tika-vin10t0:315_0: Na chijjati tato yāva, tāva naṃ parirakkhati.
tika-vin10t0:321_0: Ākārena sace tāni, ṭhānā cāveti nassati.
tika-vin10t0:324_0: Cāletvā udakaṃ puppha-ṭṭhānā cāveti ce cuto.
tika-vin10t0:329_0: Accuggatassa taṃ ṭhānaṃ, jalato sakalaṃ jalaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:335_0: Pupphe gahetvā nāmetvā, uppāṭeti sace pana;
tika-vin10t0:336_0: Na tassa udakaṃ ṭhānaṃ, naṭṭho uppāṭitakkhaṇe.
tika-vin10t0:338_0: Yo hi sassāmike macche, theyyacittena gaṇhati;
tika-vin10t0:341_0: Tassevaṃ gaṇhato vatthu, yena macchena pūrati;
tika-vin10t0:347_0: Nīrato uppatitvā yo, tīre patati vārijo;
tika-vin10t0:351_0: Ninne macchavisaṃ nāma, pakkhipitvā gate pana.
tika-vin10t0:353_0: Pacchā macchavisaṃ macchā, khāditvā pilavanti ce;
tika-vin10t0:359_0: Gahetvā sāmikā macche, sace yanti nirālayā;
tika-vin10t0:360_0: Gaṇhato pana te sese, theyyacittena dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:363_0: Eseva ca nayo sese, kacchapādimhi vārije.
tika-vin10t0:375_0: Purato pacchato vāpi, passato vāpi kaḍḍhato.
tika-vin10t0:383_0: Bandhitvā pana yā tīre, ṭhapitā niccale jale;
tika-vin10t0:384_0: Bandhanañca ṭhitokāso, ṭhānaṃ tassā dvidhā mataṃ.
tika-vin10t0:387_0: Pacchā kenacupāyena, ṭhānā cāveti ce cuto.
tika-vin10t0:390_0: Eseva ca nayo vutto, theyyacittassa bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t0:403_0: Theyyā titthe ṭhitaṃ nāvaṃ, āruhitvā sace pana;
tika-vin10t0:409_0: Āgamma balavā vāto, nāvaṃ harati ce pana;
tika-vin10t0:410_0: Vāteneva haṭā nāvā, na doso koci vijjati.
tika-vin10t0:413_0: Acāventova taṃ ṭhānā, kiṇitvā ce palāyati.
tika-vin10t0:416_0: Sayameva ca gacchantiṃ, ṭhānā cāveti ce cuto.
tika-vin10t0:419_0: Yānaṃ nāma ratho vayhaṃ, sakaṭaṃ sandamānikā;
tika-vin10t0:426_0: Yānaṃ pājayato tassa, nisīditvā dhure pana.
tika-vin10t0:437_0: Purato pacchato vāpi, ṭhānā cāveti ce pana;
tika-vin10t0:438_0: Thullaccayaṃ tu tiṇṇampi, ṭhānā cāve parājayo.
tika-vin10t0:447_0: Uddhīsu vā gahetvā taṃ, ṭhānā cāveti ce cuto.
tika-vin10t0:449_0: Ṭhapitassa hi cakkassa, nābhiyā pana bhūmiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:452_0: Phusitvā yaṃ ṭhitaṃ bhūmiṃ, nemipassena nābhiyā;
tika-vin10t0:462_0: Ito cito ca ghaṃsanto, theyyacittena yo pana;
tika-vin10t0:465_0: Khandhaṃ oropite bhāre, tassa pārājikaṃ mataṃ;
tika-vin10t0:476_0: Parājeti paraṃ dhammaṃ, caranto ce parājito.522
tika-vin10t0:479_0: Parajjati sayaṃ dhammaṃ, caranto yopi tassa ca.
tika-vin10t0:490_0: Asitena ca lāyitvā, chinditvā vā karena ca.
tika-vin10t0:492_0: Yasmiṃ bījepi vā vatthu, sīse pūreti muṭṭhiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:493_0: Bandhanā mocite tasmiṃ, tassa pārājikaṃ bhave.
tika-vin10t0:495_0: Acchinno pana daṇḍo vā, taco vā appamattako;
tika-vin10t0:507_0: Tañca kho sāmikānaṃ tu, dhuranikkhepane sati;
tika-vin10t0:510_0: Gahetabbā sace hoti, dvīhi khīlehi yā pana;
tika-vin10t0:514_0: Rajjuṃ vāpi pasāreti, yaṭṭhiṃ pāteti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:516_0: Yehi dvīhi payogehi, attano santakaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t0:517_0: Ādo thullaccayaṃ tesu, dutiye ca parājayo.
tika-vin10t0:521_0: Gāmaṭṭhepi ca vattabbaṃ, apubbaṃ natthi kiñcipi.
tika-vin10t0:524_0: Tiṇaṃ vā pana paṇṇaṃ vā, lataṃ vā kaṭṭhameva vā;
tika-vin10t0:528_0: Tacchetvā ṭhapito rukkho, gahetabbo na kocipi.
tika-vin10t0:533_0: Lakkhaṇe challiyonaddhe, na doso koci gaṇhato;
tika-vin10t0:537_0: Citte cintento vā aññaṃ, bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ hotevassa.
tika-vin10t0:555_0: Āviñjitvā pavesetvā, chiddaṃ katvāpi vā tathā.
tika-vin10t0:557_0: Vāpiyaṃ vā taḷāke vā, bhājanaṃ attano pana;
tika-vin10t0:563_0: Anto ṭhatvā bahi ṭhatvā, chindanto ubhayatthapi;
tika-vin10t0:570_0: Chinditvā yāva saṅghassa, na niyyādenti te pana;
tika-vin10t0:571_0: Ābhataṃ tāva taṃ sabbaṃ, tesameva ca santakaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:573_0: Tasmā taṃ theyyacittena, gaṇhantassa ca bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t0:576_0: Yadā niyyāditaṃ tehi, tato paṭṭhāya saṅghikaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:580_0: Sabbasādhāraṇattā ca, aññaṃ viya na hotidaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:583_0: Aggiṃ vā deti satthena, ākoṭeti samantato;
tika-vin10t0:586_0: Yena vā tena vā rukkho, vinassati ca ḍayhati;
tika-vin10t0:590_0: Sīsato kaṇṇato vāpi, gīvato hatthatopi vā;
tika-vin10t0:602_0: Nivatthaṃ pana vatthaṃ yo, acchindati parassa ce;
tika-vin10t0:603_0: Paropi pana lajjāya, sahasā taṃ na muñcati.
tika-vin10t0:605_0: Ākaḍḍhati ca coropi, so paro tāva rakkhati;
tika-vin10t0:614_0: Athāpi parikappetvā, pātāpeti va yo pana;
tika-vin10t0:617_0: Phandāpeti yathāvatthuṃ, ṭhānā cāveti ce cuto;
tika-vin10t0:618_0: “Tiṭṭha tiṭṭhā”ti vadato, na doso chaḍḍitepi ca.
tika-vin10t0:620_0: Āgantvā theyyacittena, pacchā taṃ gaṇhato siyā;
tika-vin10t0:626_0: “Tiṭṭha tiṭṭhā”ti vutto ca, chaḍḍetvā pana bhaṇḍakaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:639_0: “Raho mayā panetassa, ṭhapitaṃ kiṃ nu dassati”;
tika-vin10t0:642_0: Tasmiṃ dāne nirussāhe, paro ce nikkhipe dhuraṃ;
tika-vin10t0:649_0: Suṅkaghātassa antova, ṭhatvā pāteti ce bahi;
tika-vin10t0:650_0: Dhuvaṃ patati ce hatthā, muttamatte parājayo.
tika-vin10t0:652_0: Taṃ rukkhe khāṇuke vāpi, hutvā paṭihataṃ puna;
tika-vin10t0:653_0: Vātukkhittampi vā anto, sace patati rakkhati.
tika-vin10t0:655_0: Patitvā bhūmiyaṃ pacchā, vaṭṭantaṃ pana bhaṇḍakaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:658_0: Ṭhatvā ṭhatvā pavaṭṭantaṃ, paviṭṭhaṃ ce parājayo;
tika-vin10t0:662_0: Sārato taṃ gahetabbaṃ, yuttaṃ viya ca dissati.
tika-vin10t0:664_0: Sayaṃ vā yadi vaṭṭeti, vaṭṭāpeti parena vā;
tika-vin10t0:665_0: Aṭṭhatvā vaṭṭamānaṃ taṃ, gataṃ nāsakaraṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:667_0: Ṭhatvā ṭhatvā sace anto, bahi gacchati rakkhati;
tika-vin10t0:670_0: Gacchante pana yāne vā, gaje vā taṃ ṭhapeti ce;
tika-vin10t0:673_0: Ṭhapite ṭhitayāne vā, payogena vinā gate;
tika-vin10t0:676_0: Sace pājeti taṃ yānaṃ, ṭhapetvā yānake maṇiṃ;
tika-vin10t0:679_0: Suṅkaṭṭhāne mataṃ suṅkaṃ, gantuṃ datvāva vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t0:683_0: Antojātaṃ dhanakkītaṃ, dinnaṃ vā pana kenaci;
tika-vin10t0:686_0: Bhujissaṃ vā harantassa, mānusaṃ mātarāpi vā;
tika-vin10t0:701_0: Saṇikaṃ pana gacchantaṃ, sace vadati sopi ca;
tika-vin10t0:702_0: Sīghaṃ gacchati ce tassa, vacanena parājayo.
tika-vin10t0:704_0: Palāyitvā sace aññaṃ, gāmaṃ vā nigamampi vā;
tika-vin10t0:705_0: Gataṃ disvā tato tañce, palāpeti parājayo.
tika-vin10t0:718_0: So nikkhamati ce sappo, tassa pārājikaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:720_0: Tathā katvā tu maṇḍūka-mūsikānaṃ ravampi vā;
tika-vin10t0:724_0: Yena kenaci nikkhante, sappe pārājikaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:734_0: Ṭhānaṃ sālā ca vatthu ca, aṅgaṇaṃ sakalaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:737_0: Tasmā tesaṃ vasā hatthiṃ, harato kāraye budho.
tika-vin10t0:739_0: Nagarassa bahiddhā tu, ṭhitassa pana hatthino;
tika-vin10t0:742_0: Nipannassa gajassekaṃ, ṭhānaṃ taṃ uṭṭhapeti ce;
tika-vin10t0:743_0: Tasmiṃ uṭṭhitamatte tu, tassa pārājikaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:750_0: Garukaṃ theyyacittena, ṭhānā cāveti ce cuto.
tika-vin10t0:766_0: Nikkhipeyyassa satthaṃ vā, vadeyya maraṇe guṇaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:769_0: Asandheyyova so ñeyyo, dvedhā bhinnasilā viya.
tika-vin10t0:774_0: Tattha kāyena vā kāya-paṭibaddhena vā sayaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:775_0: Mārentassa paraṃ ghāto, ayaṃ sāhatthiko mato.
tika-vin10t0:777_0: “Evaṃ tvaṃ paharitvā taṃ, mārehī”ti ca bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t0:787_0: Ayaṃ vijjāmayo nāma, payogo pañcamo mato.
tika-vin10t0:789_0: Samatthā māraṇe yā ca, iddhi kammavipākajā;
tika-vin10t0:795_0: Bahusvapi yamuddissa, pahāraṃ deti ce pana;
tika-vin10t0:796_0: Maraṇena ca tasseva, kammunā tena bajjhati.
tika-vin10t0:801_0: Mate pahaṭamatte vā, pacchā mubhayathāpi ca;
tika-vin10t0:804_0: Evaṃ sāhatthiko ñeyyo, tathā āṇattikopi ca;
tika-vin10t0:805_0: Ettāvatā samāsena, dve payogā hi dassitā.
tika-vin10t0:807_0: Vatthu kālo ca deso ca, satthañca iriyāpatho;
tika-vin10t0:810_0: Māretabbo hi yo tattha, so “vatthū”ti pavuccati;
tika-vin10t0:811_0: Pubbaṇhādi siyā kālo, sattānaṃ yobbanādi ca.
tika-vin10t0:813_0: Deso gāmādi viññeyyo, satthaṃ taṃ sattamāraṇaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:819_0: “Yaṃ mārehī”ti āṇatto, aññaṃ māreti ce tato;
tika-vin10t0:828_0: Āṇatto “ajja pubbaṇhe, mārehī”ti ca yo pana;
tika-vin10t0:829_0: So ce māreti sāyanhe, mūlaṭṭho parimuccati.
tika-vin10t0:837_0: Yadā kadāci pubbaṇhe, visaṅketo na mārite.
tika-vin10t0:842_0: “Imaṃ gāme ṭhitaṃ veriṃ, mārehī”ti ca bhāsito;
tika-vin10t0:843_0: Sace so pana māreti, ṭhitaṃ taṃ yattha katthaci.
tika-vin10t0:845_0: Natthi tassa visaṅketo, ubho bajjhanti kammunā;
tika-vin10t0:848_0: “Vaneyevā”ti vā vutto, gāme māreti cepi vā;
tika-vin10t0:855_0: Yena kenaci satthena, visaṅketo na mārite.
tika-vin10t0:860_0: Iti vutto sace veriṃ, dhārāya itarāya vā;
tika-vin10t0:867_0: Māreti naṃ nisinnaṃ ce, visaṅketo na vijjati.
tika-vin10t0:870_0: Vutto māreti gacchantaṃ, nisinnaṃ vā yathākkamaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:873_0: Eseva ca nayo ñeyyo, sabbiriyāpathesu ca.
tika-vin10t0:875_0: “Mārehī”ti ca vijjhitvā, āṇatto hi parena so;
tika-vin10t0:878_0: “Mārehī”ti ca vijjhitvā, āṇatto hi parena so;
tika-vin10t0:879_0: Chinditvā yadi māreti, visaṅketova hoti so.
tika-vin10t0:884_0: Dīghaṃ rassaṃ kisaṃ thūlaṃ, kāḷaṃ odātameva vā;
tika-vin10t0:887_0: Sopi yaṃ kiñci āṇatto, sace māreti tādisaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:891_0: Khaṇantassa ca opātaṃ, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:894_0: Patitvā ca mate tasmiṃ, tassa pārājikaṃ bhave.
tika-vin10t0:896_0: Nipatitvā panaññasmiṃ, mate doso na vijjati;
tika-vin10t0:899_0: “Patitvā ettha yo koci, maratū”ti hi yattakā;
tika-vin10t0:900_0: Maranti nipatitvā ce, dosā hontissa tattakā.
tika-vin10t0:905_0: Patitvā gabbhinī tasmiṃ, sagabbhā ce marissati;
tika-vin10t0:911_0: Verino tattha pātetvā, sace mārenti verino;
tika-vin10t0:912_0: Patitaṃ tattha mārenti, nīharitvā sace bahi.
tika-vin10t0:914_0: Nibbattitvā hi opāte, matā ce opapātikā;
tika-vin10t0:915_0: Asakkontā ca nikkhantuṃ, sabbattha ca parājayo.
tika-vin10t0:923_0: Tathā yakkhādayo pāṇe, khate uddissa bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t0:927_0: Pāsaṃ oḍḍeti yo tattha, sace bajjhanti pāṇino.
tika-vin10t0:932_0: Uddissa hi kate pāse, yaṃ panuddissa oḍḍito;
tika-vin10t0:935_0: Mūlena vā mudhā vāpi, dinne pāse parassa hi;
tika-vin10t0:938_0: Yena laddho sace lopi, pāsamuggaḷitampi vā;
tika-vin10t0:941_0: Yo pāsaṃ uggaḷāpetvā, yāti pāpabhayā sace;
tika-vin10t0:942_0: Taṃ disvā puna aññopi, saṇṭhapeti hi tattha ca.
tika-vin10t0:944_0: Baddhā baddhā maranti ce, mūlaṭṭho na ca muccati;
tika-vin10t0:947_0: Gopetvāpi na mokkho hi, pāsayaṭṭhiṃ sayaṃkataṃ;
tika-vin10t0:948_0: Tamañño puna gaṇhitvā, saṇṭhapeti sace pana.
tika-vin10t0:950_0: Tappaccayā marantesu, mūlaṭṭho na ca muccati;
tika-vin10t0:951_0: Nāsetvā sabbaso vā taṃ, jhāpetvā vā vimuccati.
tika-vin10t0:953_0: Ropentassa ca sūlaṃ vā, sajjentassa adūhalaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:978_0: Jānāti ce hoti cuto hi no ce;
tika-vin10t0:996_0: Paṭhame dutiye cante, pariyāyo na vijjati;
tika-vin10t0:1000_0: Sesā ca tisamuṭṭhānā, tesamaṅgāni satta tu.
tika-vin10t0:1014_0: Mudupiṭṭhi ca lambī ca, mukhaggāhī nisīdako;
tika-vin10t0:1045_0: Sukkaṃ yadi vimoceti, garukaṃ tassa niddise.
tika-vin10t0:1048_0: Thullaccayaṃ samuddiṭṭhaṃ, sace sukkaṃ na muccati.
tika-vin10t0:1051_0: Hoti thullaccayaṃ tassa, yadi sukkaṃ na muccati.
tika-vin10t0:1053_0: Vatthiṃ kīḷāya pūretvā, passāvetuṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t0:1075_0: Ekena pana hatthena, gahetvā dutiyena vā;
tika-vin10t0:1081_0: Aṅgulīnaṃ tu pañcannaṃ, gahaṇe ekato pana;
tika-vin10t0:1082_0: Ekāyeva siyāpatti, na hi koṭṭhāsato siyā.
tika-vin10t0:1112_0: Vādāpetuñca vādetuṃ, vāditaṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:1115_0: Pūjā buddhassa kātabbā, vattabbāti ca viññunā.
tika-vin10t0:1137_0: Gaṇanāya ca vācānaṃ, itthīnaṃ garukā siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t0:1139_0: Sā ce nappaṭijānāti, tassa thullaccayaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t0:1159_0: Tasmiṃyeva khaṇe sā ce, jānāti garukaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:1161_0: No ce jānāti sā yakkhi-petidevīsu paṇḍake;
tika-vin10t0:1162_0: Hoti thullaccayaṃ tassa, sese āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:1168_0: Obhāso tena rāgena, khaṇe tasmiṃ vijānanaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:1175_0: Vīmaṃsati garu hoti, paccāharati ce pana.
tika-vin10t0:1190_0: Ekeneva ca sabbattha, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:1192_0: Cetiyassa ca saṅghassa, gilānassa ca bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t0:1218_0: Sace ekavipannā sā, garukaṃ ekakaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:1224_0: Hatthakammampi nāmetaṃ, kiñci vatthu na hoti hi.
tika-vin10t0:1229_0: “Goṇaṃ demā”ti vuttepi, gahetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t0:1238_0: Paccayesu hi tīsveva, viññatti na ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t0:1244_0: Pharasuṃ vāpi vāsiṃ vā, nisentassāpi dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:1245_0: Chindato dukkaṭaṃ rukkhaṃ, tassa pācittiyā saha.
tika-vin10t0:1250_0: Yā pana dvīhi piṇḍehi, niṭṭhānaṃ tu gamissati;
tika-vin10t0:1251_0: Hoti thullaccayaṃ tesu, paṭhame dutiye garu.
tika-vin10t0:1254_0: Tathā bhūmiṃ samaṃ katvā, bhindatopi ca taṃ kuṭiṃ.
tika-vin10t0:1259_0: Desāpetvāva bhikkhūhi, vatthuṃ pana ca bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t0:1266_0: Adesetvā sace vatthuṃ, yo kareyya mahallakaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:1280_0: Suddhaṃ vā yadi vāsuddhaṃ, tesu aññatarena yo.
tika-vin10t0:1294_0: Taṃ ce paro vijānāti, hoti āpatti bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t0:1299_0: Atha sopi “mayā diṭṭhaṃ, sutaṃ vā”ti ca bhāsati;
tika-vin10t0:1300_0: Tesaṃ dvinnampi saṅghādi-seso hoti na saṃsayo.
tika-vin10t0:1302_0: Dūtaṃ vā pana pesetvā, paṇṇaṃ vā pana sāsanaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:1312_0: Tathā kammaṃ karontassa, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:1327_0: Codeti vā tathāsaññī, codāpeti parena vā;
tika-vin10t0:1331_0: Samaggassa ca saṅghassa, bhedatthaṃ vāyameyya yo;
tika-vin10t0:1334_0: So hi bhikkhūhi vattabbo, “bhedatthaṃ mā parakkama”;
tika-vin10t0:1337_0: Vuccamāno hi teheva, nissajjeyya na ceva yaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:1341_0: Disvā sutvā hi ñatvā vā, avadantassa dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:1344_0: Dūrampi pana gantabbaṃ, sace sakkoti tāvade.
tika-vin10t0:1347_0: Dūtaṃ vā pana paṇṇaṃ vā, pesatopi ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:1350_0: Kammavācāhi ca dvīhi, hoti thullaccayaṃ dvayaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:1358_0: Ñattito pana pubbe vā, pacchā vā taṅkhaṇepi vā;
tika-vin10t0:1365_0: Yasmiñca nibbematiko, taṃ sabbaṃ tassa vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:1395_0: Kamme kariyamāne taṃ, accajaṃ garukaṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t0:1397_0: Cuṇṇaṃ paṇṇaṃ phalaṃ pupphaṃ, veḷuṃ kaṭṭhañca mattikaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:1409_0: Haritvā vā harāpetvā, pitūnaṃ pana vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t0:1412_0: Tañca kho vatthupūjatthaṃ, dātabbaṃ na panaññathā;
tika-vin10t0:1424_0: Gilānānaṃ manussānaṃ, dātabbaṃ tu sakaṃ phalaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:1427_0: Saṅghārāme yathā yatra, saṅghena katikā katā;
tika-vin10t0:1440_0: Tathā ropāpane vuttaṃ, ubhayattha ca bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t0:1442_0: Sakiṃ āṇattiyā tassa, bahūnaṃ ropane pana;
tika-vin10t0:1443_0: Sadukkaṭā tu pācitti, suddhaṃ vā dukkaṭaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:1446_0: Ropane paribhogatthaṃ, na doso koci vijjati.
tika-vin10t0:1448_0: Kappiyabhūmi ce hoti, sayaṃ ropetumeva ca;
tika-vin10t0:1452_0: Vaṭṭateva ca bhikkhūnaṃ, taṃ phalaṃ paribhuñjituṃ.
tika-vin10t0:1454_0: Siñcane pana sabbattha, sayaṃ siñcāpanepi ca;
tika-vin10t0:1461_0: Siñcane dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, tathā siñcāpanepi ca.
tika-vin10t0:1469_0: Ganthimaṃ gopphimaṃ nāma, vedhimaṃ veṭhimampi ca;
tika-vin10t0:1472_0: Tattha daṇḍena daṇḍaṃ vā, vaṇṭenapi ca vaṇṭakaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:1481_0: Veṭhimaṃ nāma veṭhetvā, kataṃ mālāguṇehi vā;
tika-vin10t0:1490_0: Sabbametaṃ sayaṃ kātuṃ, kārāpetuṃ parehi vā;
tika-vin10t0:1494_0: Aññehi pūritaṃ puppha-paṭaṃ vā vāyitumpi ca.
tika-vin10t0:1497_0: Kharapattamayaṃ mālaṃ, sabbaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:1503_0: Pupphesuyeva vā pupphaṃ, pavesetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:1506_0: Pavesentassa pupphāni, na doso koci vijjati.
tika-vin10t0:1515_0: Atha kho vejjakammādi, na kattabbaṃ kudācanaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:1523_0: Jeṭṭhabhātā kaniṭṭho ca, tathā bhaginiyo duve;
tika-vin10t0:1526_0: Pitucchā mātulo cāti, dasime ñātayo matā;
tika-vin10t0:1529_0: Sace bhesajjametesaṃ, nappahoti na hoti vā;
tika-vin10t0:1530_0: Yācantipi ca taṃ bhikkhuṃ, dātabbaṃ tāvakālikaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:1532_0: Sace te na ca yācanti, dātabbaṃ tāvakālikaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:1533_0: Ābhogaṃ pana katvā vā, “dassanti puna me ime”.
tika-vin10t0:1535_0: Etesaṃ tu kulā yāva, sattamā kuladūsanaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:1539_0: Sace te ñātakā honti, kātuṃ tesampi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:1541_0: Aññātakā sace honti, bhātuno anujāya vā;
tika-vin10t0:1544_0: Atha tesampi puttānaṃ, katvā dātabbameva vā;
tika-vin10t0:1556_0: Jalaṃ hatthena cāletvā, madditvā pana suttakaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:1558_0: Dātabbaṃ bhikkhunā katvā, tesameva ca santakaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:1559_0: Attano udakaṃ tesaṃ, suttaṃ vā deti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:1568_0: Ṭhapetvā taṃ panaññassa, pitunopi na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:1571_0: Satthunā dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, karontassa pade pade.
tika-vin10t0:1577_0: Pañcannaṃ sahadhammīnaṃ, na ca vaṭṭati bhuñjituṃ.
tika-vin10t0:1612_0: Kammavācā hi kātabbā, dātabbo tassa tena ca.
tika-vin10t0:1618_0: Chedaṃ vā vattabhedaṃ vā, akatvāva sadā vase.
tika-vin10t0:1620_0: Parivāso visodhetuṃ, na sakkā tattha ce pana;
tika-vin10t0:1621_0: Nikkhipitvāna taṃ vattaṃ, vatthabbaṃ tena bhikkhunā.
tika-vin10t0:1623_0: Tattheva saṅghamajjhe vā, puggale vāpi nikkhipe;
tika-vin10t0:1624_0: Nikkhipāmīti vattaṃ vā, parivāsanti vā tathā.
tika-vin10t0:1636_0: Gumbena vatiyā vāpi, channaṭṭhāne ṭhitena tu.
tika-vin10t0:1641_0: Nikkhipitvā tato vattaṃ, gantabbaṃ tu yathāsukhaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:1642_0: Antoyevāruṇe bhikkhu, gato ce yassa kassaci.
tika-vin10t0:1644_0: Ārocetvāva taṃ vattaṃ, nikkhipe puna paṇḍito;
tika-vin10t0:1654_0: Ekaccaṃ sakalaṃ vāpi, dātabbo vimatissa vā.
tika-vin10t0:1668_0: Tathā sambahulāsvekā, dve vā sambahulāpi vā;
tika-vin10t0:1669_0: Yā yā cirapaṭicchannā, tāsaṃ agghavasena hi.
tika-vin10t0:1675_0: Sabbātā ekato katvā, dātabbo missako mato.
tika-vin10t0:1680_0: Tattha yā apaṭicchannā, hoti āpatti yassa tu;
tika-vin10t0:1692_0: Nikkhipe santike tesaṃ, vattaṃ tesu gatesu vā;
tika-vin10t0:1704_0: Chādetvā vāpi āpattiṃ, acchādetvāpi vā pana;
tika-vin10t0:1717_0: Payoge ca payoge ca, hoti sabbattha dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:1724_0: Na karoti anāpattiṃ, itthīnaṃ tu satampi ca.
tika-vin10t0:1736_0: Anandhābadhiro viññū, itthī vā purisopi vā;
tika-vin10t0:1739_0: Andho abadhiro vāpi, badhiro vāpi cakkhumā;
tika-vin10t0:1746_0: Cīvaraṃ chabbidhaṃ vuttaṃ, jātito pana kappiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:1754_0: Ekāhampi vinā bhikkhu, na vaseyya ticīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t0:1757_0: Rajitvā kappiyaṃ binduṃ, datvā tattha ticīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t0:1761_0: Muṭṭhittikā ca tiriyaṃ, uttamantena sā pana.
tika-vin10t0:1777_0: Tīṇipi dvepi cekaṃ vā, chinditabbaṃ pahoti ce;
tika-vin10t0:1781_0: Bhikkhuno dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, dubbhogena ca sevato.
tika-vin10t0:1798_0: Eko tantupi acchinno, adhiṭṭhānaṃ na bhindati;
tika-vin10t0:1801_0: Paṭhamaṃ aggaḷaṃ datvā, pacchā chindati rakkhati;
tika-vin10t0:1802_0: Ghaṭetvā koṭiyo dve vā, pacchā chindati rakkhati.
tika-vin10t0:1831_0: Gaṇanaṃ vā pamāṇaṃ vā, na parikkhāracoḷake;
tika-vin10t0:1844_0: Puna paccuddharitvā taṃ, vikappeyya tato paraṃ.
tika-vin10t0:1846_0: Tāva kaṇḍuppaṭicchādiṃ, yāva rogo na sammati;
tika-vin10t0:1877_0: Vuttattā ca nisedhetuṃ, na sakkā vinayaññunā.
tika-vin10t0:1886_0: Dukkaṭaṃ tiriṭe vāpi, veṭhane kañcukepi ca.
tika-vin10t0:1904_0: Bhikkhuno pana tenassa, vippavatthuṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t0:1908_0: Aruṇe uṭṭhite kiṃ nu, kātabbaṃ tena bhikkhunā.
tika-vin10t0:1911_0: Tabbhayā pana so bhikkhu, naggo gacchati dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:1914_0: Na tassākappiyaṃ nāma, cīvaraṃ atthi kiñcipi.
tika-vin10t0:1916_0: Nigāsetvā gahetvā ca, gantvā bhikkhussa santikaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:1920_0: Payoge ca payoge ca, hoti pārupanādisu.
tika-vin10t0:1925_0: There ca dahare maggaṃ, gacchantesu ubhosupi;
tika-vin10t0:1929_0: Hoti nissaggiyaṃ vatthaṃ, na passambhati nissayo.
tika-vin10t0:1932_0: Hoti nissaggiyaṃ vatthaṃ, passambhati ca nissayo.
tika-vin10t0:1935_0: Hoti nissaggiyaṃ vatthaṃ, passambhati ca nissayo.
tika-vin10t0:1945_0: Paccāsāya tato uddhaṃ, ṭhapetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:1953_0: Bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā bhuttaṃ, vatthaṃ aññātikāya yo;
tika-vin10t0:1957_0: Tathā sesehi ca dvīhi, dīpitaṃ dukkaṭadvayaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:1959_0: Sikkhamānāya vā hatthe, dhovanatthāya deti ce;
tika-vin10t0:1960_0: Sā hutvā upasampannā, pacchā dhovati so nayo.
tika-vin10t0:1969_0: Parivatte tu liṅgasmiṃ, sace dhovati vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:1971_0: “Dhovā”ti bhikkhunī vuttā, sace sabbaṃ karoti sā;
tika-vin10t0:1981_0: Tāya dhovāpane vāpi, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:1983_0: Avuttā paribhuttaṃ vā, aññaṃ vā yadi dhovati;
tika-vin10t0:2002_0: Aññaṃ pana parikkhāraṃ, na doso hoti gaṇhato;
tika-vin10t0:2013_0: Aññassatthāya vā tassa, ñātake vā pavārite.
tika-vin10t0:2022_0: Yassa tīṇipi naṭṭhāni, dve vā ekampi vā pana;
tika-vin10t0:2023_0: Dve vā ekampi vā tena, sāditabbaṃ na kiñcipi.
tika-vin10t0:2033_0: Cīvare pana yo tassa, lābhā nissaggiyaṃ bhave.
tika-vin10t0:2047_0: Akappiyaṃ suvaṇṇādiṃ, gahetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:2049_0: Rajataṃ jātarūpaṃ vā, attano vā parassa vā;
tika-vin10t0:2050_0: Atthāya gaṇhituṃ kiñci, dīyamānaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:2055_0: Netvā akappiyaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ, itthaṃ koci sace vade;
tika-vin10t0:2058_0: Ārāmaṃ vā vihāraṃ vā, cetiyaṃ vā karohi”ti;
tika-vin10t0:2059_0: Na ca vaṭṭati taṃ vatthuṃ, sabbesaṃ sampaṭicchituṃ.
tika-vin10t0:2061_0: Anāmasitvā saṅghaṃ vā, gaṇaṃ vā puggalampi vā;
tika-vin10t0:2064_0: Taṃ hiraññaṃ suvaṇṇaṃ vā, nisedhetuṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t0:2071_0: Gahaṇaṃ paribhogo vā, na ca vaṭṭati bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t0:2074_0: Iccevaṃ pana vatvā ce, deti sabbampi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:2076_0: Kārāpeti ca kedāre, chindāpetvā vanaṃ pana;
tika-vin10t0:2080_0: Bhāgaṃ dethā”ti vatvā ce, uṭṭhāpeti kahāpaṇe.
tika-vin10t0:2089_0: Rajjuyā vāpi daṇḍena, khettaṃ mināti yo pana.
tika-vin10t0:2091_0: Khale vā rakkhati ṭhatvā, khalatopi tato puna;
tika-vin10t0:2098_0: Āharanti ca yaṃ vuttā, sabbesaṃ tamakappiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:2103_0: “Gāvo demā”ti vuttepi, gahetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t0:2107_0: Kappiyena ca vākyena, sabbaṃ vaṭṭati gaṇhituṃ.
tika-vin10t0:2109_0: Hatthiṃ vā mahisaṃ assaṃ, goṇaṃ kukkuṭasūkaraṃ;
tika-vin10t0:2110_0: Dentesu ca manussesu, na ca vaṭṭati gaṇhituṃ.
tika-vin10t0:2112_0: Paṭisiddhepi saṅghassa, datvā gacchati ce pana;
tika-vin10t0:2113_0: Mūlaṃ datvā ca saṅghassa, keci gaṇhanti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:2119_0: Yadi codetiyeva cha, codanā diguṇā ṭhiti.
tika-vin10t0:2130_0: Aññena ca kataṃ laddhā, sevamānassa dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:2140_0: Anāpatti tulaṃ vāpi, bahuṃ vā sabbameva vā;
tika-vin10t0:2147_0: Imesaṃ pana tiṇṇampi, tatiyaṃ tu kriyākriyaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:2150_0: Channaṃ orena vassānaṃ, karontassa ca santhataṃ;
tika-vin10t0:2154_0: Kataṃ vā pana aññena, labhitvā paribhuñjato.
tika-vin10t0:2170_0: Gacchante pana yāne vā, hatthiassādikesu vā;
tika-vin10t0:2176_0: Yāne pana agacchante, asse vā hatthipiṭṭhiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:2185_0: Suttakena ca bandhitvā, ṭhapitaṃ pana vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t0:2189_0: Yo caññavihito vāpi, āpatti yadi gacchati.
tika-vin10t0:2194_0: Nivāsatthāya vā gantvā, harantassa tato paraṃ;
tika-vin10t0:2195_0: Acchinnaṃ vāpi nissaṭṭhaṃ, labhitvā haratopi ca.
tika-vin10t0:2214_0: Muttā maṇi silā saṅkho, pavāḷaṃ lohitaṅkako;
tika-vin10t0:2221_0: Suttaṃ vatthaṃ halaṃ phālaṃ, kappiyaṃ evamādikaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:2224_0: Sampaṭicchati yo bhikkhu, tassa nissaggiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:2227_0: Dukkaṭassa ca vatthumpi, sabbatthāya ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:2235_0: “Idaṃ ayyassa hotū”ti, vutte vā pana kenaci;
tika-vin10t0:2238_0: Paṭikkhittepi taṃ vatthuṃ, ṭhapetvā yadi gacchati;
tika-vin10t0:2239_0: Tathā gopāyitabbaṃ taṃ, yathā taṃ na vinassati.
tika-vin10t0:2242_0: Iccevaṃ bhikkhuno vattuṃ, na vaṭṭati akappiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:2248_0: Gahetuṃ aññato laddhaṃ, bhuñjituṃ vā na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:2250_0: Yaṃ kiñci pana sambhūtaṃ, paccayaṃ vatthuto tato;
tika-vin10t0:2263_0: Vatthuṃ nissaggiyassāpi, vatthuṃ vā dukkaṭassa ca;
tika-vin10t0:2264_0: Kappiyassa ca vatthuṃ vā, yo nissaggiyavatthunā.
tika-vin10t0:2269_0: Dukkaṭassa ca vatthuṃ vā, vatthuṃ vā kappiyassa ca;
tika-vin10t0:2273_0: Parivatteti yo tassa, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:2279_0: Tena dve dukkaṭā honti, cetāpentassa rūpiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:2294_0: Tasmā mātāpitūnampi, vatthuṃ yaṃ kiñci kappiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:2297_0: Sakaṃ vā deti ce bhaṇḍaṃ, evaṃ vatvāna mātuyā;
tika-vin10t0:2298_0: Mātuyā vā tathā bhaṇḍaṃ, sayaṃ gaṇhāti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:2303_0: “Gahetvā vā idaṃ nāma, bhuñjitvā odanaṃ imaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:2304_0: Idaṃ nāma karohī”ti, vattuṃ pana na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:2307_0: Challiṃ vā pana valliṃ vā, kaṭṭhaṃ vā dārumeva vā.
tika-vin10t0:2320_0: Nissaggiye ca vatthumhi, naṭṭhe bhuttepi vā yathā;
tika-vin10t0:2326_0: “Idaṃ mamatthi attho me, iminā”ti ca bhāsato;
tika-vin10t0:2332_0: Tayo pattassa vaṇṇā tu, ukkaṭṭho majjhimomako.
tika-vin10t0:2337_0: Ukkaṭṭho nāma so patto, yo taṃ sabbaṃ tu gaṇhati;
tika-vin10t0:2338_0: Majjhimo tassupaḍḍho ca, tadupaḍḍho ca omako.
tika-vin10t0:2341_0: Evaṃ majjhimaomesu, nava pattā bhavanti hi.
tika-vin10t0:2344_0: Tasmā nāpi adhiṭṭhānaṃ, na gacchanti vikappanaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:2352_0: Yaṃ pattaṃ na vikappeti, yaṃ nādhiṭṭheti vā pana;
tika-vin10t0:2367_0: Yo hi nissaggiyaṃ pattaṃ, anissajjeva bhuñjati;
tika-vin10t0:2382_0: Yaṃ kiñci sodakaṃ pattaṃ, paṭisāmeyya dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:2385_0: Bhikkhuno sodakaṃ pattaṃ, otāpetuṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t0:2388_0: Miḍḍhante paribhaṇḍante, ṭhapetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t0:2389_0: Miḍḍhiyā paribhaṇḍe vā, vitthiṇṇe pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:2400_0: Daṇḍe vā nāgadante vā, laggetumpi na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t0:2407_0: Bhattapūropi vā chatte, ṭhapetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:2410_0: Kavāṭaṃ na paṇāmeyya, pattahattho sace pana;
tika-vin10t0:2416_0: Pattaṃ paṭiggahaṃ katvā, dhovituṃ hatthameva vā;
tika-vin10t0:2417_0: Mukhato nīhaṭaṃ patte, ṭhapetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:2419_0: Anāpatti dasāhassa, antoyeva ca yo pana;
tika-vin10t0:2426_0: Pañcabandhanaūnasmiṃ, patte sati ca yo pana;
tika-vin10t0:2427_0: Viññāpeyya navaṃ pattaṃ, tassa nissaggiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:2432_0: Pañca vā rājiyo yassa, ekā vāpi dasaṅgulā;
tika-vin10t0:2433_0: Apatto nāmayaṃ patto, viññāpeyya tato paraṃ.
tika-vin10t0:2436_0: Baddho vaṭṭati maṭṭho ce, ayocuṇṇena vāṇiyā.
tika-vin10t0:2438_0: Pattaṃ saṅghassa nissaṭṭhaṃ, tassa nissaggiyaṃ pana;
tika-vin10t0:2441_0: Dīyamāne tu pattasmiṃ, yassa so na ca ruccati;
tika-vin10t0:2442_0: Appicchatāya vā pattaṃ, taṃ na gaṇhāti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:2449_0: Sace so taṃ jigucchanto, appadese ṭhapeti vā;
tika-vin10t0:2452_0: Naṭṭhe bhinnepi vā patte, anāpatti pakāsitā;
tika-vin10t0:2453_0: Attano ñātakādīnaṃ, gaṇhato vā dhanena vā.
tika-vin10t0:2462_0: Tato paṭṭhāya sattāhaṃ, taṃ vaṭṭati nirāmisaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:2469_0: Sarīrabhoge netabbaṃ, sāyituṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:2474_0: Sayaṃ tāpeti ce bhikkhu, sattāhampi nirāmisaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:2475_0: Tāpanaṃ navanītassa, sāmapāko na hoti so.
tika-vin10t0:2477_0: Pacchābhattaṃ gahetvā ce, yena kenaci tāpitaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:2478_0: Vaṭṭateva ca taṃ sappi, sattāhampi nirāmisaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:2485_0: Pacchābhattakato uddhaṃ, taṃ na vaṭṭati sāyituṃ;
tika-vin10t0:2495_0: Khīraṃ dadhi ca sappi ca, navanītañca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:2497_0: “Yesaṃ kappati maṃsañhi, tesaṃ sappī”ti kiṃ idaṃ?
tika-vin10t0:2507_0: Telaṃ vā navanītaṃ vā, sappiṃ vā ākiranti hi.
tika-vin10t0:2509_0: Bhattasitthāni vā tattha, taṇḍulā vā bhavanti ce;
tika-vin10t0:2524_0: Attanā yaṃ kataṃ telaṃ, taṃ vaṭṭati nirāmisaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:2540_0: Vasānaṃ pana pañcannaṃ, telaṃ pañcavidhaṃ bhave.
tika-vin10t0:2548_0: Sace anupasampanno, katvā taṃ deti vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t0:2551_0: Paṭiggahetuṃ kātuṃ vā, pacchābhattaṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t0:2563_0: Phāṇitaṃ tu purebhattaṃ, gahitaṃ pana vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t0:2570_0: Pacchābhattakato uddhaṃ, taṃ na vaṭṭati sāyituṃ.
tika-vin10t0:2573_0: Hoti tassa anāpatti, pacchābhattaṃ katepi ca.
tika-vin10t0:2576_0: Tadahe deti ce katvā, sāmisampi ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:2585_0: Pakkhipitvā kataṃ khīraṃ, hoti taṃ yāvakālikaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:2593_0: Labhitvā pana nissaṭṭhaṃ, taṃ tu sattāhakālikaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:2594_0: Aruādīni makkhetuṃ, sāyituṃ vā na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:2596_0: Aññassa pana bhikkhussa, kāyabhoge ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t0:2613_0: Tesuyeva ca viññattiṃ, katvā nipphādane tathā.
tika-vin10t0:2621_0: Ovassāpeti ce kāyaṃ, naggo satipi cīvare;
tika-vin10t0:2634_0: Sāmaṃ tu cīvaraṃ datvā, acchindantassa taṃ puna;
tika-vin10t0:2646_0: Āṇāpeti sace aññaṃ, bhikkhuṃ gaṇhāti cīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t0:2650_0: Ekāyassa ca vācāya, honti āpattiyo bahū.
tika-vin10t0:2664_0: So vā deti sace tuṭṭho, duṭṭho vissāsameva vā;
tika-vin10t0:2681_0: Vīte nissaggiyaṃ vuttaṃ, phalake phalakepi ca.
tika-vin10t0:2692_0: Sace akappiyaṃ suttaṃ, vāreneva vinanti te;
tika-vin10t0:2698_0: Dvepi vemaṃ gahetvā vā, ekato vā vinanti ce;
tika-vin10t0:2712_0: Vikappaṃ cīvare bhikkhu, āpajjati na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:2728_0: Vassacchedo na kātabbo, saṅghikaṃ taṃ karoti ce.
tika-vin10t0:2736_0: Atthate kathine tassa, pañca māsā pakāsitā;
tika-vin10t0:2744_0: Ṭhapetvā cīvaraṃ gāme, paccaye sati tādise.
tika-vin10t0:2747_0: Uttariṃ vasato doso, vinā saṅghassa sammutiṃ.
tika-vin10t0:2755_0: Yaṃ gāmaṃ gocaraṃ katvā, bhikkhu āraññake vase;
tika-vin10t0:2756_0: Tasmiṃ gāme ṭhapetuṃ taṃ, māsamekaṃ tu vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:2764_0: Gāmasīmampi vā gantvā, vasitvā yattha katthaci;
tika-vin10t0:2765_0: Cīvarassa pavattiṃ so, ñatvā gacchati vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:2768_0: Khippaṃ paccuddhare ṭhāne, atireke hi tiṭṭhati.
tika-vin10t0:2777_0: Jānaṃ pariṇataṃ lābhaṃ, bhikkhusaṅghassa yo pana;
tika-vin10t0:2783_0: Cīvaraṃ vā parasseka-mekaṃ vā pana attano;
tika-vin10t0:2784_0: Pariṇāmeyya ce saddhiṃ, dve pācittiyo siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t0:2786_0: Saṅghassa pana yaṃ dinnaṃ, taṃ gahetuṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t0:2789_0: Cetiyassa ca saṅghassa, puggalassapi vā pana;
tika-vin10t0:2815_0: Bhūtena vā abhūtena, yena kenaci vatthunā.
tika-vin10t0:2817_0: Yāya kāyaci bhāsāya, hatthamuddāya vā pana;
tika-vin10t0:2845_0: Na ceva piyakāmassa, na ca bhedatthinopi vā;
tika-vin10t0:2853_0: Dhammaṃ saha bhaṇantassa, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:2858_0: Dukkaṭaṃ hoti bhikkhusmiṃ, tathā bhikkhuniyāpi ca;
tika-vin10t0:2861_0: Ekato uddisāpeti, sajjhāyaṃ vā karoti yo;
tika-vin10t0:2862_0: Bhaṇantaṃ paguṇaṃ ganthaṃ, opāteti ca yo pana.
tika-vin10t0:2865_0: Uddesaṃ tu anāpatti, bhaṇane tena ekato.
tika-vin10t0:2874_0: Tissannaṃ pana rattīnaṃ, uddhaṃ yo pana rattiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:2875_0: Ṭhapetvā bhikkhuṃ aññena, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:2877_0: Vatthuṃ yaṃ pana niddiṭṭhaṃ, methunassa pahonakaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:2881_0: Itarasmiṃ nipanne vā, sace bhikkhu nipajjati.
tika-vin10t0:2886_0: Sace pidhāya vā gabbhaṃ, nipajjatipidhāya vā;
tika-vin10t0:2901_0: Anāpatti dirattaṃ vā, tirattaṃ vasato saha;
tika-vin10t0:2915_0: Rattiyaṃ yo nipajjeyya, deviyā paṇḍakena vā.
tika-vin10t0:2925_0: Vinā dhammaṃ bhaṇantassa, hoti pācitti itthiyā.
tika-vin10t0:2930_0: Channaṃ upari vācānaṃ, padādīnaṃ vasā pana;
tika-vin10t0:2936_0: Ṭhitassa mātugāmassa, dhammaṃ yo pana bhāsati;
tika-vin10t0:2937_0: Channaṃ upari vācānaṃ, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:2940_0: Uttari chahi vācāhi, vadato hoti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:2945_0: Purise sati viññusmiṃ, sayaṃ uṭṭhāya vā puna;
tika-vin10t0:2948_0: Aññissā puna aññissā, itthiyā bhaṇatopi ca;
tika-vin10t0:2956_0: Ṭhapetvā bhikkhuniṃ bhikkhuṃ, bhūte pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:2958_0: No ce jānāti so vuttaṃ, ārocentassa bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t0:2967_0: Kāyato vācato kāya-vācato ca tidhā siyā;
tika-vin10t0:2978_0: Tasmā suddhassa duṭṭhullaṃ, vadaṃ pācittiyaṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t0:2986_0: Vatthuṃ vā pana āpattiṃ, ārocentassa kevalaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:2993_0: Khaṇeyya vā khaṇāpeyya, pathaviṃ yo akappiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:2994_0: Bhedāpeyya ca bhindeyya, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:3003_0: Iccevaṃ tu vadantassa, koci doso na vijjati.
tika-vin10t0:3005_0: “Imaṃ khaṇa ca okāsaṃ, idha pokkharaṇiṃ khaṇa;
tika-vin10t0:3006_0: Imasmiṃ khaṇa okāse”, vattumevaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:3008_0: “Kandaṃ khaṇa kurundaṃ vā, thūṇaṃ khaṇa ca khāṇukaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:3009_0: Mūlaṃ khaṇa ca tālaṃ vā”, evaṃ vadati vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:3011_0: “Imaṃ mūlaṃ imaṃ valliṃ, imaṃ tālaṃ imaṃ naḷaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:3012_0: Khaṇā”ti niyametvāna, vattuṃ pana na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:3015_0: Bhikkhunā apanetabbo, bahalaṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:3020_0: Sace patati toyasmiṃ, deve vuṭṭhepi vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t0:3023_0: Pāsāṇapiṭṭhiyaṃ soṇḍiṃ, khaṇanti yadi tattha tu;
tika-vin10t0:3024_0: Rajaṃ patati ce pubbaṃ, pacchā devobhivassati.
tika-vin10t0:3029_0: Vārinā paṭhamaṃ puṇṇe, pacchā patati ce rajaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:3030_0: Taṃ vaṭṭati vikopetuṃ, toye devo hi vassati.
tika-vin10t0:3038_0: Abbhokāse sace vaṭṭho, cātumāsaṃ tu vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t0:3057_0: Anovaṭṭho ca bhikkhūnaṃ, sabbadā hoti kappiyo.
tika-vin10t0:3059_0: Vuṭṭhe puna ca gehasmiṃ, gehaṃ chādenti taṃ sace;
tika-vin10t0:3062_0: Yattakaṃ tattha tintaṃ tu, tattakaṃ hotyakappiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:3063_0: Atintaṃ tattha yaṃ yaṃ tu, taṃ taṃ hoti hi kappiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:3065_0: Temito vārinā so ce, ekābaddhova bhūmiyā;
tika-vin10t0:3066_0: Pathavī ceva sā jātā, na vaṭṭati tato paraṃ.
tika-vin10t0:3071_0: Tattha laggaṃ rajaṃ saṇhaṃ, aghaṃsantova mattaso;
tika-vin10t0:3075_0: Ṭhāne tiṭṭhati so tasmā, vikopeyya yathāsukhaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:3077_0: Abbhokāse ṭhitaṃ thambhaṃ, cāletvā panito cito;
tika-vin10t0:3078_0: Pathaviṃ tu vikopetvā, gahetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:3080_0: Aññampi sukkharukkhaṃ vā, khāṇukaṃ vāpi gaṇhato;
tika-vin10t0:3081_0: Ayameva nayo doso, ujumuddharato na ca.
tika-vin10t0:3083_0: Pāsāṇaṃ yadi vā rukkhaṃ, uccāletvā pavaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t0:3084_0: Na doso suddhacittassa, sace pathavi bhijjati.
tika-vin10t0:3089_0: Kaṇṭakaṃ sūcimaṭṭhiṃ vā, khilaṃ vā bhūmiyaṃ pana;
tika-vin10t0:3090_0: Ākoṭetuṃ pavesetuṃ, bhikkhuno na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:3093_0: Bhikkhussa pana passāva-mevaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:3096_0: Samajjato samaṃ kātuṃ, ghaṃsituṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:3098_0: Pādaṅguṭṭhena vā bhūmiṃ, likhitumpi na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t0:3099_0: Bhindantena ca pādehi, tathā caṅkamitumpi vā.
tika-vin10t0:3102_0: Aghaṃsanto gahetvā ce, hatthaṃ dhovati vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:3104_0: Sayaṃ dahati ce bhūmiṃ, dahāpeti parehi vā;
tika-vin10t0:3107_0: Ṭhānesu yattakesvaggiṃ, deti dāpeti vā pana;
tika-vin10t0:3110_0: Ṭhapetuṃ bhikkhuno aggiṃ, bhūmiyaṃ na ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t0:3113_0: Aggiṃ upari dārūnaṃ, ṭhapetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t0:3114_0: Dahanto tāni gantvā so, bhūmiṃ dahati ce pana.
tika-vin10t0:3120_0: Khāṇuke sukkharukkhe vā, aggiṃ dātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:3122_0: Anāpatti tiṇukkaṃ tu, gahetvā pana gacchato;
tika-vin10t0:3123_0: Ḍayhamāne tu hatthasmiṃ, sace pāteti bhūmiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:3125_0: Puna taṃ patitaṭṭhāne, datvā tassa panindhanaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:3139_0: Udakaṭṭho thalaṭṭhoti, duvidho hoti so pana;
tika-vin10t0:3143_0: Vikopentassa taṃ sabbaṃ, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:3145_0: Viyūhitvā tu hatthena, nhāyituṃ pana vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t0:3146_0: Hoti tassa ca sabbampi, ṭhānañhi sakalaṃ jalaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:3148_0: Udakena vinā cecca, taṃ panuddharituṃ jalā;
tika-vin10t0:3149_0: Na ca vaṭṭati bhikkhussa, ṭhānasaṅkamanañhi taṃ.
tika-vin10t0:3155_0: Vikopentassa vā tattha, hoti pācitti bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t0:3158_0: Gacchanti hi yato tāni, bījagāmena saṅgahaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:3164_0: Tasmā tassa kato hoti, bījagāmena saṅgaho.
tika-vin10t0:3167_0: Aphalitāya yo khāṇu, bhūtagāmena so mato.
tika-vin10t0:3169_0: Phalitā kadalī yāva, nīlapaṇṇā ca tāva sā;
tika-vin10t0:3172_0: Aggato pana paṭṭhāya, yadāyaṃ veḷu sussati;
tika-vin10t0:3181_0: Mūlamattepi vā yesaṃ, paṇṇamattepi vā pana;
tika-vin10t0:3185_0: Pattavaṭṭi yadā nīlā, niggacchati tadā na ca.
tika-vin10t0:3198_0: Vandākā vāpi aññaṃ vā, rukkhe jāyati yaṃ pana.
tika-vin10t0:3200_0: Rukkhovassa siyā ṭhānaṃ, vikopetuṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t0:3204_0: Yāva dve tīṇi pattāni, na sañjāyanti tāva so.
tika-vin10t0:3206_0: Pattesu pana jātesu, vatthu pācittiyassa so;
tika-vin10t0:3207_0: Ghaṃsitvā pana taṃ tasmā, apanetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:3216_0: Sace taṃ makuḷaṃ hoti, hoti dukkaṭavatthukaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:3218_0: Rukkhe tacaṃ vikopetvā, tathā pappaṭikampi ca;
tika-vin10t0:3219_0: Niyyāsampi panallasmiṃ, gahetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:3224_0: Pupphaṃ paṇḍupalāsaṃ vā, phalaṃ vā pakkameva vā;
tika-vin10t0:3227_0: Nāmetvā phaliniṃ sākhaṃ, dātuṃ vaṭṭati gaṇhato;
tika-vin10t0:3228_0: Sayaṃ khāditukāmo ce, dātumevaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:3233_0: Yesaṃ ruhati rukkhānaṃ, sākhā tesampi sākhinaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:3239_0: “Rukkhaṃ chinda lataṃ chinda, kandaṃ mūlampi uddhara;
tika-vin10t0:3242_0: “Ambaṃ jambumpi nimbaṃ vā, chinda bhinduddharā”ti vā;
tika-vin10t0:3245_0: “Imaṃ rukkhaṃ imaṃ valliṃ, imaṃ challiṃ imaṃ lataṃ;
tika-vin10t0:3246_0: Chinda bhindā”ti vā vattuṃ, niyametvā na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:3249_0: Sabbameva kataṃ hoti, ekasmiṃ kappiye kate.
tika-vin10t0:3251_0: Ekato pana baddhāni, ucchudārūni honti ce;
tika-vin10t0:3252_0: Kappiyaṃ karonto pana, dāruṃ vijjhati vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:3254_0: Valliyā rajjuyā vāpi, yāya baddhāni tāni hi;
tika-vin10t0:3255_0: Bhājanena samānattā, taṃ vijjhati na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:3263_0: Kaṭāhaṃ yadi muñcitvā, anto carati miñjakaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:3264_0: Bhindāpetvā kapitthaṃ taṃ, kāretabbaṃ tu kappiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:3280_0: Kamme aropite cevaṃ, vadantassa ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:3299_0: Vadato dukkaṭaṃ hoti, yassa kassaci santike.
tika-vin10t0:3305_0: Ajjhokāse tu mañcādiṃ, attano vā parassa vā;
tika-vin10t0:3308_0: Nevuddhareyya saṅghassa, uddharāpeyya vā na taṃ;
tika-vin10t0:3309_0: Pakkamanto sace tassa, hoti pācitti bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t0:3311_0: Vassike caturo māse, sace devo na vassati;
tika-vin10t0:3312_0: Ajjhokāse tathā cāpi, ṭhapetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:3314_0: Yattha vassati hemante, cattāro aparepi ca;
tika-vin10t0:3315_0: Ṭhapetuṃ tattha mañcādiṃ, aṭṭha māse na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:3318_0: Mañcādiṃ pana saṅghassa, ṭhapetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:3320_0: Aññassatthāya yaṃ kiñci, santhataṃ yadi saṅghikaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:3321_0: Yattha katthaci vā ṭhāne, yena kenaci bhikkhunā.
tika-vin10t0:3323_0: Yāva so na nisīdeyya, “gacchā”ti na vadeyya vā;
tika-vin10t0:3329_0: Santhataṃ bhikkhunā taṃ ce, bhāro tasseva tāva taṃ;
tika-vin10t0:3330_0: Yāva āṇāpako tattha, āgantvā na nisīdati.
tika-vin10t0:3341_0: Nikkhamitvā sace tasmā, ṭhānā aññattha gacchati;
tika-vin10t0:3351_0: Abbhokāse ṭhapetvā taṃ, gacchato hoti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:3353_0: Sace āraññakenāpi, anovasse ca no sati;
tika-vin10t0:3354_0: Laggetvā pana rukkhasmiṃ, gantabbaṃ tu yathāsukhaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:3356_0: Yathā upacikādīhi, na khajjati na lujjati;
tika-vin10t0:3357_0: Tathā katvāpi taṃ sabbaṃ, gantuṃ pana ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:3372_0: Etaṃ dasavidhaṃ seyyaṃ, santharitvāpi vā sayaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:3376_0: Paṭhame dukkaṭaṃ pāde, pācitti dutiye siyā.
tika-vin10t0:3390_0: Sāpekkhova ca gantvā taṃ, tattha ṭhatvāpi pucchati;
tika-vin10t0:3394_0: Yo pubbupagataṃ bhikkhuṃ, jānaṃ anupakhajja ca;
tika-vin10t0:3398_0: Yāva taṃ mañcapīṭhaṃ vā, nikkhamantassa vā pana.
tika-vin10t0:3406_0: Nisīdantassa vā tattha, nipajjantassa vā pana;
tika-vin10t0:3416_0: Sabbattha dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, nivāso ca nivārito.
tika-vin10t0:3425_0: Vihārā saṅghikā bhikkhuṃ, nikkaḍḍheyya sace pana;
tika-vin10t0:3426_0: Nikkaḍḍhāpeyya vā kuddho, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:3429_0: Nikkaḍḍheti sace tassa, ekā pācitti dīpitā.
tika-vin10t0:3431_0: Ṭhapetvā ca ṭhapetvā ca, nikkaḍḍhantassa antarā;
tika-vin10t0:3437_0: Sace so sakimāṇatto, dvārepi bahuke pana;
tika-vin10t0:3441_0: Kāyenapi ca vācāya, tathā nikkaḍḍhanepi ca.
tika-vin10t0:3460_0: Āhaccapādake mañce, pīṭhe vā pana bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t0:3462_0: Nisīdantassa vā tasmiṃ, nipajjantassa vā pana;
tika-vin10t0:3466_0: Heṭṭhā aparibhoge vā, sīsaghaṭṭāya vā pana.
tika-vin10t0:3471_0: Yattha paṭāṇi vā dinnā, tattha ṭhatvā lageti vā;
tika-vin10t0:3481_0: Adhiṭṭheyyaṃ tato uddhaṃ, adhiṭṭheti sace pana;
tika-vin10t0:3482_0: Tassa pācittiyaṃ hoti, dukkaṭaṃ tattha tiṭṭhato.
tika-vin10t0:3485_0: Yasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhitaṃ bhikkhuṃ, olokento na passati.
tika-vin10t0:3487_0: Tasmiṃ ṭhāne pana ṭhātuṃ, neva bhikkhussa vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t0:3493_0: Na doso dvattipariyāye, leṇe tiṇakuṭīsu vā;
tika-vin10t0:3497_0: Jānaṃ sappāṇakaṃ toyaṃ, tiṇaṃ vā mattikampi vā;
tika-vin10t0:3498_0: Yadi siñceyya pācitti, siñcāpeyya parehi vā.
tika-vin10t0:3500_0: Acchinditvā sace dhāraṃ, mattikaṃ siñcato pana;
tika-vin10t0:3506_0: Ekāva ce siyāpatti, divasampi ca sandatu;
tika-vin10t0:3513_0: Khayaṃ vā āvilattaṃ vā, jalaṃ gacchati tādise.
tika-vin10t0:3541_0: Osārentova te dhamme, ovadeyya sace pana;
tika-vin10t0:3557_0: Ṭhapetvā dukkaṭaṃ bālaṃ, gilānaṃ gamikaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:3559_0: Adhamme pana kammasmiṃ, adhammanti ca saññino;
tika-vin10t0:3563_0: Nava pācittiyo vuttā, samaggepi ca tattakā.
tika-vin10t0:3565_0: Navakānaṃ vasā dvinnaṃ, aṭṭhārasa bhavanti tā;
tika-vin10t0:3568_0: “Osārehī”ti vutto vā, pañhaṃ puṭṭho katheti vā;
tika-vin10t0:3584_0: Catūsvapi nikāyesu, eko vā potthakopi ca.
tika-vin10t0:3616_0: Atthaṅgate ca sūriye, sace vadati tīṇipi.
tika-vin10t0:3635_0: Vadato sammate bhikkhu, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:3647_0: Sace bhikkhuniyā bhikkhu, dadeyya pana cīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t0:3653_0: Tattha bhikkhuniyā dinnaṃ, cīvaraṃ idha bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t0:3657_0: Cīvaraṃ yo hi sibbeyya, sibbāpeyya parena vā;
tika-vin10t0:3660_0: Yaṃ vā nivāsituṃ sakkā, yaṃ vā pārupanūpagaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:3663_0: Sayaṃ sūciṃ pavesetvā, sibbantassa ca bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t0:3667_0: Ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ vuttaṃ, payogassa vasā bahū.
tika-vin10t0:3670_0: Niṭṭhāpeti sace sabbaṃ, ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:3672_0: “Yamettha cīvare kammaṃ, bhāro sabbaṃ tavā”ti hi;
tika-vin10t0:3673_0: Āṇatto bhikkhunā sabbaṃ, niṭṭhāpeti sace pana.
tika-vin10t0:3679_0: Kā hi nāma kathā atthi? Tikapācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:3692_0: Paṭipajjeyya maggaṃ ce, aññatra samayā idha.
tika-vin10t0:3695_0: Agāmake araññe vā, hoti āpatti bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t0:3737_0: Tathā saṃvidahitvā vā, tiriyaṃ taraṇāya vā;
tika-vin10t0:3744_0: Bhojanaṃ pañcadhā vuttaṃ, gahaṇe tassa dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:3756_0: Aññaṃ vā pana yaṃ kiñci, ṭhapetvā pañcabhojanaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:3772_0: Bhuñjitabbaṃ sakiṃ tattha, tato uddhaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:3774_0: Dutiye divase tattha, gahaṇe dukkaṭaṃ mataṃ;
tika-vin10t0:3780_0: Nānāṭṭhānesu paññatto, yo ca, nānākulehi vā;
tika-vin10t0:3781_0: Bhuñjato pana sabbattha, na doso paṭipāṭiyā.
tika-vin10t0:3784_0: Ādito pana paṭṭhāya, na ca kappati bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t0:3787_0: Odissapi ca paññatte, paritte bhuñjato sakiṃ.
tika-vin10t0:3794_0: Gaṇoti pana niddiṭṭhā, cattāro vā tatuttariṃ.
tika-vin10t0:3796_0: Yaṃ nimantanato vāpi, laddhaṃ viññattitopi vā;
tika-vin10t0:3797_0: Bhojanaṃ pana pañcannaṃ, hoti aññataraṃ idha.
tika-vin10t0:3800_0: Nimanteti sace bhikkhū, cattāro bahukepi vā.
tika-vin10t0:3805_0: Tato tassa ca te bhikkhū, sādiyitvā nimantanaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:3806_0: Ekato nānato vā ce, gantvā gaṇhanti ekato.
tika-vin10t0:3811_0: Ekato nānato vāpi, gamanaṃ bhojanampi vā;
tika-vin10t0:3812_0: Kāraṇanti na taṃ viññū, bhaṇanti gaṇabhojane.
tika-vin10t0:3817_0: Nānato vekato gantvā, sace gaṇhanti ekato;
tika-vin10t0:3824_0: Gahetvā ekato dvinnaṃ, tiṇṇaṃ vā bhuñjataṃ tathā.
tika-vin10t0:3833_0: Nattheva ca visaṅketaṃ, yāguādīsu taṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:3853_0: Bhojanānaṃ tu pañcannaṃ, yena kena nimantito;
tika-vin10t0:3854_0: Taṃ ṭhapetvā sace aññaṃ, bhojanaṃ paribhuñjati.
tika-vin10t0:3859_0: Yattha khīraṃ rasaṃ vāpi, ākiranti sace pana;
tika-vin10t0:3869_0: Nimantitassa vā nicca-bhatte doso na vijjati.
tika-vin10t0:3876_0: Pātheyyatthāya manthā vā, ye hi tattha ca bhikkhunā.
tika-vin10t0:3879_0: Tato ce uttariṃ tassa, hoti pācitti gaṇhato.
tika-vin10t0:3882_0: Gahitā pana pūvā”ti, bhikkhuṃ disvā vade budho.
tika-vin10t0:3885_0: Gaṇhatopi ca taṃ sutvā, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:3890_0: Yena tattha tayo laddhā, pattapūrā tato pana;
tika-vin10t0:3891_0: Dve saṅghassa padātabbā, dve ce eko, na ekato.
tika-vin10t0:3906_0: Odano sattu kummāso, maccho maṃsanti sabbaso;
tika-vin10t0:3909_0: Odano tattha sattannaṃ, dhaññānaṃ odano mato;
tika-vin10t0:3915_0: Sāli vīhi yavo kaṅgu, varako godhumo tathā;
tika-vin10t0:3921_0: Sattannaṃ pana dhaññānaṃ, odano yāgu vā pana;
tika-vin10t0:3924_0: Hatthena gahitokāse, odhiṃ dasseti yā pana;
tika-vin10t0:3927_0: Abbhuṇhā pana yā yāgu, uddhanoropitā tanu;
tika-vin10t0:3928_0: Sace odhiṃ na dasseti, na janeti pavāraṇaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:3930_0: Puna sā sītalībhūtā, ghanabhāvaṃ gatā sace;
tika-vin10t0:3931_0: Odhiṃ dasseti so pubbe, tanubhāvo na rakkhati.
tika-vin10t0:3937_0: Odhiṃ pana ca dasseti, sañjaneti pavāraṇaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:3940_0: “Yāguṃ gaṇhatha, yāgu”nti, vatvā denti sace pana.
tika-vin10t0:3943_0: Taṃ pacitvā sace denti, yāgusaṅgahitā pana.
tika-vin10t0:3954_0: Puthukā vā tato tāhi, katabhattampi sattupi;
tika-vin10t0:3955_0: Suddhā na pana pūvā vā, pavārenti kadācipi.
tika-vin10t0:3958_0: Koṭṭetvā denti taṃ cuṇṇaṃ, sattusaṅgahitaṃ mataṃ.
tika-vin10t0:3960_0: Bhajjitānaṃ tu vīhīnaṃ, na pavārenti taṇḍulā;
tika-vin10t0:3961_0: Tesaṃ pana ca yaṃ cuṇṇaṃ, taṃ janeti pavāraṇaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:3967_0: Kuṇḍakaṃ pana vīhīnaṃ, na janeti pavāraṇaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:3969_0: Lājā vā pana teheva, katabhattampi sattu vā;
tika-vin10t0:3970_0: Khajjakaṃ pana suddhaṃ vā, na janeti pavāraṇaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:3973_0: Yaṃ kiñci bhajjitaṃ piṭṭhaṃ, na pavāreti suddhakaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:3979_0: Na so tena pavāreti, avatthuttāti dīpitaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:3984_0: Maṃsaṃ pana ca khādanto, kappiyaṃ vā akappiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:3988_0: Nisedhaṃ na pavāreti, tathā aññaṃ akappiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:3991_0: Patte hatthe mukhe vāpi, bhojanaṃ pana vijjati.
tika-vin10t0:3994_0: Pavāreti sace natthi, na pavāreti katthaci.
tika-vin10t0:3996_0: Gilitvā ca mukhe bhattaṃ, sesamādāya gacchati;
tika-vin10t0:3997_0: Antarā ca nisedhento, na pavāreti bhojanaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:4004_0: Asanassa upacchedā, na pavāreti soti hi;
tika-vin10t0:4007_0: Gaṇhato pacchimaṃ aṅgaṃ, dadato purimaṃ pana;
tika-vin10t0:4008_0: Ubhinnaṃ aḍḍhateyyaṃ ce, vinā hatthaṃ pasāritaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:4013_0: Hatthe ādhārake vāpi, pattaṃ ūrūsu vā ṭhitaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:4023_0: Pidahanto sakaṃ pattaṃ, hatthehi na pavārito.
tika-vin10t0:4026_0: Kāyena vāpi vācāya, hoti kassa pavāraṇā.
tika-vin10t0:4031_0: Sace vadati tassāpi, na panatthi pavāraṇā;
tika-vin10t0:4034_0: Samaṃsañhi rasaṃ netvā, gaṇhathāti rasaṃ vade;
tika-vin10t0:4035_0: Taṃ sutvā ca nisedhento, neva hoti pavārito.
tika-vin10t0:4040_0: Sace maṃsaṃ visuṃ katvā, “gaṇha maṃsarasa”nti vā;
tika-vin10t0:4041_0: Vadeyyatthi ca maṃsaṃ ce, paṭikkhepe pavāraṇā.
tika-vin10t0:4049_0: Vadanti ce paṭikkhepe, neva hoti pavāraṇā;
tika-vin10t0:4055_0: Eseva ca nayo vutto, ñeyyo maṃsakarambake;
tika-vin10t0:4064_0: “Yāgumissakaṃ gaṇhā”ti, vutte tattha ca yāgu ce;
tika-vin10t0:4065_0: Samā bahutarā vā sā, na pavāreti so kira.
tika-vin10t0:4067_0: Mandā yāgu, bahuṃ bhattaṃ, sace hoti pavāraṇā;
tika-vin10t0:4068_0: Idaṃ sabbattha niddiṭṭhaṃ, kāraṇaṃ pana duddasaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:4070_0: Rasaṃ bahurase bhatte, khīraṃ vā bahukhīrake;
tika-vin10t0:4071_0: Gaṇhathāti visuṃ katvā, deti natthi pavāraṇā.
tika-vin10t0:4076_0: Udakaṃ vāpi patvā so, sace tiṭṭhati kaddamaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:4077_0: Atirittaṃ tu kāretvā, bhuñjitabbaṃ tato puna.
tika-vin10t0:4079_0: Pīṭhake yo nisīditvā, pavāreti sace pana;
tika-vin10t0:4082_0: Sace mañce nisīditvā, pavāreti tato pana;
tika-vin10t0:4083_0: Ito saṃsarituṃ etto, īsakampi na labbhati.
tika-vin10t0:4085_0: Tena mañcena naṃ saddhiṃ, vaṭṭataññatra nenti ce;
tika-vin10t0:4094_0: Kappiyaṃ pana kātabbaṃ, na patteyeva kevalaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:4095_0: Pacchiyaṃ yadi vā kuṇḍe, kātuṃ vaṭṭati bhājane.
tika-vin10t0:4103_0: Byañjanaṃ vāpi yaṃ kiñci, patte tassākiranti ce.
tika-vin10t0:4105_0: Atirittaṃ tu kāretvā, bhuñjitabbaṃ tathā puna;
tika-vin10t0:4106_0: Yena taṃ akataṃ yaṃ vā, kātabbaṃ tena taṃ visuṃ.
tika-vin10t0:4111_0: Yopi pātova ekampi, sitthaṃ bhutvā nisīdati;
tika-vin10t0:4128_0: Jānaṃ āsādanāpekkho, bhutte pācitti tassa tu.
tika-vin10t0:4130_0: Dukkaṭaṃ abhihāre ca, gahaṇe itarassa hi;
tika-vin10t0:4154_0: Mūlaṃ kandaṃ muḷālañca, matthakaṃ khandhakaṃ tacaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:4155_0: Pattaṃ pupphaṃ phalaṃ aṭṭhi, piṭṭhaṃ niyyāsameva ca.
tika-vin10t0:4164_0: Saṅgahaṃ idha gacchanti, āhāratthaṃ pharanti hi.
tika-vin10t0:4166_0: Chaḍḍenti jaraṭṭhaṃ chetvā, yaṃ taṃ vajakalissa tu;
tika-vin10t0:4199_0: Sattannaṃ pana dhaññānaṃ, kaḷīro sāsapassa ca.
tika-vin10t0:4217_0: Vatthulo cīnamuggo ca, ummā vajakalī tathā.
tika-vin10t0:4219_0: Jajjharī kāsamaddo ca, sellu siggu ca nāḷikā;
tika-vin10t0:4222_0: Rājamāso ca māso ca, nipphāvo migapupphikā;
tika-vin10t0:4235_0: Tathā pupphaṃ karīrassa, pupphaṃ varuṇakassa ca.
tika-vin10t0:4255_0: Labujassa ca cocassa, mocassa madhukassa ca.
tika-vin10t0:4281_0: Tālapiṭṭhaṃ tathā dhotaṃ, piṭṭhaṃ yaṃ khīravalliyā;
tika-vin10t0:4300_0: Bhojanaṃ sannidhiṃ katvā, khādanaṃ vāpi yo pana;
tika-vin10t0:4301_0: Bhuñjeyya vāpi khādeyya, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:4304_0: Nidahitvā sace tassa, denti taṃ puna vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:4307_0: Dutiye divase tassa, nihitaṃ taṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:4321_0: Thullaccayena saddhiṃ dve, maṃse mānusake siyuṃ;
tika-vin10t0:4322_0: Sese akappiye maṃse, dukkaṭena saha dvayaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:4328_0: Dvīsu tesu vikappesu, dukkaṭaṃ pana vaḍḍhati.
tika-vin10t0:4348_0: Kālo yāmo ca sattāhaṃ, iti kālattayaṃ idaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:4349_0: Atikkamayato doso, kālaṃ taṃ taṃ tu kālikaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:4361_0: Gahitaṃ tadahe vāpi, dvayaṃ pubbaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:4364_0: Iti vuttaṃ daḷhaṃ katvā, mahāpaccariyaṃ pana.
tika-vin10t0:4367_0: Taṃ taṃ sakaṃ sakaṃ kāla-manatikkamma bhuñjato.
tika-vin10t0:4379_0: Viññāpetvā tathā taṃ ce, dukkaṭaṃ paṭigaṇhato;
tika-vin10t0:4394_0: Yena yena hi viññattaṃ, tasmiṃ mūlepi tassa vā;
tika-vin10t0:4395_0: Laddhepi pana taṃ laddhaṃ, hotiyeva na aññathā.
tika-vin10t0:4403_0: Akappiyena vuttepi, sappinā deti tena ce;
tika-vin10t0:4420_0: Manusso vāmanusso vā, deti kāyādinā tidhā.
tika-vin10t0:4422_0: Paṭiggaṇhāti taṃ bhikkhu, dīyamānaṃ sace dvidhā;
tika-vin10t0:4425_0: Dāyako gaganaṭṭho ce, bhūmaṭṭho cetaro siyā;
tika-vin10t0:4429_0: Dātuṃ vāpi gahetuṃ vā, vinā hatthaṃ pasāritaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:4432_0: Evarūpe pana ṭhāne, ṭhatvā ce deti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:4434_0: Pakkhī vā mukhatuṇḍena, hatthī soṇḍāya vā pana;
tika-vin10t0:4435_0: Sace yaṃ kiñci pupphaṃ vā, phalaṃ vā deti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:4441_0: Tena hatthaṃ pasāretvā, heṭṭhimaṃ pana bhājanaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:4443_0: Paṭicchitabbaṃ taṃ eka- desenāpi ca bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t0:4446_0: Tato paṭṭhāya taṃ sabbaṃ, oropetvā yathāsukhaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:4447_0: Ugghāṭetvā tato iṭṭhaṃ, gahetuṃ pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:4450_0: Kājabhattaṃ haranto ce, onatvā deti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:4452_0: Tiṃsahattho siyā veḷu, antesu ca duve ghaṭā;
tika-vin10t0:4455_0: Bahupattā ca mañce vā, pīṭhe vā kaṭasārake;
tika-vin10t0:4456_0: Ṭhapitā dāyako hattha-pāse ṭhatvāna deti ce.
tika-vin10t0:4459_0: Nisīdati phusitvā yo, yañca pattesu dīyati.
tika-vin10t0:4461_0: Gahitaṃ tena taṃ sabbaṃ, hotiyeva na saṃsayo;
tika-vin10t0:4464_0: Gahitaṃ hoti taṃ sabbaṃ, āruhitvā nisīdati;
tika-vin10t0:4465_0: Āhacca kucchiyā kucchiṃ, ṭhitā pattā hi bhūmiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:4467_0: Yaṃ yaṃ aṅguliyā vāpi, phusitvā sūciyāpi vā;
tika-vin10t0:4468_0: Nisinno tattha tattheva, dīyamānaṃ tu vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:4474_0: Na panetāni kāyena, paṭibaddhāni honti hi.
tika-vin10t0:4477_0: Khāṇubaddhepi vā mañce, gahaṇaṃ neva rūhati.
tika-vin10t0:4485_0: Sace patte rajo hoti, dhovitabbo jale sati;
tika-vin10t0:4488_0: Piṇḍāya vicarantassa, rajaṃ patati ce pana;
tika-vin10t0:4495_0: Asutvānādiyitvā vā, denti ce natthi dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:4498_0: Sace rajaṃ nipāteti, mahāvāto tato tato.
tika-vin10t0:4500_0: Na sakkā ca siyā bhikkhaṃ, gahetuṃ yadi bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t0:4503_0: Sāmaṇerassa taṃ datvā, dinnaṃ vā tena taṃ puna;
tika-vin10t0:4504_0: Tassa vissāsato vāpi, bhuñjituṃ pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:4506_0: Bhikkhācāre sace bhattaṃ, sarajaṃ deti bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t0:4507_0: “Paṭiggahetvā bhikkhaṃ tvaṃ, gaṇha vā bhuñja vā”ti ca.
tika-vin10t0:4509_0: Vattabbo so tathā tena, kattabbañceva bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t0:4510_0: Rajaṃ upari bhattassa, tassuplavati ce pana.
tika-vin10t0:4513_0: Anto paṭiggahetabbaṃ, paviṭṭhaṃ tu sace pana.
tika-vin10t0:4515_0: Patitaṃ sukkhabhatte ce, apanīyāva taṃ rajaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:4519_0: Thevo uḷuṅkato patte, sace patati vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:4521_0: Bhatte ākiramāne tu, carukena tato pana;
tika-vin10t0:4522_0: Masi vā chārikā vāpi, sace patati bhājane.
tika-vin10t0:4527_0: Uppabhitvā sace patte, itarassa ca bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t0:4530_0: Pāyāsassa ca pūretvā, pattaṃ ce denti bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t0:4531_0: Uṇhattā pana taṃ heṭṭhā, gahetuṃ na ca sakkati.
tika-vin10t0:4534_0: Na sakkā ce gahetabbo, tathā ādhārakenapi.
tika-vin10t0:4540_0: Ābhogaṃ pana katvā ce, nisinno hoti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:4542_0: Sace hatthena muñcitvā, pattaṃ ādhārakampi vā;
tika-vin10t0:4543_0: Pelletvā pana pādena, niddāyati hi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:4548_0: Tasmā taṃ na ca kātabbaṃ, bhikkhunā vinayaññunā;
tika-vin10t0:4549_0: Yaṃ dīyamānaṃ patati, gahetuṃ taṃ tu vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:4551_0: Bhuñjantānañca dantā vā, khīyantipi nakhāpi vā;
tika-vin10t0:4552_0: Tathā pattassa vaṇṇo vā, abbohāranayo ayaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:4555_0: Paññāyati hi taṃ tesu, siyā navasamuṭṭhitaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:4557_0: Paṭiggahetvā taṃ pacchā, khāditabbaṃ tu bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t0:4558_0: Na paññāyati ce tasmiṃ, malaṃ vaṭṭati khādituṃ.
tika-vin10t0:4563_0: Bhesajjatthāya tāpetvā, vāsiṃ khīre khipanti ce;
tika-vin10t0:4564_0: Uṭṭheti nīlikā tattha, satthake viya nicchayo.
tika-vin10t0:4566_0: Sace āmakatakke vā, khīre vā pakkhipanti taṃ;
tika-vin10t0:4570_0: Patte patati ce toyaṃ, kiliṭṭhaṃ kāyavatthato.
tika-vin10t0:4573_0: Eseva ca nayo vutto, rukkhamūlepi bhuñjato.
tika-vin10t0:4575_0: Sattāhaṃ pana vassante, deve suddhaṃ jalaṃ sace;
tika-vin10t0:4576_0: Abbhokāsepi vā patte, toyaṃ patati vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:4581_0: Paṭiggahetvā vā pattaṃ, dātabbo tassa odano;
tika-vin10t0:4582_0: Chupitvā deti ce bhattaṃ, taṃ panuggahitaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:4588_0: Sace vadati pacchā taṃ, paṭiggaṇheyya paṇḍito.
tika-vin10t0:4591_0: “Etto pūvampi bhattaṃ vā, kiñci gaṇhā”ti bhāsati.
tika-vin10t0:4597_0: Taṃpaṭiggahaṇe kiccaṃ, puna tassa na vijjati.
tika-vin10t0:4606_0: Patitaṃ hatthato tasmiṃ, na karoti akappiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:4609_0: Bhuñjitabbaṃ tu taṃ katvā, pattaṃ viya nirāmisaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:4611_0: Sace yāgukuṭaṃ puṇṇaṃ, sāmaṇero hi dubbalo;
tika-vin10t0:4612_0: Bhikkhuṃ paṭiggahāpetuṃ, na sakkoti hi taṃ puna.
tika-vin10t0:4617_0: Atha vā bhūmiyaṃyeva, hatthe bhikkhu ṭhapeti ce;
tika-vin10t0:4618_0: Āropeti pavaṭṭetvā, tattha ce pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:4621_0: Dve tayo sāmaṇerā vā, denti ce gahaṇūpagaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:4624_0: Ekena vā tathā dinnaṃ, gaṇhanti dve tayopi vā.
tika-vin10t0:4630_0: Sammujjanto ca ghaṭṭeti, na panuggahitaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:4633_0: Gaṇhitvā puna taṃ ñatvā, ṭhapetuṃ tattha vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:4635_0: Vivaritvā sace pubbe, ṭhapitaṃ pihitampi ca;
tika-vin10t0:4636_0: Tatheva taṃ ṭhapetabbaṃ, kattabbaṃ na panaññathā.
tika-vin10t0:4638_0: Bahi ṭhapeti ce tena, chupitabbaṃ na taṃ puna;
tika-vin10t0:4639_0: Yadi chupati ce ñatvā, taṃ panuggahitaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:4645_0: Paṭiggahaṇakiccaṃ tu, tasmiṃ puna na vijjati.
tika-vin10t0:4647_0: Tālaṃ vā nāḷikeraṃ vā, āruḷho koci puggalo;
tika-vin10t0:4651_0: Tamañño pana bhūmaṭṭho, gahetvā deti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:4653_0: Chinditvā ce vatiṃ ucchuṃ, phalaṃ vā deti gaṇhituṃ;
tika-vin10t0:4656_0: Sace na puthulo hoti, pākāro atiuccako;
tika-vin10t0:4659_0: Uddhaṃ hatthasataṃ gantvā, sampattaṃ puna taṃ pana;
tika-vin10t0:4662_0: Bhikkhuno sāmaṇeraṃ tu, khandhena vahato sace;
tika-vin10t0:4663_0: Phalaṃ gahetvā tattheva, nisinno deti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:4665_0: Aparopi vahantova, bhikkhuṃ yo koci puggalo;
tika-vin10t0:4666_0: Phalaṃ khandhe nisinnassa, bhikkhuno deti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:4668_0: Gahetvā phaliniṃ sākhaṃ, chāyatthaṃ yadi gacchati;
tika-vin10t0:4669_0: Puna citte samuppanne, khādituṃ pana bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t0:4674_0: Kappiyaṃ pana kāretvā, paṭiggaṇhāti taṃ puna;
tika-vin10t0:4678_0: Gacchanto antarāmagge, yaṃ icchati tato pana.
tika-vin10t0:4686_0: Taṇḍulesu hi khīṇesu, attanā gahitesu so;
tika-vin10t0:4690_0: Yāguṃ bhikkhussa taṃ datvā, sayaṃ pivati tassa ce.
tika-vin10t0:4698_0: Tasmā hissa visesassa, cintetabbaṃ tu kāraṇaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:4702_0: Na sakkoti sace te ca, taṇḍule bhājanampi ca.
tika-vin10t0:4713_0: Tatte panudake koci, ce pakkhipati taṇḍule;
tika-vin10t0:4714_0: Tato paṭṭhāya tenaggi, na kātabbova bhikkhunā.
tika-vin10t0:4716_0: Paṭiggahetvā taṃ yāguṃ, pātuṃ vaṭṭati bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t0:4717_0: Sace pacati pacchā taṃ, sāmapākā na muccati.
tika-vin10t0:4720_0: Tasseva ca tato laddhaṃ, phalaṃ kiñci na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:4723_0: Kaṇṭake bandhituṃ vāpi, bhikkhuno kira vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:4725_0: Saṇḍāsena ca dīghena, gahetvā thālakaṃ pana;
tika-vin10t0:4726_0: Pacato bhikkhuno telaṃ, bhasmaṃ patati tattha ce.
tika-vin10t0:4731_0: Paṭiggahetvā aṅgāre, tāni dārūni vā pana;
tika-vin10t0:4734_0: Ucchuṃ khādati ce bhikkhu, sāmaṇeropi icchati;
tika-vin10t0:4735_0: “Chinditvā tvamito gaṇha”, iti vutto ca gaṇhati.
tika-vin10t0:4746_0: Udakena samā vuttā, himassa karakāpi ca;
tika-vin10t0:4747_0: Kūpādīsu jalaṃ pātuṃ, bahalampi ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:4749_0: Khettesu kasitaṭṭhāne, bahalaṃ taṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t0:4750_0: Sanditvā yadi taṃ gantvā, nadiṃ pūreti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:4753_0: Na ñāyati raso tesaṃ, na paṭiggahaṇakāraṇaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:4756_0: Pakkhittāni sace honti, paṭiggaṇheyya taṃ pana.
tika-vin10t0:4762_0: Ajānantassa pācitti, so ce visati khādato.
tika-vin10t0:4764_0: Sarīraṭṭhesu bhūtesu, kiṃ vaṭṭati? Na vaṭṭati?
tika-vin10t0:4768_0: Semhaṃ siṅghāṇikā kheḷo, assu loṇanti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:4770_0: Yaṃ panettha sakaṭṭhānā, cavitvā patitaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t0:4771_0: Patte vā pana hatthe vā, paṭiggaṇheyya taṃ puna.
tika-vin10t0:4812_0: Udakaṃ dantaponaṃ vā, dentassa ca atitthiye;
tika-vin10t0:4813_0: Titthiyoti ca saññissa, dukkaṭaṃ vimatissa ca.
tika-vin10t0:4822_0: Dāpetvā vā adāpetvā, bhikkhu yaṃ kiñci āmisaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:4832_0: Pamāṇaṃ savane cevaṃ, ajjhokāse na cetare.
tika-vin10t0:4842_0: Sabhojane kule tassa, hoti pācitti bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t0:4851_0: Vītarāgesu vā tesu, nikkhantesu ubhosu vā.
tika-vin10t0:4857_0: Catutthe pañcame ceva, vattabbaṃ natthi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t0:4858_0: Vattabbaṃ yañca taṃ sabbaṃ, vuttaṃ aniyatadvaye.
tika-vin10t0:4864_0: Bhojanānaṃ tu pañcannaṃ, vutto aññatarena yo;
tika-vin10t0:4867_0: Cārittaṃ tassa pācitti, aññatra samayā siyā;
tika-vin10t0:4876_0: Ṭhitaṭṭhāne sace bhikkhuṃ, oloketvā na passati;
tika-vin10t0:4879_0: Sace dūre ṭhito hoti, asanto nāma bhikkhu so;
tika-vin10t0:4880_0: Natthi ārocane kiccaṃ, gavesitvā ito cito.
tika-vin10t0:4882_0: Na doso samaye santaṃ, āpucchitvā ca gacchato;
tika-vin10t0:4883_0: Bhikkhuṃ gharena maggo ce, ārāmaṃ gacchatopi ca.
tika-vin10t0:4888_0: Idaṃ pana samuṭṭhānaṃ, kathinena samaṃ mataṃ;
tika-vin10t0:4896_0: Na paṭikkhipitabbā sā, “rogo dāni na me”ti ca.
tika-vin10t0:4902_0: Tato aññehi vā bhiyyo, ācikkhitvā yathātathaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:4912_0: Aññatra paccayā tassa, dukkaṭaṃ tu pade pade.
tika-vin10t0:4917_0: Ārohā pana cattāro, dve dve taṃpādarakkhakā;
tika-vin10t0:4918_0: Evaṃ dvādasaposo ca, eko hatthīti vuccati.
tika-vin10t0:4921_0: Eko sārathi yodheko, āṇirakkhā duve janā.
tika-vin10t0:4924_0: Cattāro padahatthā ca, purisā pattīti vuccati.
tika-vin10t0:4932_0: Attano ca ṭhitokāsaṃ, sampattaṃ pana passati;
tika-vin10t0:4939_0: Ākāse iddhiyā seyyaṃ, pakappetu ca iddhimā;
tika-vin10t0:4949_0: Uyyodhikaṃ balaggaṃ vā, senābyūhampi vā pana;
tika-vin10t0:4955_0: Sesesupi ca eseva, nayo ñeyyo vibhāvinā;
tika-vin10t0:4960_0: Piṭṭhādīhi kataṃ majjaṃ, surā nāmāti vuccati;
tika-vin10t0:4961_0: Pupphādīhi kato sabbo, āsavo hoti merayaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:4964_0: Payoge ca payoge ca, hoti pācitti bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t0:4996_0: Nimujjeyyapi vā bhikkhu, ummujjeyya tareyya vā.
tika-vin10t0:4998_0: Payoge ca payoge ca, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t0:5004_0: Yena yena panaṅgena, bhikkhuno tarato jalaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:5007_0: Taruto tīrato vāpi, pācitti patato jale;
tika-vin10t0:5010_0: Pājentopi sace nāvaṃ, arittena phiyena vā;
tika-vin10t0:5011_0: Ussārentopi tīre vā, nāvaṃ kīḷati dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:5013_0: Hatthena vāpi pādena, kaṭṭhena kathalāya vā;
tika-vin10t0:5016_0: Udakaṃ kañjikaṃ vāpi, cikkhallaṃ vāpi vikkhipaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:5048_0: Disvā vā pana taṃ sutvā, mā vā bhāyatu, bhāyatu;
tika-vin10t0:5049_0: Itarassa tu bhikkhussa, hoti pācitti taṅkhaṇe.
tika-vin10t0:5058_0: Jotiṃ tappetukāmo ce, jalāpeyya jaleyya vā;
tika-vin10t0:5059_0: Ṭhapetvā hoti pācitti, tathārūpaṃ tu paccayaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:5061_0: Sayaṃ samādahantassa, yāva jālā na jāyati;
tika-vin10t0:5071_0: Anāpatti gilānassa, kataṃ aññena vā pana.
tika-vin10t0:5077_0: Apuṇṇe addhamāsasmiṃ, dese ce majjhime pana;
tika-vin10t0:5084_0: Dukkaṭaṃ atirekaddha- māse ca samayesu ca.
tika-vin10t0:5093_0: Cīvaraṃ yaṃ nivāsetuṃ, sakkā pārupitumpi vā;
tika-vin10t0:5097_0: Yena kenaci kāḷena, kaddamenapi vā tathā.
tika-vin10t0:5102_0: Pāḷikaṇṇikakappo vā, na ca vaṭṭati katthaci;
tika-vin10t0:5103_0: Ekaṃ vāpi anekaṃ vā, bindu vaṭṭati vaṭṭakaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:5108_0: Kappe naṭṭhepi vā saddhiṃ, tena saṃsibbitesu vā;
tika-vin10t0:5119_0: Kappatettāvatā kāmaṃ, nidhetuṃ, na ca kappati.
tika-vin10t0:5128_0: Yassa kassaci nāmaṃ tu, gahetvā sahadhamminaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:5133_0: “Tissassa bhikkhuno vā tvaṃ, tassā tissāya theriyā;
tika-vin10t0:5140_0: Puna tenapi vattabbaṃ, “ko te mitto”ti bhikkhunā.
tika-vin10t0:5145_0: Tissāya theriyā vā tvaṃ, santakaṃ paribhuñja vā;
tika-vin10t0:5146_0: Vissajjehī”ti vā vutte, hoti paccuddhaṭaṃ puna.
tika-vin10t0:5148_0: Iccetāsu pana dvīsu, yāya kāyaci cīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t0:5152_0: Yena taṃ vinayaṃ kammaṃ, kataṃ panidha bhikkhunā.
tika-vin10t0:5204_0: Dhovato pana pattaṃ vā, nibbāpentassa yāguyo.
tika-vin10t0:5206_0: Hatthena taṃ uḷuṅkena, gahetvā nhāyatopi vā;
tika-vin10t0:5207_0: Payoge ca payoge ca, pācitti paridīpitā.
tika-vin10t0:5219_0: Siñcane siñcanaṃ vuttaṃ, paribhoge idaṃ pana.
tika-vin10t0:5221_0: Ayameva visesoti, tassa ceva panassa ca;
tika-vin10t0:5229_0: Vadatā pana taṃ kammaṃ, uccāletuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:5231_0: Sace vippakate kamme, paṭikkosati taṃ puna;
tika-vin10t0:5237_0: “Adhammena ca vaggena, na ca kammārahassa vā;
tika-vin10t0:5238_0: Kata”nti jānato natthi, doso ukkoṭane pana.
tika-vin10t0:5248_0: Āroceti sacaññassa, sopi aññassa vāti hi.
tika-vin10t0:5250_0: Evaṃ satampi bhikkhūnaṃ, sahassampi ca tāva taṃ;
tika-vin10t0:5251_0: Āpajjateva āpattiṃ, yāva koṭi na chijjati.
tika-vin10t0:5263_0: Na ca chādetukāmo vā, sabhāgaṃ vā na passati.
tika-vin10t0:5273_0: Tassa pācittiyaṃ hoti, sesānaṃ hoti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:5281_0: Muñcitvā pana taṃ bhikkhuṃ, gaṇo ce paripūrati;
tika-vin10t0:5282_0: Honti te sūpasampannā, na doso koci vijjati.
tika-vin10t0:5284_0: Upajjhāyo sace hutvā, gaṇaṃ ācariyampi vā;
tika-vin10t0:5285_0: Pariyesati pattaṃ vā, sammannati ca māḷakaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:5288_0: Ñattiyā ca tathā dvīsu, kammavācāsu dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:5301_0: Maggaṃ gacchati saddhiṃ yo, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:5303_0: Gamane saṃvidhāne ca, vattabbo yo vinicchayo;
tika-vin10t0:5304_0: So ca bhikkhunivaggasmiṃ, vuttattā na ca uddhaṭo.
tika-vin10t0:5323_0: Kammaṃ kileso pāko ca, upavādo atikkamo;
tika-vin10t0:5329_0: Tikkhattuṃ tehi vattabbo, ye passanti suṇanti ca;
tika-vin10t0:5330_0: “Mā hevaṃ avacāyasmā”, iti bhikkhūhi so pana.
tika-vin10t0:5333_0: Ñattiyā ca tathā dvīhi, kammavācāhi dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:5343_0: Saṃvaseyya ca bhuñjeyya, pācitti saha seyya vā.
tika-vin10t0:5345_0: Uposathādikaṃ kammaṃ, karoto saha tena hi;
tika-vin10t0:5349_0: Dadatopi tathā ekaṃ, bahūni ca bahūsvapi.
tika-vin10t0:5351_0: Ukkhittake nipannasmiṃ, itaro seti ce pana;
tika-vin10t0:5352_0: Itarasmiṃ nipanne vā, paro seti ubhopi vā.
tika-vin10t0:5361_0: Nissaṭṭhoti ca taṃ diṭṭhiṃ, saññissosāritoti ca.
tika-vin10t0:5367_0: Tathā vināsitaṃ jānaṃ, upalāpeyya tena vā;
tika-vin10t0:5377_0: Na hettha kiñci vattabbaṃ, sabbaṃ uttānamevidaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:5381_0: Vuccamāno hi bhikkhūhi, bhikkhu sikkhāpadena yo;
tika-vin10t0:5411_0: Kāretabbo tathā bhikkhu, yathā dhammo ṭhito pana.
tika-vin10t0:5416_0: Evaṃ āropite mohe, yadi moheti yo pana;
tika-vin10t0:5417_0: Tasmiṃ mohanake vuttā, pācitti pana puggale.
tika-vin10t0:5429_0: Kuddho deti pahāraṃ ce, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t0:5432_0: Dinne bhijjatu sīsaṃ vā, pādo vā paribhijjatu;
tika-vin10t0:5433_0: So ce maratu vā, mā vā, pācitti paridīpitā.
tika-vin10t0:5436_0: Kaṇṇaṃ vā tassa nāsaṃ vā, yadi chindati dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:5444_0: Pahāraṃ deti mokkhādhi-ppāyo doso na vijjati;
tika-vin10t0:5450_0: Iti vatvā panāyantaṃ, “gaccha re”ti ca muggaraṃ;
tika-vin10t0:5451_0: Satthaṃ vāpi gahetvā vā, paharitvā tu yāti ce.
tika-vin10t0:5453_0: Anāpatti sace tena, pahārena matepi ca;
tika-vin10t0:5460_0: Kāyaṃ vā kāyabaddhaṃ vā, uccāreyya sace pana;
tika-vin10t0:5463_0: Uggiritvā viraddho so, pahāraṃ deti ce pana;
tika-vin10t0:5466_0: Sace tena pahārena, pahaṭassa ca bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t0:5467_0: Hatthādīsupi yaṃ kiñci, aṅgaṃ bhijjati dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:5486_0: Hoti vācāya vācāya, pācitti pana bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t0:5493_0: Vikāle ca tayā bhuttaṃ, mā eva”nti ca bhāsato.
tika-vin10t0:5499_0: Sace bhaṇḍanajātānaṃ, bhikkhūnaṃ pana bhikkhu yo;
tika-vin10t0:5502_0: “Yaṃ ime tu bhaṇissanti, taṃ sossāmī”ti gacchato;
tika-vin10t0:5521_0: Dhammikānaṃ tu kammānaṃ, chandaṃ datvā sace pana;
tika-vin10t0:5522_0: Pacchā khīyati pācitti, vācato vācato siyā.
tika-vin10t0:5528_0: Ime kammaṃ karontī”ti, ñatvā khīyati tassa ca.
tika-vin10t0:5535_0: Ṭhapitā ñatti vā niṭṭhaṃ, kammavācā na gacchati.
tika-vin10t0:5537_0: Etasmiṃ antare kammaṃ, kopetuṃ parisāya hi;
tika-vin10t0:5540_0: Adatvā jahite chandaṃ, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t0:5541_0: Dhammakamme adhamme ca, vimatissa ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:5546_0: Gilāno vā gilānassa, karaṇīye na dosatā;
tika-vin10t0:5553_0: Samaggena ca saṅghena, saddhiṃ datvāna cīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t0:5554_0: Sammatassa hi bhikkhussa, pacchā khīyati yo pana.
tika-vin10t0:5557_0: Tikapācittiyaṃ dhamma- kamme vuttaṃ tu cīvaraṃ.
tika-vin10t0:5580_0: Dukkaṭaṃ paṭhame pāde, pācitti dutiye siyā;
tika-vin10t0:5581_0: Deviyā vāpi rañño vā, sace na viditāgamo.
tika-vin10t0:5602_0: Sace kappiyavatthuṃ vā, vatthuṃ vāpi akappiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:5609_0: “Na vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā taṃ, na nidhetabbameva tu.
tika-vin10t0:5612_0: Palibodho hi nāmeso, ṭhapetuṃ pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:5631_0: Dukkaṭaṃ paṭhame pāde, pācitti dutiye siyā.
tika-vin10t0:5633_0: Atha sambahulā gāmaṃ, vikāle pavisanti ce;
tika-vin10t0:5636_0: Gacchanti ce tato aññaṃ, tato aññanti vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t0:5637_0: Puna āpucchane kiccaṃ, natthi gāmasatepi ca.
tika-vin10t0:5640_0: Pavisanti sace aññaṃ, pucchitabbaṃ tu antarā.
tika-vin10t0:5642_0: Katvā kulaghare bhatta- kiccaṃ aññattha vā pana;
tika-vin10t0:5643_0: Sace caritukāmo yo, sappibhikkhāya vā siyā.
tika-vin10t0:5645_0: Āpucchitvāva gantabbaṃ, passe ce bhikkhu labbhati;
tika-vin10t0:5646_0: Asante pana natthīti, gantabbaṃ tu yathāsukhaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:5648_0: Otaritvā mahāvīthiṃ, bhikkhuṃ yadi ca passati;
tika-vin10t0:5654_0: Āpucchitvāva gantabbaṃ, passe ce bhikkhu vijjati;
tika-vin10t0:5674_0: Kārāpane ca karaṇe, bhikkhuno hoti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:5679_0: Aññena ca kataṃ laddhā, dukkaṭaṃ paribhuñjato;
tika-vin10t0:5686_0: Navaṃ mañcampi pīṭhaṃ vā, kārāpentena bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t0:5693_0: Aññena ca kataṃ laddhā, dukkaṭaṃ paribhuñjato.
tika-vin10t0:5699_0: Uttānaṃ vāpi aṭṭaṃ vā, bandhitvā paribhuñjato.
tika-vin10t0:5702_0: Mañcaṃ vā pana pīṭhaṃ vā, tūlonaddhaṃ kareyya yo;
tika-vin10t0:5708_0: Aññena ca kataṃ laddhā, uddāletvā nisevato;
tika-vin10t0:5716_0: Dvīsu ṭhānesu phāletvā, tassa tisso dasā siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t0:5734_0: Cīvaraṃ bhikkhu kāreyya, karaṇe dukkaṭaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:5739_0: Dīghaso ca pamāṇena, nava tassa vidatthiyo;
tika-vin10t0:5742_0: Aññena ca kataṃ laddhā, sevato dukkaṭaṃ bhave;
tika-vin10t0:5749_0: Yo cantaragharaṃ bhikkhu, paviṭṭhāya tu hatthato;
tika-vin10t0:5750_0: Aññātikāya yaṃ kiñci, tassa bhikkhuniyā pana.
tika-vin10t0:5758_0: Rathikāya sace ṭhatvā, deti bhikkhuni bhojanaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:5759_0: Āpatti antarārāme, ṭhatvā gaṇhāti bhikkhu ce.
tika-vin10t0:5765_0: Vīthiyādīsu ce ṭhatvā, na doso paṭigaṇhato.
tika-vin10t0:5782_0: Gāmato nīharitvā vā, deti ce bahi vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t0:5798_0: Anāpattittano bhattaṃ, padāpeti na deti ce;
tika-vin10t0:5799_0: Tathā aññassa bhattaṃ vā, na dāpeti padeti ce.
tika-vin10t0:5801_0: Yaṃ na dinnaṃ taṃ dāpeti, na dinnaṃ yattha vāpi ca;
tika-vin10t0:5802_0: Tattha tampi ca sabbesaṃ, samaṃ dāpeti bhikkhunī.
tika-vin10t0:5818_0: Gahaṇe paribhoge ca, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:5824_0: Nimantitassa vā bhikkhā, aññesaṃ tattha dīyati.
tika-vin10t0:5826_0: Gharato nīharitvā vā, denti ce yattha katthaci;
tika-vin10t0:5829_0: Anāgate hi bhikkhumhi, gharato paṭhamaṃ pana;
tika-vin10t0:5830_0: Nīharitvā sace dvāre, sampatte denti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:5832_0: Bhikkhuṃ pana ca disvāva, nīharitvāna gehato;
tika-vin10t0:5837_0: Ārāmaṃ upacāraṃ vā, pavisitvā sace pana.
tika-vin10t0:5843_0: Tassa vā parivārampi, aññaṃ katvā bahuṃ pana.
tika-vin10t0:5845_0: Yāguyā viditaṃ katvā, pūvaṃ bhattaṃ haranti ce;
tika-vin10t0:5849_0: Haranti tena saddhiṃ ce, sabbaṃ vaṭṭati tampi ca.
tika-vin10t0:5854_0: Yaṃ asaṃviditaṃ katvā, ābhataṃ pana taṃ bahi;
tika-vin10t0:5857_0: Gantvā vā antarāmagge, gahetabbaṃ tu bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t0:5882_0: Otāretvā nivatthabbaṃ, tato ūnaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:5888_0: Ubho koṇe samaṃ katvā, sādaraṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:5892_0: Tasmā ghare vihāre vā, kattabbaṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:5895_0: Gaṇṭhikaṃ paṭimuñcitvā, katvā koṇe ubho samaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:5898_0: Tathā akatvā bhikkhussa, jattūnipi urampi ca;
tika-vin10t0:5903_0: Hatthe piṇḍikamaṃsamhā, heṭṭhā pāde ubhopi ca.
tika-vin10t0:5906_0: Hoti so suppaṭicchanno, doso vāsūpagassa na.
tika-vin10t0:5909_0: Hatthaṃ vā pana pādaṃ vā, acālentena bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t0:5916_0: Yattha katthaci hi ṭṭhāne, ekasmiṃ antare ghare;
tika-vin10t0:5919_0: Yo anādariyaṃ katvā, olokento tahiṃ tahiṃ;
tika-vin10t0:5941_0: Gacchato dukkaṭaṃ hoti, tatheva ca nisīdato.
tika-vin10t0:5943_0: Kāyaṃ bāhuñca sīsañca, paggahetvā ujuṃ pana;
tika-vin10t0:5950_0: Khambhaṃ katvā sasīsaṃ vā, pārupitvāna gacchato;
tika-vin10t0:5951_0: Dukkaṭaṃ muninā vuttaṃ, tathā ukkuṭikāya vā.
tika-vin10t0:5956_0: Dutiye ca catutthe ca, chaṭṭhe vāsūpagassa tu;
tika-vin10t0:5974_0: Yaṃ kiñci pana bhikkhussa, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:5977_0: Sese thūpīkataṃ sabbaṃ, vaṭṭateva na saṃsayo.
tika-vin10t0:5979_0: Dvīsu pattesu bhattaṃ tu, gahetvā pattamekakaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:5980_0: Pūretvā yadi peseti, bhikkhūnaṃ pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:5983_0: Orohati sace heṭṭhā, na taṃ thūpīkataṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:5986_0: Dinnaṃ ayāvakālittā, na taṃ thūpīkataṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:5989_0: Piṇḍapātaṃ sace denti, idaṃ thūpīkataṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:5991_0: Bhattassūpari paṇṇaṃ vā, thālakaṃ vāpi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t0:5994_0: Paṭiggahetumevassa, taṃ tu sabbaṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t0:5998_0: Paṭhamaṃ dutiyaṃ vutta-nayaṃ tu tatiye pana;
tika-vin10t0:6001_0: Aññesaṃ attano bhattaṃ, ākiraṃ pana bhājane;
tika-vin10t0:6005_0: Catutthe yaṃ tu vattabbaṃ, vuttaṃ pubbe asesato;
tika-vin10t0:6012_0: Yo bhiyyokamyatāhetu, sūpaṃ vā byañjanampi vā;
tika-vin10t0:6016_0: Viññattiyaṃ tu vattabbaṃ, apubbaṃ natthi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t0:6017_0: Aṭṭhame pana ujjhāne, gilānopi na muccati.
tika-vin10t0:6039_0: Mukhe ca sakalaṃ hatthaṃ, pakkhipantassa dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:6040_0: Mukhe ca kabaḷaṃ katvā, kathetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:6042_0: Vacanaṃ yattakenassa, paripuṇṇaṃ na hoti hi;
tika-vin10t0:6046_0: Vacanaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ ce, kathetuṃ pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:6050_0: Makkaṭo viya gaṇḍe vā, katvā bhuñjeyya dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:6061_0: Katvā evaṃ na bhottabbaṃ, saddaṃ “suru surū”ti ca;
tika-vin10t0:6062_0: Hatthanillehakaṃ vāpi, na ca vaṭṭati bhuñjituṃ.
tika-vin10t0:6064_0: Phāṇitaṃ ghanayāguṃ vā, gahetvā aṅgulīhi taṃ;
tika-vin10t0:6071_0: Sāmisena tu hatthena, na ca pānīyathālakaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:6075_0: Santako pana saṅkho vā, sarāvaṃ vāpi thālakaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:6077_0: Tasmā na ca gahetabbaṃ, gaṇhato hoti dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:6085_0: Chattaṃ yaṃ kiñci hatthena, sarīrāvayavena vā;
tika-vin10t0:6094_0: Satthapāṇī na hotāsiṃ, sannayhitvā ṭhito pana.
tika-vin10t0:6097_0: Dhanuṃ sarena saddhiṃ vā, dhanuṃ vā sarameva vā;
tika-vin10t0:6101_0: Sace deseti saddhammaṃ, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:6104_0: Na gaṇhāti naro tāva, dhammaṃ deseyya vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:6112_0: Sabbattha agilānassa, yāne vā sayanepi vā.
tika-vin10t0:6115_0: Pīṭhe mañcepi vā ucce, nisinnena ṭhitena vā.
tika-vin10t0:6117_0: Na ca vaṭṭati desetuṃ, ṭhatvā vā uccabhūmiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:6120_0: Samāne vāpi ucce vā, nipanne neva vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t0:6134_0: Aṭṭhame navame vāpi, dasame natthi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t0:6137_0: Pañhaṃ pucchati ce thero, kathetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t0:6142_0: Gacchato purato pañhaṃ, na vattabbaṃ tu pacchato;
tika-vin10t0:6145_0: Saddhiṃ uggahitaṃ dhammaṃ, sajjhāyati hi vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t0:6153_0: Tatiye natthi vattabbaṃ, catutthe harite pana;
tika-vin10t0:6156_0: Jīvarukkhassa yaṃ mūlaṃ, dissamānaṃ tu gacchati;
tika-vin10t0:6157_0: Sākhā vā bhūmilaggā taṃ, sabbaṃ haritameva hi.
tika-vin10t0:6165_0: Kato aharite ṭhāne, haritaṃ eti vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t0:6166_0: Siṅghāṇikā gatā ettha, kheḷeneva ca saṅgahaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:6172_0: Deve pana ca vassante, udakoghe samantato;
tika-vin10t0:6213_0: Chandaso methunaṃ dhammaṃ, paṭiseveyya yā pana;
tika-vin10t0:6214_0: Hoti pārājikā nāma, samaṇī sā pavuccati.
tika-vin10t0:6226_0: Sarīrakena ce tena, phuseyya bhikkhunī pana.
tika-vin10t0:6229_0: Sarīramassa tena vā, phuṭṭhā pārājikā siyā.
tika-vin10t0:6237_0: Avasesena vā tassa, kāyaṃ kāyena attano;
tika-vin10t0:6238_0: Hoti thullaccayaṃ tassā, payoge purisassa ca.
tika-vin10t0:6244_0: Avasese ca sabbattha, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:6247_0: Kapparassa ca heṭṭhāpi, gataṃ ettheva saṅgahaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:6249_0: Kelāyati sace bhikkhu, saddhiṃ bhikkhuniyā pana;
tika-vin10t0:6255_0: Bhikkhuno methuno rāgo, gehapemampi vā bhave;
tika-vin10t0:6256_0: Tassā thullaccayaṃ vuttaṃ, bhikkhuno hoti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:6258_0: Ubhinnaṃ methune rāge, gehapemepi vā sati;
tika-vin10t0:6261_0: Yassa yattha manosuddhaṃ, tassa tattha na dosatā;
tika-vin10t0:6265_0: Pacchā dūseti ce neva, hoti bhikkhunidūsako.
tika-vin10t0:6268_0: Niccalo hoti ce bhikkhu, na hotāpatti bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t0:6270_0: Bhikkhunī bhikkhunā phuṭṭhā, sace hotipi niccalā;
tika-vin10t0:6276_0: Tassā kriyasamuṭṭhānaṃ, evaṃ sati na dissati;
tika-vin10t0:6286_0: Pārājikattaṃ jānanti, saliṅge tu ṭhitāya hi;
tika-vin10t0:6289_0: Dhure nikkhittamattasmiṃ, sā ca pārājikā siyā;
tika-vin10t0:6293_0: Viseso tatra pācitti, idha pārājikaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:6297_0: Yaṃdiṭṭhiko ca so tassā, diṭṭhiyā gahaṇena taṃ.
tika-vin10t0:6299_0: Anuvatteyya yā bhikkhuṃ, bhikkhunī sā visumpi ca;
tika-vin10t0:6302_0: Acajantīva taṃ vatthuṃ, gahetvā yadi tiṭṭhati;
tika-vin10t0:6306_0: Puna appaṭisandheyā, dvidhā bhinnā silā viya.
tika-vin10t0:6321_0: Sallapeyya tathā tattha, ṭhatvā tu purisena vā;
tika-vin10t0:6322_0: Saṅketaṃ vāpi gaccheyya, iccheyyā gamanassa vā.
tika-vin10t0:6325_0: Upasaṃhareyya kāyaṃ vā, hatthapāse ṭhitā pana.
tika-vin10t0:6330_0: Anulomena vā vatthuṃ, paṭilomena vā cutā;
tika-vin10t0:6333_0: Athādito panekaṃ vā, dve vā tīṇipi satta vā;
tika-vin10t0:6362_0: Sakkhiṃ vāpi sahāyaṃ vā, pariyesati dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:6363_0: Pade pade tathā aṭṭaṃ, kātuṃ gacchantiyāpi ca.
tika-vin10t0:6365_0: Āroceti sace pubbaṃ, bhikkhunī attano kathaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:6366_0: Disvā vohārikaṃ tassā, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:6368_0: Āroceti sace pacchā, itaro attano kathaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:6371_0: Ārocetitaro pubbaṃ, sace so attano kathaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:6381_0: Vinicchaye kate tehi, aṭṭe pana ca niṭṭhite.
tika-vin10t0:6386_0: Dūtaṃ vāpi pahiṇitvā, āgantvāna sayampi vā;
tika-vin10t0:6389_0: Ārāme pana aññehi, anācāraṃ kataṃ sace;
tika-vin10t0:6390_0: Anodissa paraṃ kiñci, rakkhaṃ yācati tattha yā.
tika-vin10t0:6392_0: Yāya kiñci avuttāva, dhammaṭṭhā sayameva tu;
tika-vin10t0:6393_0: Sutvā taṃ aññato aṭṭaṃ, niṭṭhāpenti sace pana.
tika-vin10t0:6399_0: Jānantī bhikkhunī coriṃ, vajjhaṃ viditameva yā;
tika-vin10t0:6411_0: Vuṭṭhāpeti ca yā coriṃ, ṭhapetvā kappamevidaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:6414_0: Sammannati ca sīmaṃ vā, tassā āpatti dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:6415_0: Ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ dvīhi, kammavācāhi ca dvayaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:6418_0: Gaṇo ācarinī ceva, na ca muccati dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:6421_0: Kappaṃ vā apaloketvā, tassā ummattikāya vā.
tika-vin10t0:6428_0: Ohīyeyya gaṇamhā vā, rattiṃ vippavaseyya vā.
tika-vin10t0:6433_0: Nikkhamitvā tato aññaṃ, gāmaṃ gacchantiyā pana;
tika-vin10t0:6442_0: Nikkhamitvā sace pacchā, sakaṃ gāmaṃ visantiyā;
tika-vin10t0:6443_0: Ayameva nayo ñeyyo, vaticchiddena vā tathā.
tika-vin10t0:6446_0: Kappiyanti paviṭṭhattā, na doso koci vijjati.
