tika-vin10t0:6448_0: Bhikkhunīnaṃ vihārassa, bhūmi tāsaṃ tu kappiyā;
tika-vin10t0:6454_0: Yaṃ kiñci sakagāmaṃ vā, paragāmampi vā tathā;
tika-vin10t0:6458_0: Pāraṃ gacchati yā tīraṃ, tassā samaṇiyā pana.
tika-vin10t0:6469_0: Nhāyituṃ pivituṃ vāpi, otiṇṇātha nadiṃ puna;
tika-vin10t0:6475_0: Setunā upagantvā vā, yānākāsehi vā sace;
tika-vin10t0:6476_0: Yāti uttaraṇe kāle, padasā garukaṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t0:6481_0: Piṭṭhiyaṃ vā nisīditvā, khandhe vā uttarantiyā;
tika-vin10t0:6491_0: Na doso dutiyā pāsaṃ, uṭṭheti aruṇaṃ sace.
tika-vin10t0:6494_0: Gāmato bahi nikkhamma, tassā dutiyikāya tu.
tika-vin10t0:6514_0: Dvinnaṃ maggaṃ gacchantīnaṃ, ekā gantuṃ no sakkoti;
tika-vin10t0:6518_0: Hoti tassāpi āpatti, saussāhā na hoti ce.
tika-vin10t0:6520_0: Gacchantīsu tathā dvīsu, purimā yāti ekakaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:6521_0: Aññaṃ pana sace maggaṃ, pacchimāpi ca gaṇhati.
tika-vin10t0:6532_0: Pakkantā vāpi vibbhantā, yātā petānaṃ lokaṃ vā;
tika-vin10t0:6533_0: Pakkhasaṅkantā vā naṭṭhā, saddhiṃ yātā sā ce hoti.
tika-vin10t0:6539_0: Agāmake araññe tu, gaṇā ohīyanaṃ mataṃ.
tika-vin10t0:6542_0: Cattāropi ca saṅghādi-sesā tassā na vijjare.
tika-vin10t0:6549_0: Ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ, dvīhi, honti thullaccayā duve.
tika-vin10t0:6554_0: Pucchitvā kārakaṃ saṅghaṃ, chandaṃ datvā gaṇassa vā;
tika-vin10t0:6555_0: Vatte vā pana vattantiṃ, asante kārakepi vā.
tika-vin10t0:6557_0: Bhikkhuniṃ pana ukkhittaṃ, yā osāreti bhikkhunī;
tika-vin10t0:6579_0: Gahaṇe paribhoge ca, sabbatthāpi ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:6582_0: “Avassuto na cāya”nti, ñatvā gaṇhati yā pana.
tika-vin10t0:6600_0: “Nāvassuto”ti ñatvā vā, kupitā vā na gaṇhati;
tika-vin10t0:6601_0: Kulānuddayatā vāpi, uyyojeti ca yā pana.
tika-vin10t0:6611_0: Navame dasame vāpi, vattabbaṃ natthi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t0:6616_0: Yāvatatiyakā aṭṭha, cattāri ca ito tato.
tika-vin10t0:6633_0: Akāle cīvaraṃ dinnaṃ, dinnaṃ kālepi kenaci;
tika-vin10t0:6637_0: Bhājāpeyya ca yā tassā, payoge dukkaṭaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:6639_0: Attanā paṭiladdhaṃ yaṃ, taṃ tu nissaggiyaṃ bhave;
tika-vin10t0:6642_0: Katvā vinayakammaṃ tu, paṭiladdhampi taṃ puna;
tika-vin10t0:6643_0: Tassa cāyamadhippāyo, sevituṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:6656_0: Itaresu ca vatthūnaṃ, payogassa vasā siyā.
tika-vin10t0:6661_0: Tāya vā dīyamānaṃ tu, tassā vissāsameva vā;
tika-vin10t0:6671_0: Tasmiṃ taññeva vā aññaṃ, aññenatthepi vā sati;
tika-vin10t0:6678_0: Aññaṃ cetāpetvā pubbaṃ, pacchā aññaṃ cetāpeyya;
tika-vin10t0:6679_0: Evaṃ saññāyaññaṃ dhaññaṃ, mayhaṃ ānetvā detīti.
tika-vin10t0:6682_0: Lābhe nissaggiyaṃ hoti, tena caññena vābhataṃ.
tika-vin10t0:6691_0: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ, lābhe, tassā nissaggiyaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t0:6701_0: Aṭṭhame navame vāpi, vattabbaṃ natthi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t0:6712_0: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, lābhe nissaggiyaṃ mataṃ;
tika-vin10t0:6726_0: Tato ce uttariṃ yaṃ tu, cetāpeti hi bhikkhunī.
tika-vin10t0:6740_0: Gahaṇe dukkaṭaṃ tassā, pācitti yadi khādati;
tika-vin10t0:6743_0: Dve tayo bhaṇḍike saddhiṃ, saṅkhāditvā sace pana;
tika-vin10t0:6744_0: Ajjhoharati yā tassā, ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:6746_0: Bhinditvā tattha ekekaṃ, miñjaṃ khādantiyā pana;
tika-vin10t0:6755_0: Ekā miñjā palaṇḍussa, bhañjanassa duve siyuṃ;
tika-vin10t0:6768_0: Na doso sati ābādhe, lomake saṃharantiyā;
tika-vin10t0:6775_0: Gaṇḍaṃ tattha vaṇaṃ vāpi, na doso paharantiyā;
tika-vin10t0:6786_0: Pavesāpeti vā tasmiṃ, tassā pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:6798_0: Catunnaṃ vāpi tissannaṃ, ekapabbampi yā pana;
tika-vin10t0:6811_0: Bhuñjato pana bhikkhussa, pānīyaṃ vā vidhūpanaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:6821_0: Khādato khādanaṃ vāpi, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:6823_0: Na doso deti dāpeti, tathā ummattikāya vā;
tika-vin10t0:6827_0: Viññatvā āmakaṃ dhaññaṃ, bhajjitvā yadi bhikkhunī;
tika-vin10t0:6828_0: Koṭṭetvā ca pacitvā ca, pācitti paribhuñjati.
tika-vin10t0:6830_0: Na kevalaṃ tu dhaññānaṃ, gahaṇeyeva dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:6831_0: Haraṇepi ca dhaññānaṃ, tathā sukkhāpane pana.
tika-vin10t0:6840_0: Viññatvā vā sayaṃ tasmā, bhajjanādīni aññato.
tika-vin10t0:6843_0: Kārāpetvāpi katvā vā, ajjhoharati yā pana.
tika-vin10t0:6848_0: Bhajjanādīni katvā vā, kārāpetvāpi vā pana;
tika-vin10t0:6851_0: Viññattiyā panaññāya, laddhaṃ tāya sayampi vā;
tika-vin10t0:6858_0: Ñātakānampi dhaññaṃ tu, āmakaṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:6864_0: Uccāraṃ vāpi passāvaṃ, saṅkāraṃ vā vighāsakaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:6865_0: Chaḍḍeyya vā tirokuṭṭe, chaḍḍāpeyya parehi vā.
tika-vin10t0:6867_0: Hoti pācittiyaṃ tassā, pākārepi ayaṃ nayo;
tika-vin10t0:6876_0: Sabbattha pana bhikkhussa, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:6877_0: Avalañjepi vā ṭhāne, oloketvāpi vā pana.
tika-vin10t0:6883_0: Khette vā nāḷikerādi-ārāme vāpi yā pana;
tika-vin10t0:6886_0: Tāni cattāri vatthūni, sace chaḍḍeti vā sayaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:6889_0: Bhuñjamānā nisīditvā, khette tu harite tathā;
tika-vin10t0:6890_0: Ucchuādīni khādantī, gacchantī pana tattha yā.
tika-vin10t0:6892_0: Chaḍḍeti yadi ucchiṭṭhaṃ, udakaṃ calakāni vā;
tika-vin10t0:6893_0: Hoti pācittiyaṃ tassā, bhikkhuno hoti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:6899_0: Na uṭṭhetaṅkuraṃ yāva, sabbesaṃ tāva dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:6901_0: Lāyitampi manussānaṃ, khettaṃ rakkhati ce puna;
tika-vin10t0:6904_0: Na doso chaḍḍite khette, sabbaṃ chaḍḍentiyā pana;
tika-vin10t0:6908_0: Naccaṃ vā pana gītaṃ vā, vāditaṃ vāpi bhikkhunī;
tika-vin10t0:6915_0: Suṇāti tesaṃ gītampi, ekā pācitti dīpitā.
tika-vin10t0:6917_0: Aññasmimpi disābhāge, naccaṃ passati ce pana;
tika-vin10t0:6918_0: Suṇāti aññato gītaṃ, visuṃ pācittiyo siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t0:6921_0: Naccituṃ gāyituṃ neva, sayaṃ labhati bhikkhunī.
tika-vin10t0:6923_0: “Aññaṃ naccāti vādehi”, iti vattuṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t0:6926_0: Tassā pācitti sabbattha, bhikkhuno hoti dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:6930_0: Ārāmeyeva ṭhatvā vā, yā passati suṇāti vā.
tika-vin10t0:6932_0: Attano ca ṭhitokāsaṃ, āgantvā ca payojitaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:6933_0: Gantvā passantiyā vāpi, tathārūpā hi kāraṇā.
tika-vin10t0:6935_0: Passantiyā tathā maggaṃ, naccaṃ paṭipathepi ca;
tika-vin10t0:6944_0: Santiṭṭhati sace saddhiṃ, purisena ca bhikkhunī.
tika-vin10t0:6946_0: Tassā pācittiyaṃ vuttaṃ, saddhiṃ vā sallapantiyā;
tika-vin10t0:6949_0: Hatthapāsaṃ jahitvā vā, purisassa sace pana;
tika-vin10t0:6952_0: Santiṭṭhati ca yā tassā, dukkaṭaṃ paridīpitaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:6953_0: Anāpatti sace koci, dutiyā viññu vijjati.
tika-vin10t0:6960_0: Adhikaṃ itaraṃ sabbaṃ, paṭhamena samaṃ mataṃ.
tika-vin10t0:6970_0: Atikkameti yā, hoti, dukkaṭaṃ paṭhame pade;
tika-vin10t0:6971_0: Dutiye ca pade tassā, pācitti pariyāputā.
tika-vin10t0:6987_0: Chaṭṭhena sattamaṃ tulyaṃ, aṭṭhame natthi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t0:7005_0: Dvīsu tesu panekekaṃ, dukkaṭaṃ tu karontiyā.
tika-vin10t0:7021_0: Dutiye pana vattabbaṃ, apubbaṃ natthi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t0:7026_0: Anantarāya taṃ pacchā, yā na sibbeyya bhikkhunī.
tika-vin10t0:7031_0: Pacchā sibbati pācitti, nikkhipitvā dhuraṃ sace;
tika-vin10t0:7044_0: Ekasmiṃ cīvare ekā, pañca pañcasu dīpitā;
tika-vin10t0:7064_0: Yā hi bhikkhuni saṅghassa, labhitabbaṃ tu cīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t0:7067_0: Gaṇassāpi ca ekissā, lābhe āpatti dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:7090_0: Gaṇanāya vasenettha, cīvarānaṃ tu tā pana;
tika-vin10t0:7101_0: Ubhosu kaṅkhitāya vā, avoca dukkaṭaṃ jino.
tika-vin10t0:7119_0: Sesaṃ pana asesena, sattamena samaṃ mataṃ;
tika-vin10t0:7124_0: Ekāya tu nipannāya, aparā vā nipajjatu;
tika-vin10t0:7125_0: Nipajjeyyuṃ saheva dve, dvinnaṃ pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:7128_0: Ekāya ca nipannāya, sace ekā nisīdati.
tika-vin10t0:7130_0: Ubho vāpi nisīdanti, samaṃ, ummattikāya vā;
tika-vin10t0:7137_0: Nipajjanti saheva dve, tāsaṃ pācittiyaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t0:7138_0: Ekasmiṃ dukkaṭaṃ dvinnaṃ, vuttaṃ tu dvikadukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:7155_0: Na ca aphāsukāmāya, āpucchā purato pana;
tika-vin10t0:7173_0: Sayaṃ upassayā tamhā, nikkaḍḍhati sace pana.
tika-vin10t0:7176_0: Taṃ nikkaḍḍhantiyā tassā, ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:7191_0: Chaṭṭhe panidha vattabbaṃ, apubbaṃ natthi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t0:7201_0: Na doso saha satthena, khemaṭṭhānāpadāsu vā;
tika-vin10t0:7205_0: Aṭṭhame navame vāpi, anuttānaṃ na vijjati;
tika-vin10t0:7210_0: Katvā ca dhuranikkhepaṃ, pacchā gacchantiyā tathā.
tika-vin10t0:7213_0: Chasu vattabbamevatthi, kinnu nāmidha taṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:7215_0: Tīṇi gantvā ca teneva, paccāgantuṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t0:7232_0: Niddiṭṭhaṃ muninā tāsaṃ, dukkaṭaṃ tu pade pade;
tika-vin10t0:7236_0: Gantvā passanti ce taṃ taṃ, pāṭekkāpattiyo siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t0:7239_0: Bhikkhussa pana sabbattha, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:7245_0: Āsandiṃ vā pallaṅkaṃ vā, māṇanātītaṃ vāḷūpetaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:7257_0: Channaṃ aññataraṃ suttaṃ, yadi kantati bhikkhunī;
tika-vin10t0:7258_0: Yattakaṃ añchitaṃ hatthā, tasmiṃ takkamhi veṭhite.
tika-vin10t0:7263_0: Na doso kantitaṃ suttaṃ, puna kantantiyā pana;
tika-vin10t0:7267_0: Koṭṭanaṃ taṇḍulānaṃ tu, ādiṃ katvāna dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:7274_0: Kiñci kammaṃ akāretvā, kiñci kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:7276_0: Saṅghassa yāgupāne vā, saṅghabhattepi vā tathā;
tika-vin10t0:7279_0: Attano ca anāpatti, tathā ummattikāya vā;
tika-vin10t0:7284_0: Tathā idha panekāhaṃ, parihāro na labbhati.
tika-vin10t0:7291_0: Gihīnaṃ pana yaṃ kiñci, dantaponodakaṃ vinā.
tika-vin10t0:7293_0: Ajjhoharaṇiyaṃ aññaṃ, aññesaṃ tu dadāti yā;
tika-vin10t0:7297_0: Yā na deti ca dāpeti, nikkhamitvāpi dentiyā.
tika-vin10t0:7299_0: Deti bāhiralepaṃ vā, na dosummattikāya vā;
tika-vin10t0:7304_0: Divase tu catutthe taṃ, dhovitvā puna cīvaraṃ.
tika-vin10t0:7309_0: Tassā nissajjite tasmiṃ, vuttaṃ tu dvikadukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:7310_0: Utunīnaṃ abhāve tu, aññāsaṃ puna pariyaye.
tika-vin10t0:7319_0: Attano gāmato aññaṃ, gāmaṃ gacchantiyā pana;
tika-vin10t0:7335_0: Pariyāpuṇeyya ce kiñci, yassa kassaci santike;
tika-vin10t0:7338_0: Lekhe pana anāpatti, dhāraṇāya ca guttiyā;
tika-vin10t0:7339_0: Parittesu ca sabbesu, tathā ummattikāya vā.
tika-vin10t0:7342_0: Dasame natthi vattabbaṃ, navamena samaṃ idaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:7354_0: Dukkaṭaṃ paṭhame pāde, pācitti dutiye siyā.
tika-vin10t0:7357_0: Jātakaṅkhāya vā tassā, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:7360_0: Tā sannipatitā yattha, tāsaṃ gacchati santikaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:7369_0: Akkoseyya ca yā bhikkhuṃ, paribhāseyya vā pana;
tika-vin10t0:7378_0: Yā saṅghaṃ paribhāseyya, tassā pācittiyaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t0:7379_0: Ekaṃ sambahulā vāpi, tatheva itarāya vā.
tika-vin10t0:7385_0: Nimantitāpi vā sace, pavāritāpi vā pana;
tika-vin10t0:7389_0: Yā cajjhoharaṇatthāya, yaṃ kiñci pana āmisaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:7391_0: Paṭiggaṇhāti ce tassā, gahaṇe dukkaṭaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t0:7402_0: Kālikāni ca tīṇeva, paccaye sati bhuñjati;
tika-vin10t0:7406_0: Nimantitā anāpucchā, sāmiṃ bhuñjati ce pana.
tika-vin10t0:7408_0: Kappiyaṃ pana kāretvā, akāretvāpi vā yadi;
tika-vin10t0:7409_0: Paribhuñjati yā tassā, pācitti kriyato siyā.
tika-vin10t0:7415_0: Santaṃ bhāsantiyā dosaṃ, na dosummattikāya vā;
tika-vin10t0:7420_0: Na vasati sace maggo, akhemo vā sace siyā.
tika-vin10t0:7422_0: Ayaṃ abhikkhuko nāma, āvāso pana tattha hi;
tika-vin10t0:7425_0: Pakkantā pakkhasaṅkantā, vibbhantā vā matāpi vā;
tika-vin10t0:7440_0: Pariyesitvāpi vā bhikkhuṃ, na doso alabhantiyā;
tika-vin10t0:7452_0: Iccevaṃ pana nikkhitte, dhure pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:7461_0: Pasākhe pana sañjātaṃ, gaṇḍaṃ rucitameva vā;
tika-vin10t0:7462_0: Anāpucchāva saṅghaṃ vā, gaṇaṃ ekena ekikā.
tika-vin10t0:7465_0: Katesu dukkaṭāniccha, tassā pācittiyo cha ca.
tika-vin10t0:7467_0: “Yamettha atthi kātabbaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ tvaṃ karohi”ti;
tika-vin10t0:7468_0: Āṇāpeti sace evaṃ, so ca sabbaṃ karoti ce.
tika-vin10t0:7470_0: Ekāya pana vācāya, dukkaṭāni panaccha ca;
tika-vin10t0:7473_0: Bhedanādīsu ekaṃ sā, āṇāpeti sace pana;
tika-vin10t0:7474_0: So karoti ca sabbāni, ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:7476_0: Āpucchitvāpi vā viññuṃ, gahetvā dutiyampi vā;
tika-vin10t0:7488_0: Tathā gabbhinisaññāya, na ca gabbhiniyā pana.
tika-vin10t0:7497_0: Dutiye natthi vattabbaṃ, paṭhamena samaṃ mataṃ;
tika-vin10t0:7502_0: Dve vassāni siyāpatti, vuṭṭhāpeyya sace pana.
tika-vin10t0:7507_0: Chasu sikkhitasikkhaṃ yā, dve vassāni akhaṇḍato;
tika-vin10t0:7510_0: Imā hi cha ca sikkhāyo, saṭṭhivassāpi ce pana;
tika-vin10t0:7511_0: Pabbajjāya padātabbā, adatvā na ca kāraye.
tika-vin10t0:7514_0: Catutthe natthi vattabbaṃ, idha saṅghena sammataṃ;
tika-vin10t0:7521_0: Paṭhamena samaṃ ñeyyaṃ, catutthaṃ tu kriyākriyaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:7528_0: Asesena ca sesaṃ tu, paṭhamena samaṃ mataṃ.
tika-vin10t0:7532_0: Sattamampi tathā sabbaṃ, catutthena samaṃ mataṃ.
tika-vin10t0:7536_0: Vuttaṃ tena samaṃ ñeyyaṃ, aṭṭhamaṃ na visesatā.
tika-vin10t0:7539_0: Dve vassāni ca yā kāci, vuṭṭhāpitapavattiniṃ;
tika-vin10t0:7552_0: Vuṭṭhāpetvā tu yā kāci, bhikkhunī sahajīviniṃ;
tika-vin10t0:7553_0: Taṃ gahetvā na gaccheyya, na caññaṃ āṇāpeyya ce.
tika-vin10t0:7566_0: Yā mahūpapadā dve tu, sikkhamānā panādito;
tika-vin10t0:7569_0: Sace gihigatā honti, na ca vā purisaṃ gatā;
tika-vin10t0:7573_0: Vattabbā panubhopetā, evaṃ vattuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:7578_0: Yā aṭṭhārasavassā tu, tato paṭṭhāya sā pana;
tika-vin10t0:7595_0: Pañcame natthi vattabbaṃ, catutthaṃ pañcamampi ca;
tika-vin10t0:7606_0: Laddhe ca cīvare pacchā, asante antarāyike;
tika-vin10t0:7623_0: Mātarā pitarā vātha, nānuññātaṃ tu sāminā;
tika-vin10t0:7627_0: Dvikkhattuṃ pucchitabbaṃ tu, bhikkhunīhi, na bhikkhunā.
tika-vin10t0:7643_0: Dvādase terase vāpi, vattabbaṃ natthi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t0:7652_0: Divasampi ca dhāreti, ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:7655_0: Chattameva ca dhārentī, yadi gacchati dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:7661_0: Puna dhārentiyā tassā, hoti pācittiyaṃ pana.
tika-vin10t0:7677_0: Yā ca dhāreyya saṅghāṇiṃ, yaṃ kiñcipi kaṭūpiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:7690_0: Dhāreti pana yaṃ kiñci, sace sīsūpagādisu;
tika-vin10t0:7691_0: Tassā tassa ca vatthussa, gaṇanāpattiyo siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t0:7693_0: Ābādhapaccayā doso, kiñci dhārentiyā na ca;
tika-vin10t0:7703_0: Sesaṃ tu tatiyeneva, sadisaṃ sabbathā mataṃ;
tika-vin10t0:7726_0: Idaṃ pana samuṭṭhānaṃ, kathinena samaṃ mataṃ;
tika-vin10t0:7731_0: Vinaye ca katokāsaṃ, suttaṃ pucchantiyāpi ca.
tika-vin10t0:7740_0: Dukkaṭaṃ paṭhame pāde, pācitti dutiye siyā;
tika-vin10t0:7743_0: Yassā saṃkaccikaṃ naṭṭhaṃ, acchinnaṃ vāpi kenaci;
tika-vin10t0:7753_0: Agilānā sace sappiṃ, laddhaṃ viññattiyā sayaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:7770_0: Bhuñjantiyā tu viññatvā, aṭṭhasupi ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:7774_0: Sekhiyā pana ye dhammā, uddiṭṭhā pañcasattati;
tika-vin10t0:7788_0: Suṇanti vinaye hi te ye hite;
tika-vin10t0:7818_0: Pabbājeti sace taṃ so, sayamevāpi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:7820_0: Sāmaṇeropi vattabbo, daharo natthi tattha ce;
tika-vin10t0:7826_0: Purisaṃ bhikkhuto añño, pabbājeti na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t0:7827_0: Itthiṃ bhikkhunito añño, pabbājeti na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:7829_0: Sāmaṇeropi vā dātuṃ, sāmaṇerīpi vā tathā;
tika-vin10t0:7832_0: Sayameva ca yaṃ kiñci, pabbājentena bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t0:7836_0: Sarīre pīḷakā vāpi, kacchu vā tassa honti ce.
tika-vin10t0:7838_0: Mātā yathā niyaṃputtaṃ, na jigucchati sabbaso;
tika-vin10t0:7853_0: Atha hatthepi vā tassa, adatvā sayameva taṃ;
tika-vin10t0:7856_0: Nivāseti anāṇatto, so pārupati vā sayaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:7857_0: Apanetvā tato sabbaṃ, puna dātabbameva taṃ.
tika-vin10t0:7859_0: Bhikkhunā tu sahatthena, tathā āṇattiyāpi vā;
tika-vin10t0:7860_0: Dinnaṃ vaṭṭati kāsāvaṃ, nādinnaṃ pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:7862_0: Tasseva santakaṃ vāpi, kā kathā attasantake;
tika-vin10t0:7868_0: Sace ekapadaṃ vāpi, deti ekakkharampi vā;
tika-vin10t0:7869_0: Paṭipāṭiṃ virajjhitvā, gahitaṃ ce na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:7871_0: Tikkhattuṃ yadi vā deti, buddhaṃ saraṇameva vā;
tika-vin10t0:7872_0: Tathā sesesu cevampi, na dinnāneva honti hi.
tika-vin10t0:7878_0: Na hoti pana pabbajjā, ubhatosuddhiyā vinā.
tika-vin10t0:7894_0: Dātabbaṃ tassa kālena, sace yāgu bhavissati.
tika-vin10t0:7899_0: Cīvare yāni vattāni, vuttāni hi mahesinā;
tika-vin10t0:7920_0: Ekekassa ubhinnaṃ vā, nālaye sati bhijjati.
tika-vin10t0:7926_0: Yācitassa na dosova, vasituṃ nissayaṃ vinā.
tika-vin10t0:7957_0: Tathā kaṇṇikakeso vā, thūlakesopi vā tathā.
tika-vin10t0:7971_0: Tathā ṭaṅkitakaṇṇo vā, pūtikaṇṇopi vā pana;
tika-vin10t0:7980_0: Niccavissavanāso vā, yo vā pana mahāmukho;
tika-vin10t0:7993_0: Sukhumova ṭhito, taṃ ce, pabbājetumpi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:8010_0: Vikaṭo vāpi paṇho vā, tathā ubbaddhapiṇḍiko.
tika-vin10t0:8013_0: Tathā piṭṭhikapādo vā, mahāpaṇhipi vā pana.
tika-vin10t0:8015_0: Vaṅkapādo naro yo vā, gaṇṭhikaṅgulikopi vā;
tika-vin10t0:8022_0: “Sāmaṇerajja mā khāda, mā bhuñja ca pivā”ti ca;
tika-vin10t0:8031_0: Yāguṃ vā pana bhattaṃ vā, dassetvā kira bhāsituṃ;
tika-vin10t0:8040_0: Udakaṃ vā pavesetuṃ, na ca vaṭṭati bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t0:8050_0: Vāritā yassa pabbajjā, nāsetabboti so mato;
tika-vin10t0:8051_0: Tividhe pana te ñatvā, pabbājentassa dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:8057_0: Sayameva ca yo tattha, pabbajitvā na gaṇhati;
tika-vin10t0:8061_0: Yo ca pabbajito hutvā, bhikkhuvassāni gaṇhati.
tika-vin10t0:8070_0: Theyyasaṃvāsako nāma, tāva esa na vuccati”.
tika-vin10t0:8077_0: Hoti titthiyapakkanto, liṅge tesaṃ tu nissite.
tika-vin10t0:8085_0: Morapiñchādikaṃ tesaṃ, liṅgaṃ gaṇhāti vā sace;
tika-vin10t0:8086_0: Sārato ceva vā tesaṃ, pabbajjaṃ laddhimeva vā.
tika-vin10t0:8095_0: Nāgo vāpi supaṇṇo vā, yakkho sakkopi vā idha;
tika-vin10t0:8103_0: Dūsetvā pana so neva, bhikkhunīdūsako siyā.
tika-vin10t0:8106_0: Labhateva ca pabbajjaṃ, sā ca neva parājitā.
tika-vin10t0:8110_0: Karoto dukkaṭaṃ hoti, na kuppati sace kataṃ.
tika-vin10t0:8113_0: Sesesupi ayaṃ ñeyyo, nayo sabbattha viññunā.
tika-vin10t0:8119_0: Apatto tesamosāro, kato ce pana rūhati.
tika-vin10t0:8127_0: Osāretvā kataṃ kammaṃ, na ca kuppati kappati.
tika-vin10t0:8134_0: Anupubbena sāvetvā, tesaṃ nāmaṃ tu tena ca;
tika-vin10t0:8135_0: Ekato anusāvetvā, katampi ca na kuppati.
tika-vin10t0:8149_0: Nimittena nimittaṃ tu, ghaṭetvā pana sammatā.
tika-vin10t0:8152_0: Baddhā nāma siyā sīmā, sā tisampattisaṃyutā.
tika-vin10t0:8155_0: Iti baddhā tidhā vuttā, abaddhāpi tidhā matā.
tika-vin10t0:8160_0: Jātassare samudde vā, nadiyā vā samantato;
tika-vin10t0:8169_0: Imā dve pana sīmāyo, vaḍḍhanti parisāvasā;
tika-vin10t0:8176_0: Tasmā so hatthapāse vā, kātabbo bahi vā pana.
tika-vin10t0:8179_0: Ñatvā pamāṇaṃ sodhetvā, sīmaṃ bandheyya paṇḍito.
tika-vin10t0:8184_0: Pabbataṃ vanaṃ pāsāṇaṃ, rukkhaṃ maggañca vammikaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:8187_0: Tesu tīṇi nimittāni, ādiṃ katvā samantato;
tika-vin10t0:8218_0: Saṅghassa pātimokkho ca, pārisuddhi gaṇassa ca;
tika-vin10t0:8224_0: Ayameva nayo ñeyyo, sesesupi ca viññunā;
tika-vin10t0:8235_0: Uddisante samappā vā, āgacchanti sace pana;
tika-vin10t0:8236_0: Uddiṭṭhaṃ taṃ suuddiṭṭhaṃ, sāvetabbaṃ tu sesakaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:8239_0: Pārisuddhi tu kattabbā, mūle tesaṃ, sace bahū.
tika-vin10t0:8248_0: No ce adhiṭṭhaheyyassa, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:8251_0: Tathā dhammena vaggena, samaggena ca dhammato.
tika-vin10t0:8259_0: Ekassa pārisuddhiṃ te, ānayitvā tayo janā;
tika-vin10t0:8265_0: Dhammena pana vaggo hi, katamo so uposatho;
tika-vin10t0:8268_0: Ekassa pārisuddhiṃ te, ānayitvā tayo janā;
tika-vin10t0:8276_0: Vagge samagge vaggoti, saññino vimatissa vā;
tika-vin10t0:8289_0: Uposatho na kātabbo, dine vā anuposathe.
tika-vin10t0:8292_0: Āvāso vā anāvāso, na gantabbo kudācanaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:8312_0: Dasavaggena abbhānaṃ, vinā sabbaṃ tu vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:8314_0: Kammaṃ vīsativaggena, na kattabbaṃ na kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t0:8318_0: Catuvaggena kattabbe, sesesu ca ayaṃ nayo.
tika-vin10t0:8324_0: Katvā pana karontānaṃ, tathā, sesaṃ tu vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:8335_0: Ajjhokāsepi vā vassaṃ, upagantuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:8346_0: Diṭṭhiṃ vā tassa kukkuccaṃ, vinodessāmahanti vā.
tika-vin10t0:8352_0: Dhammassa savanatthāya, gantuṃ pana na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:8355_0: Iccevaṃ katikā pubbaṃ, katā ce pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:8370_0: Sace pāpuṇituṃ gacchaṃ, na sakkoteva vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:8372_0: Vaje satthepi nāvāyaṃ, tīsu ṭhānesu bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t0:8378_0: Yena kenantarāyena, vassaṃ nopagato hi yo;
tika-vin10t0:8381_0: Vassaṃ anupagantvā vā, tadaheva ca gacchati;
tika-vin10t0:8382_0: Bahiddhā eva sattāhaṃ, upagantvāpi vā pana.
tika-vin10t0:8384_0: Vītināmeti ce tassa, purimāpi na vijjati;
tika-vin10t0:8385_0: Paṭissave ca bhikkhussa, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:8387_0: Vassaṃ panupagantvā ca, uṭṭhāpetvā na cāruṇaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:8390_0: Antoyeva ca sattāhaṃ, nivattantassa tassa tu;
tika-vin10t0:8391_0: Anāpattīti ko vādo, vasitvā bahi gacchato.
tika-vin10t0:8396_0: Gahitaṃ suggahitaṃ hoti, chinnavasso na hoti so;
tika-vin10t0:8397_0: Labhateva pavāretuṃ, na doso koci vijjati.
tika-vin10t0:8400_0: Nicchārite ca tikkhattuṃ, vassaṃ upagato siyā.
tika-vin10t0:8402_0: Ādiṃ tu navamiṃ katvā, gantuṃ vaṭṭati bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t0:8403_0: Āgacchatu ca pacchā so, mā vā doso na vijjati.
tika-vin10t0:8408_0: Tevācī dvekavācī ca, saṅghe ca gaṇapuggale.
tika-vin10t0:8410_0: Etā pana munindena, vuttā nava pavāraṇā;
tika-vin10t0:8414_0: Ñattiṃ ṭhapetvā saṅghena, kattabbā hi pavāraṇā.
tika-vin10t0:8417_0: Sayaṃ yāva pavāreyya, tāva ukkuṭikañhi so.
tika-vin10t0:8419_0: Ñattiṃ vatvā pavāreyyuṃ, cattāro vā tayopi vā;
tika-vin10t0:8422_0: Aññamaññaṃ pavāreyyuṃ, vinā ñattiṃ duve janā;
tika-vin10t0:8428_0: Pañca yasmiṃ panāvāse, cattāro vā tayopi vā;
tika-vin10t0:8443_0: Chandaṃ vā pārisuddhiṃ vā, gahetvā vā pavāraṇaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:8446_0: Sace so saṅghamappatvā, vibbhameyya mareyya vā;
tika-vin10t0:8447_0: Nāhaṭañceva taṃ sabbaṃ, patvā cevaṃ siyāhaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:8449_0: Saṅghaṃ patvā pamatto vā, sutto vā khittacittako;
tika-vin10t0:8473_0: Na ca vaṭṭanti morassa, piñchena parisibbitā.
tika-vin10t0:8476_0: Ajinassa ca cammena, na vaṭṭati parikkhaṭā.
tika-vin10t0:8478_0: Puṭādiṃ apanetvā vā, chinditvā vāpi sabbaso;
tika-vin10t0:8481_0: Sabbāpi pana dhāretuṃ, na ca vaṭṭanti pādukā;
tika-vin10t0:8487_0: Gonakaṃ kuttakaṃ cittaṃ, paṭikaṃ paṭalikampi ca;
tika-vin10t0:8496_0: Heṭṭhā akappiye paccatthare sati na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t0:8499_0: Āsandiṃ pana pallaṅkaṃ, ṭhapetvā tūlikampi ca;
tika-vin10t0:8500_0: Sesaṃ pana ca sabbampi, labhate gihisantakaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:8510_0: Saṅghassa santakaṃ gehaṃ, santakaṃ bhikkhunopi vā;
tika-vin10t0:8516_0: Sā hi sammutikā nāma, yā hi saṅghena sammatā;
tika-vin10t0:8532_0: Ettha pakkañca vutthañca, sabbaṃ vaṭṭati āmisaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:8540_0: Bhikkhuṃ ṭhapetvā aññesaṃ, hatthato ca paṭiggaho;
tika-vin10t0:8541_0: Tesañca sannidhi anto- vuttaṃ bhikkhussa vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:8543_0: Bhikkhussa bhikkhuniyā vā, santakaṃ saṅghikampi vā;
tika-vin10t0:8544_0: Antovutthañca pakkañca, ubhinnaṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:8550_0: Pakkaṃ taṃ pana sattāhaṃ, vaṭṭateva nirāmisaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:8562_0: Honti dosakarā bhuttā, abhuttaṃ tatiyampi ca.
tika-vin10t0:8564_0: Ambaṃ jambu ca cocañca, mocañca madhu muddikā;
tika-vin10t0:8571_0: Pacchā parissavaṃ katvā, pātuṃ vaṭṭati pānakaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:8579_0: Sabbo puppharaso vutto, madhukassa rasaṃ vinā;
tika-vin10t0:8623_0: Kathinassa ca kiṃ mūlaṃ, kiṃ vatthu kā ca bhūmiyo;
tika-vin10t0:8626_0: Mūlamekaṃ, siyā vatthu, tividhaṃ, bhūmiyo cha ca;
tika-vin10t0:8629_0: Saṅgho mūlanti niddiṭṭhaṃ, vatthu hoti ticīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t0:8630_0: Khomādīni cha vuttāni, cīvarāni cha bhūmiyo.
tika-vin10t0:8635_0: Dhovanañca vicāro ca, chedanaṃ bandhanampi ca;
tika-vin10t0:8642_0: Savanāsā ca sīmā ca, sahubbhāroti aṭṭhimā.
tika-vin10t0:8648_0: Gantvā pana vihāraṃ so, aññaṃ sukhavihārikaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:8650_0: Tattha taṃ viharantova, karoti yadi cīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t0:8657_0: Karontasseva naṭṭhaṃ vā, daḍḍhaṃ vā nāsanantikā.
tika-vin10t0:8665_0: Puna vutte “na sakkomi, dātunti tava cīvaraṃ”;
tika-vin10t0:8681_0: Tayopi kathinubbhārā, na tu saṅghā, na bhikkhuto.
tika-vin10t0:8690_0: Tattha yo cīvaruppādo, ānisaṃsā ca pañcime.
tika-vin10t0:8700_0: Tattha sīmāya detīti, antosīmaṃ gatehi tu;
tika-vin10t0:8703_0: Katikāya ca dinnaṃ ye, vihārā ekalābhakā;
tika-vin10t0:8706_0: Saṅghassa dhuvakārā hi, yattha karīyanti tattha ca;
tika-vin10t0:8709_0: Saṅghassa pana yaṃ dinnaṃ, ujubhūtena cetasā;
tika-vin10t0:8713_0: Thokā vā bahu vā bhikkhū, samabhāgova vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:8715_0: Vassaṃvuṭṭhassa saṅghassa, cīvaraṃ deti yaṃ pana;
tika-vin10t0:8718_0: Yāguyā pana bhatte vā, detiādissa ce pana;
tika-vin10t0:8721_0: Puggalaṃ pana uddissa, cīvaraṃ yaṃ tu dīyati;
tika-vin10t0:8722_0: Puggalodissakaṃ nāma, dānaṃ taṃ tu pavuccati.
tika-vin10t0:8725_0: Ayaṃ mayhaṃ parikkhāro, mātuyā pitunopi vā.
tika-vin10t0:8728_0: Na hoti pana taṃ tesaṃ, saṅghasseva ca santakaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:8730_0: Pañcannaṃ accaye dānaṃ, na ca rūhati kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t0:8731_0: Saṅghasseva ca taṃ hoti, gihīnaṃ pana rūhati.
tika-vin10t0:8733_0: Bhikkhu vā sāmaṇero vā, kālaṃ bhikkhunupassaye;
tika-vin10t0:8736_0: Bhikkhunī sāmaṇerī vā, vihārasmiṃ sace matā;
tika-vin10t0:8737_0: Honti tassā parikkhārā, bhikkhunīnaṃ tu santakā.
tika-vin10t0:8742_0: Evaṃ dinnavidhiṃ ñatvā, matassa vāmatassa vā;
tika-vin10t0:8749_0: Pattesu alliyā pattaṃ, tathā pattañca nīliyā.
tika-vin10t0:8751_0: Kusumbhaṃ kiṃsukaṃ pupphe, tace loddañca kaṇḍulaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:8752_0: Ṭhapetvā rajanaṃ sabbaṃ, phalaṃ sabbampi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:8755_0: Alliyā pana pattena, dhovituṃ pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:8757_0: Cīvarānaṃ kathā sesā, paṭhame kathine pana;
tika-vin10t0:8774_0: Ratticchedo kathaṃ vutto, vattabhedo kathaṃ bhave?
tika-vin10t0:8798_0: Oṇojanaṃ tathā bhattaṃ, labhate pañcime pana.
tika-vin10t0:8805_0: Etāni pana cattāri, vuttāni ca mahesinā;
tika-vin10t0:8812_0: Etesaṃ tu catunnampi, samattā samathā matā.
tika-vin10t0:8820_0: Vivādo sammati dvīhi, anuvādo catūhi ca;
tika-vin10t0:8838_0: Lajjī alajjī bāloti, kena sakkā vijānituṃ?
tika-vin10t0:8844_0: Nāpajjati ca sañcicca, āpattiṃ na ca gūhati;
tika-vin10t0:8853_0: Alajjī sānuvādo ca, asucī kammato ca yo;
tika-vin10t0:8862_0: Yathā ca tiṇapaṇṇena, channaṃ gūthañca muttakaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:8863_0: Na ca vāyati duggandhaṃ, vūpasammati taṅkhaṇe.
tika-vin10t0:8866_0: Diṭṭhāvikammikañceva, yo ca tattha na hoti taṃ.
tika-vin10t0:8873_0: Rukkhe vā pana kuṭṭevā, aṭṭāne thambhakesu vā;
tika-vin10t0:8880_0: Kataṃ taṃ mallakaṃ nāma, sabbesampi na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:8886_0: Vaṭṭaṃ vā caturassaṃ vā, katakaṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:8891_0: Osaṇheyya sake kese, yo hatthaphaṇakena vā;
tika-vin10t0:8900_0: Ādāse udapatte vā, yattha katthaci attano;
tika-vin10t0:8906_0: Naccaṃ vā pana gītaṃ vā, vāditaṃ vāpi bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t0:8907_0: Daṭṭhuṃ vā pana sotuṃ vā, gacchato hoti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:8915_0: “Passissāmī”ti naccaṃ vā, gītaṃ vā pana vāditaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:8916_0: Vihārato vihāraṃ vā, gacchato hoti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:8919_0: Ṭhatvā gīvaṃ pasāretvā, passatopi ca vīthiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:8921_0: Kesā dīghā na dhāreyyā, yo dhāreyyassa dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:8922_0: Dvaṅgulaṃ vā dumāsaṃ vā, tato uddhaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:8924_0: Nakhe nāsikalomāni, dīghāni na tu dhāraye;
tika-vin10t0:8925_0: Na ca vīsatimaṭṭhaṃ vā, kātuṃ vaṭṭati bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t0:8927_0: Kappāpeyya visuṃ massuṃ, dāṭhikaṃ vā ṭhapeyya yo;
tika-vin10t0:8928_0: Saṃharāpeyya vā lomaṃ, sambādhe tassa dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:8930_0: Chindato dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, kese kattarikāya vā;
tika-vin10t0:8937_0: Na doso chindato aṅgaṃ, mocentassa ca lohitaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:8942_0: Na bhuñje na pive naggo, na khāde na ca sāyaye;
tika-vin10t0:8943_0: Na dade na ca gaṇheyya, na gaccheyyapi añjasaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:8946_0: Parikammaṃ na kātabbaṃ, na naggena ca kāraye.
tika-vin10t0:8951_0: Yattha katthaci peḷāyaṃ, bhuñjituṃ na ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t0:8955_0: Ekamañcepi vā tesaṃ, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:8958_0: Kiñci kīḷaṃ na kīḷeyya, palitaṃ na ca gāhaye.
tika-vin10t0:8963_0: Agilāno sace bhikkhu, chattaṃ dhāreyya dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:8972_0: Lokāyataṃ na vāceyya, na ca taṃ pariyāpuṇe;
tika-vin10t0:8975_0: Na ca vaṭṭati dhāretuṃ, sabbā cāmaribījanī;
tika-vin10t0:8976_0: Na cālimpeyya dāyaṃ vā, na ca lañje mukhampi ca.
tika-vin10t0:8987_0: Lasuṇaṃ na ca khādeyya, sace nākallako siyā;
tika-vin10t0:8997_0: Na ca dhāraṇiyā uṇhī, sabbā bāhiralomikā.
tika-vin10t0:9017_0: Dīghato ca diyaḍḍhaṃ vā, dvihatthanti kurundiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:9026_0: Suddhaṃ tamālapattañca, paṇṇesu na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:9033_0: Yadetaṃ tividhaṃ tūlaṃ, bhisiyaṃ taṃ akappiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:9034_0: Missaṃ tamālapattaṃ tu, sabbattha pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:9037_0: Kārentassa karoto vā, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:9039_0: Jātakaṃ pana vatthuṃ vā, kārāpetuṃ parehi vā;
tika-vin10t0:9042_0: Samānāsaniko nāma, dvīhi vassehi yo pana;
tika-vin10t0:9043_0: Vuḍḍho vā daharo vāpi, vassenekena vā pana.
tika-vin10t0:9048_0: Heṭṭhā dīghāsanaṃ tiṇṇaṃ, yaṃ pahoti nisīdituṃ;
tika-vin10t0:9049_0: Ekamañcepi pīṭhe vā, dve nisīdanti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:9062_0: Pātova gāhite añño, bhikkhu senāsane pana;
tika-vin10t0:9063_0: Sace yācati āgantvā, vattabbo gāhitanti so.
tika-vin10t0:9069_0: Gahetvā kappiyaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ, datvā tassattano pana.
tika-vin10t0:9072_0: Gāhitaṃ gaṇha”iccevaṃ, vatvā gacchati so disaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:9074_0: Uppabbajati ce tattha, gataṭṭhāne, na labbhati;
tika-vin10t0:9075_0: Gahetuṃ tassa sampattaṃ, saṅghikaṃyeva taṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:9077_0: Manusse sammukhā tattha, paṭicchāpeti ce pana;
tika-vin10t0:9080_0: Ārāmo ca vihāro ca, vatthūni duvidhassapi;
tika-vin10t0:9084_0: Vāsi pharasu kuddālo, kuṭhārī ca nikhādanaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:9086_0: Valli veḷu tiṇaṃ paṇṇaṃ, muñjapabbajameva ca;
tika-vin10t0:9087_0: Mattikā dārubhaṇḍañca, pañcamaṃ tu yathāha ca.
tika-vin10t0:9098_0: Bhikkhunā garubhaṇḍaṃ tu, saṅghena hi gaṇena vā;
tika-vin10t0:9115_0: Attanā paṭiladdhaṃ taṃ, lohabhaṇḍaṃ tu kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t0:9122_0: Na doso saṅghike atthi, gihīnaṃ santakesu vā.
tika-vin10t0:9140_0: Kiñci saṅghassa dinnaṃ ce, taṃ sabbaṃ garubhaṇḍakaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:9142_0: Nhāpitassa ca saṇḍāso, kattarī ca mahattarī;
tika-vin10t0:9145_0: Valli saṅghassa dinnā vā, tatthajātāpi rakkhitā;
tika-vin10t0:9151_0: Nāḷikerassa hīre vā, vāke vā pana kenaci;
tika-vin10t0:9154_0: Veḷu saṅghassa dinno vā, rakkhito tatthajātako;
tika-vin10t0:9160_0: Muñjādīsupi yaṃ kiñci, muṭṭhimattaṃ garuṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t0:9164_0: Mattikā pakatī vāpi, pañcavaṇṇā sudhāpi vā.
tika-vin10t0:9166_0: Silesādīsu vā kiñci, dinnaṃ vā tatthajātakaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:9172_0: Rakkhitaṃ gopitaṃ vāpi, gahetabbaṃ tu gaṇhatā;
tika-vin10t0:9173_0: Samakaṃ atirekaṃ vā, datvā phātikameva vā.
tika-vin10t0:9200_0: Bījanī pacchi caṅkoṭaṃ, sabbā sammuñjanī garu.
tika-vin10t0:9202_0: Yaṃ kiñci bhūmattharaṇaṃ, yo koci kaṭasārako;
tika-vin10t0:9220_0: Patto kañcanako ceva, thālakaṃ kuṇḍikāpi ca;
tika-vin10t0:9242_0: Patto avassikaṃ bhikkhuṃ, likhitvā ṭhapitopi ca.
tika-vin10t0:9248_0: Gahetuṃ labhati taṃ pacchā, sāmaṇerassa pāḷiyā.
tika-vin10t0:9251_0: Ajja so upasampanno, atītā ṭhitikā siyā.
tika-vin10t0:9253_0: Sace pana salākā tu, laddhā bhattaṃ na taṃdine;
tika-vin10t0:9254_0: Laddhaṃ, punadine tassa, gāhetabbaṃ, na saṃsayo.
tika-vin10t0:9257_0: Visuñhi ṭhitikā katvā, dātabbā tu salākikā.
tika-vin10t0:9260_0: Laddhamuttaribhaṅgaṃ vā, na laddhaṃ bhattameva vā.
tika-vin10t0:9262_0: Yena yena hi yaṃ yaṃ tu, na laddhaṃ, tassa tassa ca;
tika-vin10t0:9263_0: Taṃ taṃ punadine cāpi, gāhetabbanti dīpitaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:9289_0: Oguṇṭhanaṃ na kātabbaṃ, sīse cīvarameva vā;
tika-vin10t0:9290_0: Na hi tena ca dhotabbā, pādā pānīyavārinā.
tika-vin10t0:9316_0: Iccevaṃ pana vattabbaṃ, deyyaṃ senāsanampi ca.
tika-vin10t0:9324_0: Sahasā pavise nāpi, sahasā na ca nikkhame;
tika-vin10t0:9334_0: Nakkhattaṃ tena yogo ca, jānitabbā disāpi ca.
tika-vin10t0:9339_0: Sahasā ubbhajitvā vā, na ca vaccakuṭiṃ vise;
tika-vin10t0:9340_0: Ukkāsitvā bahi ṭhatvā, pavise saṇikaṃ pana.
tika-vin10t0:9342_0: Vaccaṃ na nitthunantena, kātabbaṃ pana bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t0:9343_0: Khādato dantakaṭṭhaṃ vā, karoto hoti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:9345_0: Vaccaṃ pana na kātabbaṃ, bahiddhā vaccadoṇiyā;
tika-vin10t0:9349_0: Chaḍḍeyya na ca pāteyya, kheḷaṃ passāvadoṇiyā.
tika-vin10t0:9354_0: Nācameyya sace vaccaṃ, katvā yo salile sati;
tika-vin10t0:9357_0: Sasaddaṃ nācametabbaṃ, katvā capu capūti ca;
tika-vin10t0:9364_0: Chaḍḍeyya kumbhi rittā ce, kumbhiṃ pūreyya vārinā.
tika-vin10t0:9366_0: Anajjhiṭṭho hi vuḍḍhena, pātimokkhaṃ na uddise;
tika-vin10t0:9367_0: Dhammaṃ na ca bhaṇe, pañhaṃ, na puccheyya na vissaje.
tika-vin10t0:9373_0: Anāpucchā hi sajjhāyo, na kātabbo kadācipi.
tika-vin10t0:9375_0: Uddesopi na kātabbo, paripucchāya kā kathā;
tika-vin10t0:9376_0: Na ca dhammo kathetabbo, bhikkhunā dhammacakkhunā.
tika-vin10t0:9378_0: Na dīpo vijjhāpetabbo, kātabbo vā na ceva so;
tika-vin10t0:9382_0: Tampi cīvarakaṇṇena, kāyena na ca ghaṭṭaye.
tika-vin10t0:9384_0: Purato neva therānaṃ, nhāyeyya na panūpari;
tika-vin10t0:9385_0: Uttaraṃ otarantānaṃ, dade maggaṃ, na ghaṭṭaye.
tika-vin10t0:9393_0: Tasmā hi vattaṃ pūreyya, jinaputto vicakkhaṇo;
tika-vin10t0:9398_0: Kāyaṃ ūruṃ thanaṃ vāpi, vivaritvāna bhikkhunī;
tika-vin10t0:9399_0: Attano aṅgajātaṃ vā, bhikkhussa na ca dassaye.
tika-vin10t0:9401_0: Bhikkhunā saha yaṃ kiñci, sampayojentiyāpi ca;
tika-vin10t0:9402_0: Tato bhāsantiyā bhikkhuṃ, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:9404_0: Na ca bhikkhuniyā dīghaṃ, dhāreyya kāyabandhanaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:9407_0: Vilīvena ca paṭṭena, cammapaṭṭena vā tathā;
tika-vin10t0:9410_0: Na phāsukā nametabbā, dukkaṭaṃ tu namentiyā;
tika-vin10t0:9413_0: Hatthaṃ vā hatthakocchaṃ vā, pādaṃ vā mukhamūrukaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:9414_0: Koṭṭāpeti sace tassā, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:9416_0: Na mukhaṃ limpitabbaṃ tu, na cuṇṇetabbameva ca;
tika-vin10t0:9419_0: Aṅgarāgo na kātabbo, mukharāgopi vā tathā;
tika-vin10t0:9420_0: Avaṅgaṃ na ca kātabbaṃ, na kātabbaṃ visesakaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:9423_0: Ṭhātabbaṃ na ca sāloke, sanaccaṃ na ca kāraye.
tika-vin10t0:9426_0: Suraṃ vā pana maṃsaṃ vā, paṇṇaṃ vā vikkiṇantiyā.
tika-vin10t0:9428_0: Vaḍḍhiṃ vāpi vaṇijjaṃ vā, payojetuṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t0:9429_0: Tirīṭaṃ kañcukaṃ vāpi, yadi dhāreti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:9431_0: Dāso vā pana dāsī vā, tathā kammakaropi vā;
tika-vin10t0:9434_0: Na ca bhikkhuniyā sabba-nīlādiṃ pana cīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t0:9435_0: Dhāretabbaṃ, na dhāreyya, sabbaṃ namatakampi ca.
tika-vin10t0:9440_0: Dūratova ca passitvā, bhikkhuṃ bhikkhuniyā pana;
tika-vin10t0:9443_0: Bhikkhuṃ pana ca passitvā, pattaṃ bhikkhaṃ carantiyā;
tika-vin10t0:9455_0: Yassā pabbajjakāle tu, gabbho vuṭṭhāti itthiyā;
tika-vin10t0:9456_0: Putto yadi ca tassāpi, dātabbā dutiyā tathā.
tika-vin10t0:9459_0: Maṇḍetumpi ure katvā, setuṃ labhati sā pana.
tika-vin10t0:9461_0: Ṭhapetvā sahaseyyaṃ tu, tasmiṃ dutiyikāya hi;
tika-vin10t0:9464_0: Vibbhameneva sā hoti, yasmā idha abhikkhunī;
tika-vin10t0:9473_0: Na vaccakuṭiyā vacco, kātabbo yāya kāyaci;
tika-vin10t0:9476_0: Na ca vaṭṭati sabbattha, pallaṅkena nisīdituṃ;
tika-vin10t0:9479_0: Na ca bhikkhuniyāraññe, vatthabbaṃ tu kathañcana;
tika-vin10t0:9480_0: Atitthe naratitthe vā, nhāyituṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:9483_0: Nhāyeyya paṭisote vā, tassā āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:9486_0: Dinnaṃ abhutvā aññassa, dentiyā pana dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:9510_0: Cīvarādiparikkhāraṃ, saṅgho yaṃ deti tassa hi.
tika-vin10t0:9513_0: Evaṃ saṅghassa dānaṃ tu, hoti taṃ kammalakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:9516_0: Sammuti ceva dānañca, paṭiggāho ca sattamo.
tika-vin10t0:9522_0: Tassa nissāraṇā vuttā, yā sā nissāraṇāti hi.
tika-vin10t0:9548_0: Sammuti nāma sīmādi, sā pañcadasadhā matā;
tika-vin10t0:9573_0: Imesaṃ tu vasā ñeyyā, dasekā samanubhāsanā.
tika-vin10t0:9584_0: Sesāni apaloketvā, kātuṃ pana na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t0:9605_0: Na parāmasati vatthuñca, saṅghaṃ puggalameva vā.
tika-vin10t0:9607_0: Na parāmasati ñattiṃ vā, pacchā ñattiṃ ṭhapeti vā;
tika-vin10t0:9611_0: Na parāmasati vatthuṃ vā, saṅghaṃ puggalameva vā.
tika-vin10t0:9617_0: Vuttā uposathe tāva, khandhake sabbaso mayā.
tika-vin10t0:9620_0: Chando ca na panānīto, paṭikkosanti sammukhā.
tika-vin10t0:9622_0: Evaṃ tivaṅgiko doso, parisāya vasā siyā;
tika-vin10t0:9623_0: Āgatā kammapattā ca, chando ca na panāgato.
tika-vin10t0:9626_0: Āgatā kammapattā ca, chandopi ca samāhaṭo.
tika-vin10t0:9631_0: Catutthikā siyuṃ dosā, dasa dve parisāvasā;
tika-vin10t0:9632_0: Evaṃ dvādasadhā ettha, kammāni hi vipajjare.
tika-vin10t0:9637_0: Suṇātha nipuṇe pañhe, gūḷhatthe bhaṇato mama.
tika-vin10t0:9639_0: Divāpajjati no rattiṃ, rattiṃyeva ca no divā;
tika-vin10t0:9640_0: Kathañca paṭiggaṇhanto, na gaṇhanto kathaṃ pana.
tika-vin10t0:9646_0: Asamāpattilābhissa, kā ca nāmassa sā bhave.
tika-vin10t0:9648_0: Garukaṃ bhaṇato saccaṃ, alikaṃ bhaṇato siyuṃ;
tika-vin10t0:9649_0: Lahuṃ saccaṃ bhaṇantassa, musā ca bhaṇato garuṃ.
tika-vin10t0:9651_0: Pavisanto ca ārāmaṃ, āpajjati na nikkhamaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:9652_0: Nikkhamantova āpatti, na ceva pavisaṃ pana;
tika-vin10t0:9659_0: Āpajjati ca dhārento, adhārento tatheva ca;
tika-vin10t0:9660_0: Dvinnaṃ mātā pitā sāva, kathaṃ hoti? Bhaṇāhi me.
tika-vin10t0:9663_0: Gaṇhāpeti paraṃ gabbhaṃ, tasmā mātāpitā ca sā.
tika-vin10t0:9665_0: Gāme vā yadi vāraññe, yaṃ paresaṃ mamāyitaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:9666_0: Na harantova taṃ theyyā, kathaṃ pārājiko bhave;
tika-vin10t0:9673_0: Methunaṃ tāya katvāpi, na so pārājiko kathaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:9678_0: Bahiddhā gehato bhikkhu, itthī gabbhantaraṃ gatā;
tika-vin10t0:9679_0: Chiddaṃ gehassa nevatthi, kathaṃ methunato cuto;
tika-vin10t0:9685_0: Sabbattha nipuṇā dhīrā, ime pañhe bhaṇanti te.
tika-vin10t0:9692_0: Chattaṃ paṇṇamayaṃ kiñci, bahi anto ca sabbaso;
tika-vin10t0:9693_0: Pañcavaṇṇena suttena, sibbituṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:9696_0: Ghaṭakaṃ vāḷarūpaṃ vā, lekhā daṇḍe na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:9701_0: Ghaṭakaṃ vāḷarūpaṃ vā, lekhā vā pana kevalā;
tika-vin10t0:9702_0: Bhinditvā vāpi ghaṃsitvā, dhāretuṃ pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:9708_0: Samaṃ satapadādīnaṃ, sibbituṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:9710_0: Pattassa pariyante vā, tathā pattamukhepi vā;
tika-vin10t0:9711_0: Veṇiṃ saṅkhalikaṃ vāpi, karoto hoti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:9717_0: Suttā ca piḷakā tattha, duviññeyyāva dīpitā.
tika-vin10t0:9722_0: Sūcikammavikāraṃ vā, aññaṃ vā pana kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t0:9723_0: Cīvare bhikkhunā kātuṃ, kārāpetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:9731_0: Tathā kiliṭṭhakāle ca, dhovanatthaṃ tu vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:9733_0: Rajane pana gandhaṃ vā, telaṃ vā lākhameva vā;
tika-vin10t0:9734_0: Kiñci pakkhipituṃ tattha, bhikkhuno na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:9736_0: Saṅkhena maṇinā vāpi, aññenapi ca kenaci;
tika-vin10t0:9737_0: Cīvaraṃ na ca ghaṭṭeyya, ghaṃsitabbaṃ na doṇiyā.
tika-vin10t0:9739_0: Cīvaraṃ doṇiyaṃ katvā, nāpi ghaṭṭeyya muṭṭhinā;
tika-vin10t0:9740_0: Rattaṃ paharituṃ kiñci, hattheheva ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:9742_0: Gaṇṭhike pana lekhā vā, piḷakā vā na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t0:9745_0: Thālakassa ca pattassa, bahi antopi vā pana;
tika-vin10t0:9746_0: Āraggena katā lekhā, na ca vaṭṭati kācipi.
tika-vin10t0:9748_0: Āropetvā bhamaṃ pattaṃ, majjitvā ce pacanti ca;
tika-vin10t0:9752_0: Na doso koci tatthassa, kātuṃ makaradantakaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:9755_0: Kucchiyaṃ vā ṭhapetvā taṃ, lekhaṃ tu mukhavaṭṭiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:9757_0: Suttaṃ vā diguṇaṃ katvā, koṭṭenti ca tahiṃ tahiṃ;
tika-vin10t0:9763_0: Akkhīni tattha dassetvā, koṭṭite pana kā kathā;
tika-vin10t0:9764_0: Kakkaṭakkhīni vā tattha, uṭṭhāpetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:9766_0: Ghaṭaṃ deḍḍubhasīsaṃ vā, makarassa mukhampi vā;
tika-vin10t0:9767_0: Vikārarūpaṃ yaṃ kiñci, na vaṭṭati dasāmukhe.
tika-vin10t0:9769_0: Ujukaṃ macchakaṇṭaṃ vā, maṭṭhaṃ vā pana paṭṭikaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:9776_0: Rajjuyo na ca vaṭṭanti, purimā dvedasā siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t0:9779_0: Ekā dviticatasso vā, vaṭṭanti na tato paraṃ.
tika-vin10t0:9782_0: Tañca pāmaṅgasaṇṭhānaṃ, ekampi ca na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:9784_0: Rajjuke ekato katvā, bahū ekāya rajjuyā;
tika-vin10t0:9794_0: Na ca vaṭṭati bhikkhūnaṃ, añjanī janarañjanī.
tika-vin10t0:9796_0: Tādisaṃ pana ghaṃsitvā, veṭhetvā suttakena vā;
tika-vin10t0:9797_0: Vaḷañjantassa bhikkhussa, na doso koci vijjati.
tika-vin10t0:9799_0: Vaṭṭā vā caturassā vā, aṭṭhaṃsā vāpi añjanī;
tika-vin10t0:9806_0: Yaṃ kiñci pana sibbetvā, vaḷañjantassa vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:9809_0: Ṭhapetuṃ pana yaṃ kiñci, na ca vaṭṭati bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t0:9812_0: Valitvā ca nakhacchedaṃ, karontīti hi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:9815_0: Mālākammādi yaṃ kiñci, vaṇṇamaṭṭhaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:9818_0: Dvīsu passesu lohena, bandhituṃ pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:9821_0: Vaṭṭalekhāva vaṭṭanti, ekā vā dvepi heṭṭhato.
tika-vin10t0:9829_0: Tathā pattapidhāne ca, tālavaṇṭe ca bījane;
tika-vin10t0:9843_0: Buddhaṃ dhammañca saṅghañca, na uddissa davaṃ kare;
tika-vin10t0:9846_0: Kāyaṃ vā aṅgajātaṃ vā, ūruṃ vā na tu dassaye;
tika-vin10t0:9847_0: Bhikkhunīnaṃ tu tā vāpi, na siñce udakādinā.
tika-vin10t0:9850_0: Dukkaṭaṃ puna dātabbaṃ, gīvā naṭṭhepi jajjare.
tika-vin10t0:9852_0: Codito so sace tehi, bhikkhūhi na dadeyyataṃ;
tika-vin10t0:9856_0: Davā silaṃ pavijjhanto, dukkaṭā na ca muccati.
tika-vin10t0:9864_0: Na ca bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ, sampayojeyya kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t0:9867_0: Bhikkhunīnaṃ have bhikkhu, pātimokkhaṃ na uddise;
tika-vin10t0:9868_0: Āpattiṃ vā sace tāsaṃ, paṭiggaṇheyya dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:9874_0: Aggaṃ gahetvā dātuṃ vā, pattādīsupyayaṃ nayo.
tika-vin10t0:9883_0: Pakkhipitvāna pākatthaṃ, cāletuṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:9886_0: Tattha cādīnavaṃ tassa, vattuṃ pana ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t0:9889_0: Kataṃ nissāya dussīlaṃ, tayā viharatā”ti ca.
tika-vin10t0:9891_0: Bhattagge yāgupāne ca, antogāme ca vīthiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:9894_0: Sutto khādañca bhuñjanto, vaccaṃ muttampi vā karaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:9900_0: Ekādasa abhabbā ca, garukaṭṭhā ca pañcime;
tika-vin10t0:9901_0: Vandato dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, bāvīsati ca puggale.
tika-vin10t0:9904_0: Dhammavādī ca sambuddho, vandanīyā tayo ime.
tika-vin10t0:9909_0: Adhiṭṭhānaṃ panekassa, dvinnaṃ vā tiṇṇameva vā;
tika-vin10t0:9918_0: Tattha appaṭikammā ca, yā ca vuṭṭhānagāminī;
tika-vin10t0:9937_0: Tatraṭṭho pana so dvinnaṃ, kammaṃ kopeti saṅghikaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:9952_0: Vuttā samaṇakappā ca, pañca, pañca visuddhiyo.
tika-vin10t0:9954_0: Nidānaṃ puggalaṃ vatthuṃ, vidhiṃ paññattiyā pana;
tika-vin10t0:9963_0: Nidānaṃ tattha vesālī, tathā rājagahaṃ puraṃ;
tika-vin10t0:9967_0: Satāni hi cha ūnāni, tīṇi sāvatthiyā siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t0:9969_0: Cha panāḷaviyaṃ vuttā, aṭṭha kosambiyaṃ katā;
tika-vin10t0:9970_0: Aṭṭha sakkesu paññattā, tayo bhagge pakāsitā.
tika-vin10t0:9976_0: Thullanandādayo satta, sabbe tiṃsa bhavanti te.
tika-vin10t0:9993_0: Idaṃ catubbidhaṃ sīlaṃ, ñatvā tattha patiṭṭhito;
tika-vin10t0:10024_0: Sesaṃ pana ca sabbampi, na vaḍḍhetabbameva taṃ.
tika-vin10t0:10030_0: Viññāṇaṃ nevasaññā ca, dasa dve bhāvagocarā.
tika-vin10t0:10038_0: Tāni dvādasa bhiyyo ca, ānāpānasatīpi ca;
tika-vin10t0:10039_0: Sabbaso terasa vāpi, brahmaloke na jāyare.
tika-vin10t0:10042_0: Aññe pana na jāyanti, sabbe jāyanti mānuse.
tika-vin10t0:10044_0: Catutthaṃ kasiṇaṃ hitvā, kasiṇā ca dasāsubhā;
tika-vin10t0:10053_0: Bhavanti hi abhiññāṇaṃ, kasiṇāni dasāpi ca;
tika-vin10t0:10078_0: Cariyāyānukūlaṃ tu, tesu yaṃ attano pana.
tika-vin10t0:10092_0: Tiṇṇaṃ tesaṃ vavatthāne, kate ettāvatā pana;
tika-vin10t0:10093_0: Tiṇṇaṃ pana ca saccānaṃ, vavatthānaṃ kataṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:10107_0: Teneva ca upāyena, bhāvento so punappunaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:10116_0: Yadi akkharabandhe vā, ayuttaṃ viya dissati.
tika-vin10t0:10122_0: Sabbassa pana lokassa, gāme sampiṇḍite viya.
tika-vin10t0:10157_0: Yathā siddhimayaṃ patto, antarāyaṃ vinā tathā;
tika-vin10t0:10167_0: Karontena pattaṃ mayā yaṃ tu puññaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:10172_1: kavivaravasabhena paramaratikaravaramadhuravacanuggārena uragapurena buddhadattena racitoyaṃ vinayavinicchayo.
tika-vin10t0:10181_0: Yo mayā racito sāro, vinayassa vinicchayo;
tika-vin10t0:10194_0: Thullaccayaṃ mukhe vaṭṭa-kate vuttaṃ tu dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:10202_0: Māse vā dukkaṭaṃ ūne, majjhe thullaccayaṃ tato.
tika-vin10t0:10210_0: Dukkhe thullaccayaṃ jāte, mate pārājikaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:10216_0: Thullaccayaṃ pariyāye, ñāte, no ce tu dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:10225_0: Dvaṅge thullaccayaṃ vuttaṃ, payoge dukkaṭaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:10231_0: Āmasantassa kāyena, kāyaṃ tu garukaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:10233_0: Kāyena kāyabaddhaṃ tu, phusaṃ thullaccayaṃ phuse;
tika-vin10t0:10237_0: Vaṇṇāvaṇṇaṃ vadaṃ dvinnaṃ, maggānaṃ garukaṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t0:10243_0: Santike garukaṃ hoti, sace jānāti sā pana.
tika-vin10t0:10252_0: Aṅge sati panekasmiṃ, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:10263_0: Anuddhaṃseti yo tassa, tisso āpattiyo siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t0:10265_0: Okāsaṃ na ca kāretvā, hutvā cāvanacetano;
tika-vin10t0:10272_0: Sabbo āpattibhedo hi, natthi kāci visesatā.
tika-vin10t0:10301_0: Gahaṇe dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, pācitti gahite siyā.
tika-vin10t0:10304_0: Cīvaraṃ viññāpento dve, bhikkhu āpattiyo phuse.
tika-vin10t0:10321_0: Vikappaṃ cīvare bhikkhu, āpajjanto duve phuse.
tika-vin10t0:10326_0: Nipphādeti sace tassa, honti āpattiyo duve;
tika-vin10t0:10327_0: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ, tassa, lābhe nissaggiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:10331_0: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, lābhe nissaggiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:10334_0: Dukkaṭaṃ paṭhame pāde, nissaggiṃ dutiye phuse.
tika-vin10t0:10337_0: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ, tassa, dhote nissaggiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:10340_0: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, nissaggi gahite siyā.
tika-vin10t0:10343_0: Samāpanne ca nissaggiṃ, payoge dukkaṭaṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t0:10346_0: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ, tasmiṃ, kate nissaggiyaṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t0:10353_0: Aññaṃ pana navaṃ pattaṃ, cetāpeti sace pana.
tika-vin10t0:10355_0: Dve panāpattiyo bhikkhu, āpajjati, na saṃsayo;
tika-vin10t0:10356_0: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ, tassa, lābhe nissaggiyaṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t0:10359_0: Ekaṃ nissaggiyāpattiṃ, āpajjati hi so pana.
tika-vin10t0:10362_0: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ, tassa, lābhe nissaggiyaṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t0:10364_0: Bhikkhuno cīvaraṃ datvā, acchindanto duve phuse;
tika-vin10t0:10365_0: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, haṭe nissaggiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:10368_0: Vāyāpeti sace bhikkhu, dve panāpattiyo phuse.
tika-vin10t0:10373_0: Dve panāpattiyo so hi, āpajjati, na saṃsayo;
tika-vin10t0:10374_0: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ, tassa, lābhe nissaggiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:10377_0: Kālaṃ atikkamento taṃ, ekaṃ nissaggiyaṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t0:10380_0: Chārattato vinā tena, vasaṃ nissaggiyaṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t0:10382_0: Jānaṃ pariṇataṃ lābhaṃ, saṅghikaṃ attano pana;
tika-vin10t0:10383_0: Pariṇāmeti ce bhikkhu, dve panāpattiyo phuse.
tika-vin10t0:10406_0: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ, pāde, pāde pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:10409_0: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, panne pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:10415_0: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ, pāde, pāde pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:10418_0: Āroceti sace tassa, honti dve dukkaṭādayo.
tika-vin10t0:10423_0: Pathaviṃ khaṇato tassa, payoge dukkaṭaṃ mataṃ;
tika-vin10t0:10424_0: Pahāre ca pahāre ca, pācitti pariyāputā.
tika-vin10t0:10427_0: Bhūtagāmaṃ tu pātento, dve panāpattiyo phuse;
tika-vin10t0:10428_0: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ, tassa, pāte pācitti dīpitā.
tika-vin10t0:10431_0: Aropite dukkaṭaṃ tu, hoti pācitti ropite.
tika-vin10t0:10433_0: Ujjhāpento paraṃ bhikkhuṃ, dve panāpattiyo phuse;
tika-vin10t0:10446_0: Dukkaṭaṃ pana uddiṭṭhaṃ, pācitti dutiyena tu.
tika-vin10t0:10452_0: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, sesaṃ nikkaḍḍhite siyā.
tika-vin10t0:10460_0: Jānaṃ sappāṇakaṃ toyaṃ, tiṇaṃ vā siñcato pana;
tika-vin10t0:10461_0: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ hoti, sitte pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:10467_0: Dutiye tatiye ceva, catutthepi ca sabbaso;
tika-vin10t0:10470_0: Cīvaraṃ bhikkhu aññāti-kāya dento duve phuse;
tika-vin10t0:10471_0: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, dinne pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:10474_0: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ tassa, pācitti pana sibbite.
tika-vin10t0:10477_0: Saṃvidhāya tu gacchanto, phuse dve dukkaṭādayo.
tika-vin10t0:10488_0: Bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ, nisajjaṃ tu raho pana;
tika-vin10t0:10489_0: Kappento hi phuse dvepi, payoge dukkaṭādayo.
tika-vin10t0:10495_0: Dutiye tatiye cāpi, viseso natthi kocipi;
tika-vin10t0:10499_0: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, pācitti gahite siyā.
tika-vin10t0:10510_0: Sattame aṭṭhame ceva, navame dasamepi ca;
tika-vin10t0:10515_0: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ patto, dinne pācittiyaṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t0:10517_0: Dāpetvā vā adāpetvā, uyyojento duve phuse;
tika-vin10t0:10520_0: Nisajjaṃ bhikkhu kappento, kule pana sabhojane;
tika-vin10t0:10523_0: Catutthe pañcame vāpi, viseso natthi kocipi;
tika-vin10t0:10526_0: Santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā, sabhatto ca nimantito;
tika-vin10t0:10527_0: Kulesu pana cārittaṃ, āpajjanto duve phuse.
tika-vin10t0:10530_0: Dukkaṭaṃ piṭake vuttaṃ, pācitti dutiyena tu.
tika-vin10t0:10532_0: Taduttariṃ tu bhesajjaṃ, viññāpento duve phuse;
tika-vin10t0:10535_0: Uyyuttaṃ dassanatthāya, gacchanto dve phuse balaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:10536_0: Gacchato dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, hoti pācitti passato.
tika-vin10t0:10539_0: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, pācitti vasite siyā.
tika-vin10t0:10541_0: Uyyodhikaṃ tu gacchanto, dve panāpattiyo phuse;
tika-vin10t0:10542_0: Gacchanto dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, hoti pācitti passato.
tika-vin10t0:10545_0: Suraṃ vā pana mereyyaṃ, pivanto dve phuse muni;
tika-vin10t0:10546_0: Gaṇhato dukkaṭaṃ pātuṃ, pīte pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:10549_0: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ tassa, pācitti hasite siyā.
tika-vin10t0:10551_0: Kīḷanto udake bhikkhu, dve panāpattiyo phuse;
tika-vin10t0:10554_0: Yo panādariyaṃ bhikkhu, karonto dve phuse have;
tika-vin10t0:10555_0: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, kate pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:10557_0: Bhiṃsāpento have bhikkhu, dve panāpattiyo phuse;
tika-vin10t0:10563_0: Oraso addhamāsassa, nhāyanto dve phuse have;
tika-vin10t0:10580_0: Manusso marati tasmiṃ, patitvā ce parājayo.
tika-vin10t0:10583_0: Patitvā maratī peto, tassa thullaccayaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:10588_0: Jānaṃ sappāṇakaṃ toyaṃ, paribhuñjaṃ duve phuse;
tika-vin10t0:10589_0: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ tassa, bhutte pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:10594_0: Jānaṃ bhikkhussa duṭṭhullaṃ, chādento pana vajjakaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:10598_0: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ patto, sesā sampādite siyā.
tika-vin10t0:10600_0: Jānaṃ tu theyyasatthena, saṃvidhāya saheva ca;
tika-vin10t0:10603_0: Dve panāpattiyo honti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ mataṃ;
tika-vin10t0:10606_0: Accajaṃ pāpikaṃ diṭṭhiṃ, ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ phuse;
tika-vin10t0:10610_0: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ tassa, bhutte pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:10619_0: Vinayaṃ tu vivaṇṇento, dve panāpattiyo phuse;
tika-vin10t0:10622_0: Mohento dve phuse, mohe, dukkaṭaṃ tu aropite;
tika-vin10t0:10625_0: Pahāraṃ kupito dento, bhikkhussa dve phuse have;
tika-vin10t0:10626_0: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, pācitti pahaṭe siyā.
tika-vin10t0:10629_0: Dve phuse dukkaṭaṃ yoge, pācittuggirite siyā.
tika-vin10t0:10632_0: Dve phuse dukkaṭaṃ yoge, pācittuddhaṃsite siyā.
tika-vin10t0:10634_0: Bhikkhu sañcicca kukkuccaṃ, janayanto hi bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t0:10635_0: Dve phuse dukkaṭaṃ yoge, pācittuppādite siyā.
tika-vin10t0:10638_0: Gacchato dukkaṭaṃ sotuṃ, pācitti suṇato siyā.
tika-vin10t0:10640_0: Dhammikānaṃ tu kammānaṃ, chandaṃ datvā tato puna;
tika-vin10t0:10644_0: Adatvā gacchato tassa, dve panāpattiyo siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t0:10646_0: Hatthapāsaṃ tu saṅghassa, jahato hoti dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:10649_0: Samaggena ca saṅghena, datvāna saha cīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t0:10650_0: Khīyanto dve phuse pacchā, payoge dukkaṭādayo.
tika-vin10t0:10652_0: Lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ jānaṃ, saṅghikaṃ puggalassa hi;
tika-vin10t0:10656_0: Pubbe avidito hutvā, rañño antepuraṃ pana;
tika-vin10t0:10660_0: Dukkaṭaṃ pana uddiṭṭhaṃ, pācitti dutiyena tu.
tika-vin10t0:10662_0: Ratanaṃ pana gaṇhanto, dve panāpattiyo phuse;
tika-vin10t0:10663_0: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ tassa, pācitti gahite siyā.
tika-vin10t0:10665_0: Santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā, vikāle gāmakaṃ pana;
tika-vin10t0:10666_0: Samaṇo pavisaṃ dose, āpajjati duve pana.
tika-vin10t0:10669_0: Dukkaṭaṃ tassa niddiṭṭhaṃ, pācitti dutiyena tu.
tika-vin10t0:10675_0: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, sesā kārāpite siyā.
tika-vin10t0:10677_0: Tūlonaddhaṃ tu mañcādiṃ, kārāpento duve phuse;
tika-vin10t0:10678_0: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ, tasmiṃ, sesā kārāpite siyā.
tika-vin10t0:10680_0: Sattame aṭṭhame ceva, navame dasamepi ca;
tika-vin10t0:10697_0: Kati āpattiyo honti? Catassova bhavanti hi.
tika-vin10t0:10700_0: Mate akkhāyite vāpi, bhikkhu pārājikaṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t0:10706_0: Kati āpattiyo honti? Pañca āpattiyo siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t0:10711_0: Kāyena phusato kāyaṃ, bhikkhussa garukaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t0:10712_0: Kāyena kāyabaddhaṃ tu, phusaṃ thullaccayaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:10734_0: Chādentī bhikkhunī vajjaṃ, tisso āpattiyo phuse;
tika-vin10t0:10735_0: Jānaṃ pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ, chādentī sā parājikā.
tika-vin10t0:10746_0: Pūrentī aṭṭhamaṃ vatthuṃ, tisso āpattiyo phuse;
tika-vin10t0:10750_0: Pūrentī aṭṭhamaṃ vatthuṃ, samaṇī sā parājitā.
tika-vin10t0:10762_0: Ekā gāmantaraṃ gacche, gamane dukkaṭaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t0:10769_0: Āpattīnaṃ pabhede tu, kāci natthi visesatā.
tika-vin10t0:10780_0: “Sahatthena gahetvā tvaṃ, khāda vā bhuñja vā”tipi;
tika-vin10t0:10781_0: Uyyojentī panevaṃ tu, tisso āpattiyo phuse.
tika-vin10t0:10787_0: Uyyojeti ca yā tassā, imā tissoti dīpaye.

tika-vin10t0:12003_0: Sesaṃ panidha āpattiṃ, āpajjanti ubhopi ca;
tika-vin10t0:12006_0: Ādiyanto garuṃ dosaṃ, payojento lahuṃ phuse;
tika-vin10t0:12007_0: Ādiyanto lahuṃ dosaṃ, payojento garuṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t0:12012_0: Pādaṃ vāpi tato uddhaṃ, ādiyanto garuṃ phuse;
tika-vin10t0:12018_0: Kāleyeva panāpatti, no vikāle kathaṃ siyā?
tika-vin10t0:12019_0: Vikāleyeva āpatti, na ca kāle kathaṃ siyā?
tika-vin10t0:12021_0: Atthāpatti hi kāle ca, vikāle ca pakāsitā?
tika-vin10t0:12022_0: Neva kāle vikāle ca, atthāpatti pakāsitā?
tika-vin10t0:12028_0: Sesaṃ kāle vikāle ca, āpajjati, na saṃsayo.
tika-vin10t0:12033_0: Kiṃ paṭiggahitaṃ kāle, no vikāle tu kappati?
tika-vin10t0:12034_0: Vikāle kiñca no kāle, gahitaṃ pana kappati?
tika-vin10t0:12036_0: Kāle ceva vikāle ca, kiṃ nāma vada kappati?
tika-vin10t0:12037_0: Neva kāle ca kiṃ nāma, no vikāle ca kappati?
tika-vin10t0:12040_0: Kāleyeva tu bhikkhūnaṃ, no vikāle tu kappati.
tika-vin10t0:12043_0: Vikāleyeva kāle ca, aparajju na kappati.
tika-vin10t0:12046_0: Kāle ceva vikāle ca, kappatīti viniddise.
tika-vin10t0:12052_0: Kāle ceva vikāle ca, na ca kappati bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t0:12055_0: Majjhime pana desasmiṃ, na ca paccantimesu hi.
tika-vin10t0:12060_0: Sīmaṃ samudde bandhanto, bhikkhu paccantimesu hi;
tika-vin10t0:12066_0: Dhārento majjhime vajjaṃ, phuse paccantimesu no;
tika-vin10t0:12070_0: Paccantimesu vā bhikkhu, nāpajjati na majjhime.
tika-vin10t0:12072_0: Paccantimesu desesu, kappate na ca majjhime;
tika-vin10t0:12073_0: Kappate, majjhime dese, no ca paccantimesu hi.
tika-vin10t0:12076_0: Paccantimesu cevāpi, kiṃ na kappati majjhime?
tika-vin10t0:12079_0: Niddise kappatī ceva, na ca kappati majjhime.
tika-vin10t0:12084_0: Paccantimesu desesu, evaṃ vuttaṃ na kappati;
tika-vin10t0:12088_0: Ubhayatthapi taṃ sabbaṃ, na ca kappati bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t0:12090_0: Anto āpajjatāpattiṃ, āpajjati ca, no bahi;
tika-vin10t0:12091_0: Bahi āpajjatāpattiṃ, na ca anto kudācanaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:12094_0: Neva anto ca āpattiṃ, āpajjati ca, no bahi.
tika-vin10t0:12097_0: Saṅghikaṃ pana mañcādiṃ, ajjhokāse tu kiñcipi.
tika-vin10t0:12099_0: Nikkhipitvāna gacchanto, no anto, bahiyeva ca;
tika-vin10t0:12105_0: Gāme āpajjatāpattiṃ, no araññe kathaṃ vada?
tika-vin10t0:12106_0: Āpajjati araññasmiṃ, na ca gāme kathaṃ vada?
tika-vin10t0:12108_0: Āpajjati ca gāmepi, araññepi kathaṃ vada?
tika-vin10t0:12109_0: Nevāpajjati gāmepi, no araññe kathaṃ vada?
tika-vin10t0:12112_0: Āpajjati hi taṃ bhikkhu, gāmasmiṃ, no araññake.
tika-vin10t0:12114_0: Agaṇā aruṇaṃ nāma, uṭṭhāpentī ca bhikkhunī;
tika-vin10t0:12115_0: Āpajjati panāpattiṃ, araññe, no ca gāmake.
tika-vin10t0:12121_0: Agilānova āpattiṃ, phuse, no ca gilānako.
tika-vin10t0:12123_0: Agilāno gilāno ca, āpajjanti ubhopi ca;
tika-vin10t0:12124_0: Nāpajjanti gilāno ca, agilāno ubhopi ca.
tika-vin10t0:12126_0: Bhesajjena panaññena, atthe sati ca yo pana;
tika-vin10t0:12129_0: Na bhesajjena atthepi, bhesajjaṃ viññāpeti ce;
tika-vin10t0:12142_0: Yo tattha cīvaruppādo, so ca nesaṃ bhavissati;
tika-vin10t0:12149_0: Gadrabhassa vasā ceti, vasā pañcavidhā matā.
tika-vin10t0:12192_0: Āpattiṃ pana jānāti, anāpattiṃ garuṃ lahuṃ.
tika-vin10t0:12201_0: Satta sāmīciyo vuttā, satteva samathāpi ca;
tika-vin10t0:12206_0: Pupphena ca phalenāpi, cuṇṇenapi ca dūsako.
tika-vin10t0:12214_0: Kataṃ ahatthapāsepi, na ca bhuttāvinā kataṃ;
tika-vin10t0:12227_0: Iti aṭṭhavidhaṃ hoti, sabbameva ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:12244_0: Musā na bhāse, na ca majjapo siyā;
tika-vin10t0:12248_0: Mālaṃ na dhāre, na ca gandhamācare;
tika-vin10t0:12258_0: Dukkaṭaṃ pana niddiṭṭhaṃ, nava maṃsāni khādato.
tika-vin10t0:12265_0: Akappiyāni maṃsāni, dasa sukkāni ve dasa.
tika-vin10t0:12267_0: Jāti nāmañca gottañca, kammaṃ sippañca rogatā;
tika-vin10t0:12268_0: Liṅgāpatti kilesā ca, akkosena daseva hi.
tika-vin10t0:12273_0: Dasa kammapathā puññā, apuññāpi tathā dasa;
tika-vin10t0:12295_0: Pattā akappiyā vuttā, ekādasa bhavanti hi;
tika-vin10t0:12308_0: Gaṇṭhikā kappiyā vuttā, ekādasa ca vīdhakā.
tika-vin10t0:12319_0: Aṭṭha saṅghādisesesu, ubhinnaṃ tu vasā pana;
tika-vin10t0:12332_0: Niruttaro bhavati hi so, na saṃsayo.
tika-vin10t0:12336_0: Ito paraṃ pavakkhāmi, bhikkhūnaṃ suṇataṃ puna;
tika-vin10t0:12340_0: Paṭicca methunaṃ dhammaṃ, kathaṃ pārājiko siyā?
tika-vin10t0:12343_0: Mukhena methunaṃ dhammaṃ, katvā pārājiko bhave.
tika-vin10t0:12345_0: Suññe nissattake dīpe, eko bhikkhu sace vase;
tika-vin10t0:12348_0: Lambī vā mudupiṭṭhī vā, vaccamagge mukhepi vā;
tika-vin10t0:12351_0: Sayaṃ nādiyate kiñci, parañca na samādape;
tika-vin10t0:12358_0: Parassa tu parikkhāraṃ, na ca pārājiko kathaṃ?
tika-vin10t0:12361_0: Gaṇhanto theyyacittena, na ca pārājiko siyā.
tika-vin10t0:12363_0: Attano santakaṃ datvā, bhikkhu pārājiko kathaṃ?
tika-vin10t0:12366_0: Pitari pitusaññī ca, mātusaññī ca mātari;
tika-vin10t0:12367_0: Hantvānantariyaṃ kammaṃ, na phuseyya kathaṃ naro?
tika-vin10t0:12373_0: Gacchaṃ ṭhito nisinno vā, kathaṃ pārājiko bhaṇa?
tika-vin10t0:12379_0: Kathaṃ? Kathehi me puṭṭho, vinaye ce visārado.
tika-vin10t0:12385_0: Acaritvā yathāvuttaṃ, vattaṃ so vuṭṭhito kathaṃ?
tika-vin10t0:12395_0: Vaṇṇasmiṃ bhaññamāne yo, titthiyānaṃ tu kujjhati;
tika-vin10t0:12398_0: Atthaṅgate tu sūriye, bhojanaṃ bhikkhu bhuñjati;
tika-vin10t0:12401_0: Yo ca romanthayitvāna, rattiṃ ghasati bhojanaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:12404_0: Atthaṅgate ca sūriye, gahetvā bhikkhu bhojanaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:12405_0: Sace bhuñjeyya āpatti, anāpatti kathaṃ bhave?
tika-vin10t0:12408_0: Āgantvā idha kālena, natthi āpatti bhuñjato.
tika-vin10t0:12410_0: Gāme vā yadi vāraññe, yaṃ paresaṃ mamāyitaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:12411_0: Na harantova taṃ theyyā, kathaṃ pārājiko siyā?
tika-vin10t0:12416_0: Nārī rūpavatī bālā, bhikkhu rattena cetasā;
tika-vin10t0:12417_0: Methunaṃ tāya katvāpi, so na pārājiko kathaṃ?
tika-vin10t0:12422_0: Ekissā dve siyuṃ puttā, jātā idha panitthiyā;
tika-vin10t0:12423_0: Dvinnaṃ mātā pitā sāva, kathaṃ hoti bhaṇāhi me?
tika-vin10t0:12426_0: Gaṇhāpeti paraṃ gabbhaṃ, tasmā mātā pitā ca sā.
tika-vin10t0:12432_0: Dārakassa ca mātā hi, kātuṃ labhati bhikkhunī.
tika-vin10t0:12434_0: Ko ca bhikkhūhi sikkhāsu, asādhāraṇataṃ gato;
tika-vin10t0:12435_0: Na pārivāsiko brūhi, na ukkhittādikopi ca?
tika-vin10t0:12438_0: Na so labhati aññesaṃ, kappatīti ca niddise.
tika-vin10t0:12441_0: Katamo puggalo brūhi, na mato na ca jīvati?
tika-vin10t0:12444_0: Hoti nimmitabuddho so, na mato na ca jīvati.
tika-vin10t0:12449_0: Naro karoti ce kuṭiṃ, sa sabbamattikāmayaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:12450_0: Na muccateva vajjato, jinena vuttato tato.
tika-vin10t0:12463_0: Parassā pana yā vajjaṃ, paṭicchādeti bhikkhunī;
tika-vin10t0:12471_0: Abhabbā pana ye vuttā, puggalā paṇḍakādayo;
tika-vin10t0:12474_0: Anuggiraṃ giraṃ kiñci, subhaṃ vā yadi vāsubhaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:12475_0: Phuse vācasikaṃ vajjaṃ, kathaṃ me pucchito bhaṇa?
tika-vin10t0:12489_0: Saṃvidhāya ca cattāro, garuṃ theniṃsu bhaṇḍakaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:12490_0: Thero thullaccayaṃ tesu, patto, sesā parājayaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:12492_0: Kathaṃ? Chamāsakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ, tattha sāhatthikā tayo;
tika-vin10t0:12493_0: Haṭā therena māsā tu, tayo āṇattiyāpi ca.
tika-vin10t0:12500_0: Bahiddhā gehato bhikkhu, itthī gabbhantaraṃ gatā;
tika-vin10t0:12501_0: Chiddaṃ gehassa no atthi, methunapaccayā cuto.
tika-vin10t0:12506_0: Sappiādiṃ tu bhesajjaṃ, gahetvā sāmameva taṃ;
tika-vin10t0:12513_0: Ekatova kathaṃ bhikkhu, āpajjeyya bhaṇāhi me?
tika-vin10t0:12515_0: Saṅghe pariṇataṃ lābhaṃ, attano ca parassa ca;
tika-vin10t0:12529_0: Nissaggiyāni sabbāni, kathaṃ honti kathehi me?
tika-vin10t0:12531_0: Kaṇṇaṃ gahetvā tattheva, kaddamaṃ yadi dhovati;
tika-vin10t0:12534_0: Purisaṃ apitaraṃ hantvā, itthiṃ hantvā amātaraṃ;
tika-vin10t0:12537_0: Parivatte tu liṅgasmiṃ, pitaraṃ itthitaṃ gataṃ;
tika-vin10t0:12538_0: Mātaraṃ purisattaṃ tu, gataṃ hantvā garuṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t0:12540_0: Mātaraṃ pana māretvā, māretvā pitarampi ca;
tika-vin10t0:12546_0: Codetvā sammukhībhūtaṃ, saṅgho kammaṃ kareyya ce;
tika-vin10t0:12547_0: Kathaṃ kammaṃ akammaṃ taṃ, saṅgho sāpattiko siyā?
tika-vin10t0:12561_0: Bhesajjāni hi pañceva, gahetvā bhājane visuṃ;
tika-vin10t0:12576_0: Anāpatti hi so rukkho, hoti ekakulassa ce.
tika-vin10t0:12583_0: Nānitthīnaṃ tu kese vā, tāsaṃ aṅguliyopi vā;
tika-vin10t0:12584_0: Ekato gahaṇe tassa, honti sambahulā pana.
tika-vin10t0:12595_0: Methunaṃ na ca sevanto, methunappaccayā cuto?
tika-vin10t0:12600_0: Mātaraṃ cīvaraṃ yāce, saṅghe pariṇataṃ na ca;
tika-vin10t0:12601_0: Kenassa hoti āpatti, anāpatti ca ñātake?
tika-vin10t0:12617_0: Ekassa kammaṃ tu na rūhate kiṃ?
tika-vin10t0:12624_0: Saṅghenapi hi ākāse, ṭhitena pana iddhiyā;
tika-vin10t0:12625_0: Bhūmigassa na kātabbaṃ, karoti yadi kuppati.
tika-vin10t0:12627_0: Na ca kappakataṃ vatthaṃ, na ca rattaṃ akappiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:12631_0: Na cassākappiyaṃ nāma, cīvaraṃ pana vijjati.
tika-vin10t0:12633_0: Na kutopi ca gaṇhati kiñci have;
tika-vin10t0:12634_0: Na tu deti ca kiñcipi bhojanato;
tika-vin10t0:12652_0: Chādeti, na phuse vajjaṃ, kathaṃ jānāsi me vada?
tika-vin10t0:12658_0: Dvijaṃ kantamakantañca, sace jānāsi me vada?
tika-vin10t0:12678_0: Nidānaṃ nāma vesālī, tathā rājagahaṃ puraṃ;
tika-vin10t0:12681_0: Kati vesāliyā vuttā, kati rājagahe katā?
tika-vin10t0:12685_0: Kati bhaggesu paññattā, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchito?
tika-vin10t0:12690_0: Cha panāḷaviyaṃ vuttā, aṭṭha kosambiyaṃ katā;
tika-vin10t0:12691_0: Aṭṭha sakkesu paññattā, tayo bhaggesu dīpitā.
tika-vin10t0:12697_0: Bhikkhunīsu ca akkoso, dasa vesāliyaṃ katā.
tika-vin10t0:12708_0: Vosāsantī ca naccaṃ vā, gītaṃ vā cārikadvayaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:12721_0: Ovādopi ca bhesajjaṃ, sūci āraññakesu ca.
tika-vin10t0:12733_0: Daseva pana gārayhā, dvesattati ca sekhiyā.
tika-vin10t0:12736_0: Ime vuttāvasesā hi, sabbe sāvatthiyaṃ katā.
tika-vin10t0:12741_0: Dve gārayhā, tayo sekhā, chappaññāseva sabbaso;
tika-vin10t0:12742_0: Bhavanti chasu paññattā, nagaresu ca piṇḍitā.
tika-vin10t0:12747_0: Sikkhāpadāni bhikkhūnaṃ, vīsañca dve satāni ca;
tika-vin10t0:12748_0: Bhikkhunīnaṃ tu cattāri, tathā tīṇi satāni ca.
tika-vin10t0:12751_0: Aniyatā duve vuttā, tiṃsa nissaggiyāni ca.
tika-vin10t0:12753_0: Khuddakā navuti dve ca, cattāro pāṭidesanā;
tika-vin10t0:12756_0: Dve satāni ca vīsañca, vasā bhikkhūnameva ca;
tika-vin10t0:12759_0: Pārājikāni aṭṭheva, garukā dasa satta ca;
tika-vin10t0:12760_0: Nissaggiyāni tiṃseva, chasaṭṭhi ca satampi ca.
tika-vin10t0:12763_0: Sabbāni pana cattāri, tathā tīṇi satāni ca.
tika-vin10t0:12765_0: Bhavanti pana etāni, bhikkhunīnaṃ vasā pana;
tika-vin10t0:12771_0: Cha ca saṅghādisesā ca, tathā aniyatā duve;
tika-vin10t0:12772_0: Dvādaseva ca nissaggā, dvāvīsati ca khuddakā.
tika-vin10t0:12778_0: Kuṭi ceva vihāro ca, chaḷete garukā siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t0:12783_0: Tatiyepi ca vaggasmiṃ, patto ca paṭhamo tathā;
tika-vin10t0:12804_0: Bhikkhūhi bhikkhunīnañca, sataṃ tiṃsa bhavanti hi;
tika-vin10t0:12808_0: Dvādaseva ca nissaggā, khuddakā navuticcha ca.
tika-vin10t0:12810_0: Aṭṭheva pana gārayhā, sataṃ tiṃsa bhavantime;
tika-vin10t0:12826_0: Ekatoyeva paññattā, sataṃ tiṃsa bhavanti hi.
tika-vin10t0:12829_0: Pārājikāni cattāri, garukā ca dasaccha ca.
tika-vin10t0:12834_0: Dvādaseva ca gārayhā, sataṃ sattati caccha ca;
tika-vin10t0:12848_0: Ito paraṃ pavakkhāmi, lakkhaṇaṃ pana sabbagaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:12849_0: Savane sādaraṃ katvā, vadato me nibodhatha.
tika-vin10t0:12860_0: Puggalo nāma yaṃ yaṃ tu, bhikkhumārabbha bhikkhuniṃ;
tika-vin10t0:12861_0: Sikkhāpadaṃ tu paññattaṃ, ayaṃ vuccati puggalo.
tika-vin10t0:12867_0: Thullanandādayo satta, sabbe tiṃsa bhavanti hi.
tika-vin10t0:12869_0: Vatthūti puggalasseva, tassa tassa ca sabbaso;
tika-vin10t0:12872_0: Kevalā pana paññatti, mūlabhūtā tatheva sā;
tika-vin10t0:12897_0: Āṇattīti ca nāmesā, ñeyyā āṇāpanā pana.
tika-vin10t0:12902_0: Kāyenapi ca vācāya, yā karontassa jāyate;
tika-vin10t0:12911_0: Siyā pana karontassa, akarontassa yā siyā;
tika-vin10t0:12928_0: Puna sabbāva cittassa, vasena duvidhā siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t0:12939_0: Yassā sacittake pakkhe, cittaṃ akusalaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t0:12979_0: Dve panāpattimūlāni, kāyo vācā bhavanti hi;
tika-vin10t0:12982_0: Kati gāmantare vuttā, nadīpāre tathā kati?
tika-vin10t0:12983_0: Kati thullaccayaṃ maṃse, kati maṃsesu dukkaṭaṃ?
tika-vin10t0:12988_0: Bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ, saṃvidhāti ca dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:12994_0: Tathā bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ, saṃvidhāne tu dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:12995_0: Abhirūhati nāvaṃ ce, hoti pācitti bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t0:12998_0: Paṭhame, dutiye tassā, hoti bhikkhuniyā garuṃ.
tika-vin10t0:13000_0: Kati vācasikā rattiṃ, kati vācasikā divā?
tika-vin10t0:13001_0: Duve vācasikā rattiṃ, duve vācasikā divā.
tika-vin10t0:13013_0: Kati vā dadamānassa, kati vā paṭigaṇhato?
tika-vin10t0:13016_0: Manussassa visaṃ deti, sace marati tena so;
tika-vin10t0:13017_0: Hoti pārājikaṃ, yakkhe, pete thullaccayaṃ mataṃ.
tika-vin10t0:13020_0: Tathā pācitti aññāti-kāya ce deti cīvaraṃ.
tika-vin10t0:13034_0: Kati dhaññarasā vuttā, vikāle kappiyā pana?
tika-vin10t0:13038_0: Ratticchedo katīnaṃ tu, paññattā dvaṅgulā kati?
tika-vin10t0:13041_0: Ratticchedo duvinnaṃ tu, paññattā dvaṅgulā duve.
tika-vin10t0:13044_0: Pārājikāni kāyamhā, ime dve pana jāyare.
tika-vin10t0:13055_0: Dvaṅgulaṃ vā dumāsaṃ vā, paññattā dvaṅgulā duve.
tika-vin10t0:13058_0: Kati obhāsane vuttā, sañcaritte tathā kati?
tika-vin10t0:13066_0: Pārājikaṃ siyā, yakkhe, pete thullaccayaṃ mate.
tika-vin10t0:13078_0: Dukkaṭaṃ pana niddiṭṭhaṃ, tisso obhāsanā yimā.
tika-vin10t0:13081_0: Dvīhi thullaccayaṃ vuttaṃ, ekena pana dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:13087_0: Bhūtagāmaṃ tu pācitti, aṅgajātaṃ tu thullatā.
tika-vin10t0:13089_0: Visaṃ chaḍḍetyanodissa, manusso marati tena ce;
tika-vin10t0:13090_0: Pārājikaṃ, mate yakkhe, pete thullaccayaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t0:13095_0: Gacchato katidhāpatti, ṭhitassa kati me vada?
tika-vin10t0:13101_0: Bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ, saṃvidhāne tu dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t0:13108_0: Posassa hatthapāse tu, pācitti yadi tiṭṭhati.
tika-vin10t0:13114_0: Hitvā tiṭṭhati ce tassā, hoti saṅghādisesatā.
tika-vin10t0:13125_0: Anissagge tu pācitti, pāpikāya ca diṭṭhiyā;
tika-vin10t0:13135_0: Gahetvā bhojanaṃ kiñci, sabbaṃ maṃsaṃ akappiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:13147_0: Olokentassa vā vuttaṃ, mukhaṃ bhikkhaṃ dadantiyā.
tika-vin10t0:13158_0: Mettiyā dūsako ceva, kaṇṭakoti tayo ime;
tika-vin10t0:13162_0: Dve tayo anusāvetuṃ, vaṭṭatīti ca niddise.
tika-vin10t0:13164_0: Ñattiyā kappanā ceva, tathā vippakatampi ca;
tika-vin10t0:13174_0: Kāraṇehi pana dvīhi, saṅgho bhijjati, naññathā.
tika-vin10t0:13186_0: Yo te vasati ārāme, vadaṃ thullaccayaṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t0:13188_0: Viññāpetvā paṇītaṃ tu, bhojanaṃ bhikkhu bhuñjati;
tika-vin10t0:13191_0: Viññāpetvāna sūpaṃ vā, odanaṃ vā anāmayo;
tika-vin10t0:13192_0: Bhikkhu bhuñjati ce tassa, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:13207_0: Bhavanti pana sabbāni, aḍḍhuḍḍhāni satāni hi.
tika-vin10t0:13217_0: Atthe akkharabandhe vā, viññāsassa kamepi vā;
tika-vin10t0:13218_0: Kaṅkhā tasmā na kātabbā, kātabbā bahumānatā.
tika-vin10t0:13229_0: Vāceti ca paraṃ niccaṃ, atthaṃ upaparikkhati.
tika-vin10t0:13231_0: Yo tassa pana bhikkhussa, atthā vinayanissitā;
tika-vin10t0:13257_0: Rājā pātu mahiṃ sammā, kāle devo pavassatu.
tika-vin10t0:13259_0: Yāva tiṭṭhati selindo, yāva cando virocati;
tika-vin10t0:13271_0: Akāsiṃ paramaṃ etaṃ, uttaraṃ nāma nāmato;
tika-vin10t0:13272_0: Savane sādaraṃ katvā, sikkhitabbo tato ayaṃ.
tika-vin10t0:13279_1: kavivaravasabhena paramaratikaravaramadhuravacanuggārena uragapurena buddhadattena racito uttaravinicchayo
